LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_99_UNDEAD_BALLOONS_DESC: Prevent Balloon Zombies from crossing the 5th column
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_BASH_POTATO_DESC: Defeat 7 zombies with a single Primal Potato Mine
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_CANT_STOP_THE_ROCK_DESC: Defeat 5 zombies with a single boulder trap
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_DINOS_SORE_DESC: Prevent all dinosaurs in a level from interacting with any zombies
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_DOWN_WITH_THE_SICKNESS_DESC: Have a contagious zombie spread poison to 5 other zombies
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_HOT_OFF_THE_PRESSES_DESC: Set a Newspaper Zombie's newspaper on fire
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_HUNGRY_HUNGRY_DINOS_DESC: Complete a level where T. Rexes chomp 10 zombies
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_RAGWEEDS_DESC: Create 5 new Gold Tiles in a single level with the Gold Leaf
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_SHADOW_FAMILY_DESC: Complete a level with 20 powered Shadow Plants
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_SHOVEL_OFF_DESC: Complete a level where Excavator Zombie shovels no plants
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_SPAWN_CAMPING_DESC: Clear a level where 3 Imp Porters have established camps
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_TERROR_REDACTYLED_DESC: Use a Perfume-shroom on a Pterodactyl carrying a zombie towards your house
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_TIME_TRAVELER_DESC: Complete a level where each of your plants comes from a different world
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_UNWELCOME_MAT_DESC: Have 10 Red Stingers in the two columns closest to your house
LocStringValues.ACHIEVEMENT_YOURE_AN_ALLSTAR_DESC: Complete a level where All-Star Zombies are unable to tackle even a single plant

LocStringValues.ADVICE_INTENSIVECARROT_NOT_ON_PREVIOUSLY: You can only plant this on defeated plants.

LocStringValues.ADVICE_KEEP_DIGGING_2:

One of your peashooters died!

LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANTED_PEASHOOTER:

LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_NOT_ON_MOLD: You can't plant on the mold colonies

LocStringValues.ADVICE_SUN_BOMBS_TRIGGERED: Patience and precision are needed in Sun Bomb levels.

LocStringValues.ADVICE_USE_WIZARDFINGER_BETTER: Make sure to hold your finger on the screen!

LocStringValues.AILMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}this version can only be used at night

{FLAVOR}Puff-shroom is hip to all the latest social networks. He loves to surf Sporebook, FungusedIn and ShroomstaGram. But sometimes he misses the simple camaraderie of a good ol' fashioned Lawn Area Network party.
LocStringValues.AKEE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}loses 5 damage for each bounce

{FLAVOR}Autonomous Katapulting Ejectomatic Emitter is actively looking for a different acronym for A.K.E.E. because let's face it, "Katapulting" is just not working.
LocStringValues.AKEE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: A.K.E.E.s lob projectiles that bounce from zombie to zombie, slowing them down slightly.
LocStringValues.AKEE_TOOLTIP: Lobs projectiles that bounce from zombie to zombie, slowing them down slightly
LocStringValues.ALOE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot heal Chard Guard and Primal Wall-nut

{FLAVOR}Aloe likes to soothe. He likes to alleviate, he likes to restore, he likes to mend. But don't ask him to revive. He's touchy about revival.
LocStringValues.ALOE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Aloes heal injured plants to their immediate right.
LocStringValues.APPEASEMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}sprout has a chance to grow into a Marigold
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be imitated or instant recharged

{FLAVOR}Forcing Marigolds out of their zen lifestyles have been a great pleasure for Marigold Sprouts. "You should've seen their faces!", they said.
LocStringValues.APPEASEMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marigold Sprouts spawn sprouts on all empty tiles.
LocStringValues.APPLEMORTAR_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Things Apple Mortar does in his free time include: Indulging in friendly rivalry with Melon-pult, practicing trick shots with Nightshade and sharpening his apple core. He's a prideful plant with an explosive personality, and others are glad to befriend him... That's what he thought, at least.
LocStringValues.APPLEMORTAR_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Apple Mortars lob apple cores that damage zombies in a tile, over three lanes.
LocStringValues.APPLEMORTAR_TOOLTIP: Lobs damaging cores down three lanes
LocStringValues.APP_UPDATE_REQUIRED: Download the latest version of Plants vs. Zombies 2 from the App Store to continue.
LocStringValues.ARCADE_DIALOG_FOOTER: Unlock Power Ups to use in Endless!
LocStringValues.ARMAMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be instant recharged

{FLAVOR}"Boosting ranged attacks, for me, has always been a very personal endeavor," says Arma-mint. "It's a great way for me to express myself, my identity, and my preference that zombies be defeated in large groups."
LocStringValues.AUTH_AWARD_BODY: Each profile on your account has been given a reward for successfully registering your account!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_DANGER_ROOM_BEACH: Access to the Endless Zone - High Tide!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_DANGER_ROOM_COWBOY: Access to the Big Bad Butte!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_DANGER_ROOM_DARKAGES: Access to the Endless Zone - Classic Night
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_DANGER_ROOM_EGYPT: Access to the Endless Zone - Classic II!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_DANGER_ROOM_GENERIC: Survive level after level of escalating zombie attacks. Test your skills in this Endless Zone.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_DANGER_ROOM_MODERN: Access to Highway to the Danger Room!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_DANGER_ROOM_PIRATE: Access to Endless Zone - Quick Charge!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_FIRSTKEY_DESCRIPTION: It's an ancient key.  Now all you need is an ancient lock.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_LAWN_MOWER_TRIGGERED: ONE OR MORE LAWN MOWERS WERE TRIGGERED!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MAPGADGET_DESCRIPTION: A parchment of ancient lands, with cosmic implications.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MONEYBAG_DESCRIPTION_01: Like your head is full of brains, this bag is full of coins!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MONEYBAG_DESCRIPTION_02: Coins, coins, coins! For all your Power Up and Plant Food needs!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MONEYBAG_DESCRIPTION_03: It's better than a bag of imps, there are coins!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MONEYBAG_DESCRIPTION_04: Sorry, your epic bag of infinite coins was on another zombie.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MONEYBAG_DESCRIPTION_05: A coin in the bag is way better than looking a gift zombie in the mouth.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_POWERUPGADGET_DESCRIPTION: Use only in a jam. Do not use if quality seal is broken.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_POWERUP_TITLE: Crazy Dave's jar of preserved powers
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_POWERUP_VASEBREAKERBUTTER_D: Butters a single Zombie in Vasebreaker
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_POWERUP_VASEBREAKERREVEAL_D: Reveals the contents of one Vase in Vasebreaker
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDKEY_DESCRIPTION: Use to unlock new Worlds and travel to other times!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_BEACH: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Sharktronic Sub.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_COWBOY: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot War Wagon.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_DARK: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Dark Dragon.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_DINO: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Dinotronic Mechasaur.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_EGYPT: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Sphinx-inator.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_EIGHTIES: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Multi-stage Masher.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_FUTURE: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Tomorrow-tron.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_ICEAGE: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Tuskmaster 10,000 BC.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_LOSTCITY: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' invention, the Zombot Aerostatic Gondola.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_MODERN: You have acquired a taco with a waffle in it!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_MODERN_TITLE: Taco With a Waffle In It
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_PIRATE: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Plank Walker.
LocStringValues.BANANA_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}tap to arm, tap on target tile to fire

{FLAVOR}It's important to avoid stereotyping as much as possible. Stereotypes are often flat-out wrong. And also hurtful. But honestly ... Banana Launcher is TOTALLY bananas.
LocStringValues.BANANA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Banana Launchers can fire explosive bananas at any tile on the lawn, doing massive damage to zombies in an area upon impact.
LocStringValues.BLASTBERRY_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Blastberry Vine snickers to himself. He imagines lobbing bomblets. He's been reading up on it and he knows it's gonna make a big splash when it happens. "Soon," he whispers.
LocStringValues.BLASTBERRY_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Blastberry Vines can be planted on top of other plants to provide an additional attack in the form of lobbed projectiles that break into explosive bomblets.
LocStringValues.BLASTBERRY_TOOLTIP: Can be planted on top of other plants to lob explosive bomblets
LocStringValues.BLOOMERANG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}As the first new member to your home defense team, Bloomerang enjoys long walkabouts with his friend, Koala Bear, and listening to his Bob Barley albums out back.
LocStringValues.BLOOMERANG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Bloomerangs can hit up to three targets in their lane, twice!
LocStringValues.BLOOMINGHEARTS_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}has +3 direct damage after charming zombies

{FLAVOR}Blooming Heart loves zombies. She gets guff from her fellow plants over it, but she stands firm. She's into zombies and makes no apologies about it.
LocStringValues.BLOOMINGHEARTS_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Blooming Hearts lob projectiles that do minor damage to a small group of zombies.
LocStringValues.BLOOMINGHEARTS_TOOLTIP: Lobs projectiles that do splash damage
LocStringValues.BOMBEGRANATE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Bombegranate is fierce and a go-getter. She will always try to be one step ahead of everyone else. Sometimes, she even wishes that she could multiply herself with her seeds, so she can do even MORE things with a bunch of mini-Bombe! Alas, she wouldn't trade her sentinel seeds for anything else in the world - she loves them too much for that.
LocStringValues.BOMBEGRANATE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Bomegranates instantly explode and leave 3x3 grids of exploding seeds that damage zombies.
LocStringValues.BONKCHOY_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}A freelance dentist on the side, he's offering a special this month - he'll knock two of your teeth out for the price of one!
LocStringValues.BONKCHOY_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Bonk Choys rapidly punch nearby enemies that are ahead or behind them.
LocStringValues.BONKCHOY_TOOLTIP: Rapidly punches enemies ahead or behind
LocStringValues.BOOST_ALREADY_ACTIVE: This plant is already boosted! Use it in a level!
LocStringValues.BOOST_DETAIL_BOUNTY_HUNTER: Zombies defeated by this plant drop coins. This boost lasts for 1 level.
LocStringValues.BOOST_DETAIL_EXTRA_TOUGH: Extra protection from zombies. This boost lasts for 1 level.
LocStringValues.BOOST_DETAIL_FAST_RECHARGE: Recharges more quickly. This boost lasts for 1 level.
LocStringValues.BOOST_DETAIL_FIRST_STRIKE: Gets free Plant Food effect when planted. This boost lasts for 1 level.
LocStringValues.BOOST_DETAIL_RAPID_FIRE: Attacks at a faster rate. This boost lasts for 1 level.
LocStringValues.BOOST_DETAIL_SHOVEL_BOMB: Explodes when shoveled. This boost lasts for 1 level.
LocStringValues.BOOST_DETAIL_SUN_DISCOUNT: Costs less sun to plant. This boost lasts for 1 level.
LocStringValues.BOWLINGBULB_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}recharges larger bulbs when their lane has no zombies

{FLAVOR}Guess which team has won the League Championship for five years running now? Team Bowling Bulb, that's who. They are on a ROLL. You and your pals think you got what it takes to stop 'em? Yeah, sure. Keep dreamin, bub.
LocStringValues.BOWLINGBULB_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Bowling Bulbs roll shots that can bounce into multiple zombies.
LocStringValues.BOWLINGBULB_TOOLTIP: Rolls bouncing shots that can hit multiple zombies
LocStringValues.CABBAGEPULT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cabbage-pult received his doctorate in pulting from Harvest University. He knows a thing or two about launching his way to the top. He also makes a mean soup.
LocStringValues.CABBAGEPULT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Cabbage-pults hurl cabbages at the enemy.
LocStringValues.CABBAGEPULT_TOOLTIP: Hurls cabbages over obstacles at the enemy
LocStringValues.CACTUS_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}thorns fly at random angles
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}hides and does ground damage when zombies are near

{FLAVOR}Things have really changed for Cactus lately. Book deals, movies, truck show appearances... she's just trying to focus on staying humble and launching thorns like always.
LocStringValues.CACTUS_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Cactus fires a penetrating thorn that can damage multiple enemies when there are targets close to her.
LocStringValues.CACTUS_TOOLTIP: Shoots piercing spikes when there are nearby targets, can hide for ground damage
LocStringValues.CAMEL_MINIGAME_TUTORIAL_1: Tap on a zombie to flip its panel
LocStringValues.CAMEL_MINIGAME_TUTORIAL_2: Great! Now tap on another one
LocStringValues.CAMEL_MINIGAME_TUTORIAL_3: Awesome! Keep matching symbols to win the game
LocStringValues.CANNON_TUTORIAL_1: Tap on the coconut cannon to make it fire
LocStringValues.CANNON_TUTORIAL_2: Great! Now blow up as many zombies as you can
LocStringValues.CAULIPOWER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}hovers above ground or water
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}cannot hypnotize Gargantuars

{FLAVOR}A general misconception is that his eyes are spinning because of him casting too many spells. See, Caulipower enjoys writing books in his spare time. One day, he thought of a really great ending for his latest novel... but he was afraid that his cousin won't understand it. He has been trying to fix the part since then, and it gave him so much of a headache that his eyes started spinning with distress!
LocStringValues.CAULIPOWER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Caulipowers use their mental powers to hypnotize random zombies, prioritizing normal zombies first.
LocStringValues.CELERYSTALKER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost

{FLAVOR}Celery Stalker resents the implication that there's anything unsavory about his attack style. He simply believes that discretion is the better part of vegetation.
LocStringValues.CELERYSTALKER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Celery Stalkers wait until zombies pass, then pop up and bash them from behind.
LocStringValues.CELERYSTALKER_TOOLTIP: Pops up and bashes zombies from behind
LocStringValues.CELLULAR_PERMISSION_BODY: Do you want to use cellular data to download additional content? You can change this setting in the options menu later.
LocStringValues.CHARDGUARD_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}You might remember Chard Guard from his days in the WWF (that's World Wrestling Foliage). When he was in the ring - boy-oh-boy - he was something to behold! His moves! His style! His attitude! The crowd loved him. He was quite the star for a while there. Sure, those days are behind him. But if you watch carefully, when Chard Guard is fighting zombies, you'll see him use the wrestling move he made famous. The ol' Knock 'Em Dead maneuver - it gets 'em every time.
LocStringValues.CHARDGUARD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Chard Guards are defensive blockers that can hurl zombies backwards 6 times.
LocStringValues.CHERRY_BOMB_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The Cherry Bomb Brothers attempted to start their own band. "We tried to figure out what the sound would be, but we kept explodonating speakers, stages, fans, and of course, zombies. Look for our LP next year."
LocStringValues.CHERRY_BOMB_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Cherry Bombs can blow up all zombies in a 3x3 area. They have a short fuse so plant them near zombies.
LocStringValues.CHERRY_BOMB_TOOLTIP: Instantly blows up all zombies in a 3x3 area
LocStringValues.CHILIBEAN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}zombie that ate it is destroyed and releases stunning gas
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}has no effect on mechs

{FLAVOR}He's not blushing, he's trying to hold it in.
LocStringValues.CHILIBEAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Chili Beans deliver a crippling bout of gastrointestinal distress.
LocStringValues.CHILIBEAN_TOOLTIP: Defeats the zombie that ate it, releasing gas
LocStringValues.CHOMPER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}deal damage to zombies that they can't devour instead

{FLAVOR}Everyone appreciates what Chomper does. His appetite has saved them on numerous occasions. But truth be told, Chomper's friends think that eating zombies is gross. And his breath! No one has the heart to tell him, and he never gets the hint when you offer him a mint.
LocStringValues.CHOMPER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Chompers can devour a zombie whole, but they take a while to chew and are vulnerable while chewing.
LocStringValues.CHOMPER_TOOLTIP: Eats a zombie in front and chews for a while
LocStringValues.CITRON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}As the owner and primary user of "Vitamin C-U-Later" 20-hour energy shots, Citron is always on and always ready for action. "Let's make this happen!!"
LocStringValues.CITRON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Citrons shoot powerful balls of plasma down the lane.
LocStringValues.COCONUTCANNON_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}tap to fire
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}his cannonballs fall down to the ground after traveling for 6 tiles

{FLAVOR}Sure, he's a hairy old man, but Coconut Cannon can still fire on all cylinders. The reason he's so hairy: he's in-between waxings.
LocStringValues.COCONUTCANNON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Coconut Cannons fire down a single lane, causing a medium explosion on impact that knocks zombies back.
LocStringValues.COCONUTCANNON_TOOLTIP: Charges heavy explosive coconuts that knock zombies back
LocStringValues.COIN_STORE_TEXT: You need more coins.  Choose a package below.
LocStringValues.COLDSNAPDRAGON_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost

{FLAVOR}Cold Snapdragon gets chilly when anyone brings up his cousin Snapdragon. "We just view temperature very differently, and I'd really rather not discuss it," he says. Yikes.
LocStringValues.COLDSNAPDRAGON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Cold Snapdragons breathe icy mist into 6 adjacent tiles, causing damage and slowing zombies down.
LocStringValues.COLDSNAPDRAGON_TOOLTIP: Breathes icy mist in an area in front of it
LocStringValues.CONTINUE_GAME_OR_RESTART: Do you want to continue your current game or restart the level?
LocStringValues.CONVERSION_KEY_DESCRIPTION:
Your progress and rewards have been preserved. Your unused keys have been turned into coins!

{COINT_AMT} Coins!
LocStringValues.CONVERSION_REWARDS_DESCRIPTION:
Updating your progress has given you new rewards!

Details are available in the Almanac.
LocStringValues.CONVERSION_SPLASH_DESCRIPTION:
Travel to new worlds faster.
 NEW Turbo speed feature.
 Gargantuar battles in every world.
LocStringValues.CONVERSION_STARS_DESCRIPTION:
Your progress and rewards have been preserved. Plant costumes have been awarded to you for the extra Stars you've earned.

{COSTUME_AMT} New Costumes!
LocStringValues.CONVERSION_WORLDKEY_DESCRIPTION: You've been awarded a World Key for your progress in the game. Use it to unlock the world of your choice!
LocStringValues.COPA_PICTURE_WARNING: Your photo will only be saved to this device.
LocStringValues.CREDITS_COPYRIGHT:
Plants vs. Zombies 2 - 2019 Electronic Arts Inc. Plants vs. Zombies, PopCap, EA and the EA logo are trademarks of Electronic Arts Inc. 
VISIT US AT: WWW.POPCAP.COM
SUPPORT: www.POPCAP.com/help.php
LocStringValues.CREDITS_ORIGINAL_THEME_AND_MUSIC: Additional Music and Original Plants vs. Zombies Themes
LocStringValues.CREDITS_PVZ_TITLE:
Plants vs. Zombies 2:
It's About Time
by PopCap and Electronic Arts
LocStringValues.DAILY_ACTIVITIES_DESC: Complete Daily Activities for fruitful rewards!
LocStringValues.DANDELION_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}reacts to Hurrikale, releasing a barrage of seeds but will take a while to regenerate

{FLAVOR}"Look," says Dandelion, shaking his head. "I'm not a leprechaun and I'm not a genie. You can blow my seeds off all you want, but I can't make your wish come true. I don't even know how that rumor got started."
LocStringValues.DANDELION_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Dandelions send explosive seeds down three different lanes, one lane at a time.
LocStringValues.DANDELION_TOOLTIP: Send explosive seeds down three different lanes, one lane at a time
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_BEACH_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to Endless Zone - High Tide!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_COWBOY_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to Endless Zone - Auto Sun!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_DARK_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to Endless Zone - Classic Night!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_DINO_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to Endless Zone - Sun Headstart!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_EGYPT_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to Endless Zone - Classic II!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_FUTURE_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to Endless Zone - All Out!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_MODERN_LEVEL_NAME: Highway to the Danger Room - Level {LEVEL_NUMBER}
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_MODERN_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to Highway to the Danger Room!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_PIRATE_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to Endless Zone - Quick Charge!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_FLAME_THROWER: Adds a free use of Power Flame
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_FLICK_ZOMBIE: Adds a free use of Power Toss
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_FOURTH_CARD_DESC: Use coins to show fourth choice
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_MOWER_DESC: Restores up to {MOWER_COUNT} missing lawn mowers at the start of the level
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_MOWER_DESC_SINGULAR: Restores one missing lawn mower at the start of the level
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_PLANTFOOD_DESC: Starts you off with {PF_COUNT} extra Plant Foods
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_PLANTFOOD_DESC_SINGUL: Starts you off with an extra Plant Food
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_SNOWBALL: Adds a free use of Power Snow
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_SUN_DESC: Starts you off with an extra {SUN_COUNT} sun
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_WIZARD_FINGER: Adds a free use of Power Zap
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_TITLE_PICK_REWARD: Select a card to add to your progression!
LocStringValues.DAZEYCHAIN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"I use they/them pronouns," says Dazey Chain. "Duh," they add.
LocStringValues.DAZEYCHAIN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Dazey Chains fire stalling petals down the lane. They grow through stages, becoming more powerful and releasing a stalling puff of gas at each stage.
LocStringValues.DAZEYCHAIN_TOOLTIP: Fires stalling petals & grows to become more powerful
LocStringValues.DELETING_CHILD_PROFILES_INFO: By not allowing additional profiles, this will delete your non-primary profiles.  Are you sure you want to do that?
LocStringValues.DIALOG_ARE_YOU_EXPERIENCED: Have you played Plants vs. Zombies before?
LocStringValues.DIALOG_SKIP_TUTORIAL: Would you like to play through the fundamentals of Plants vs. Zombies?
LocStringValues.DIALOG_TURBO_DESCRIPTION: The Turbo button speeds up your game. Faster sun, faster plants, and faster zombies!
LocStringValues.DOWNLOAD_ERROR_UPDATE_UNAVAILABLE: No update available at this time. Please try again later.
LocStringValues.DOWNLOAD_FAILED_BODY: Could not retrieve update information. Check that you are connected to the internet or try again at another time.
LocStringValues.DUSKLOBBER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Lobbing comes easily to Dusk Lobber, but that's only because she's had extensive training and really enjoys parabolas.
LocStringValues.DUSKLOBBER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Dusk Lobbers lob explosive buds down the lane.
LocStringValues.ELECTRICBLUEBERRY_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}thundercloud deals 150 damage every 1s and will continue until the target dies

{FLAVOR}Electric Blueberry prides herself on being eclectic as well as electric. "I like to keep 'em guessing," she says. "A zombie should always be like, 'Whoa, didn't see that coming,' when it's disintegrated."
LocStringValues.ELECTRICBLUEBERRY_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Electric Blueberries create thunderclouds that electrocute random zombies, prioritizing special zombies first.
LocStringValues.ELECTRICCURRANT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can zap zombies too close to them

{FLAVOR}"Electricity is all very well and fine as a phenomenon," says Electric Currant, "but electromagnetism as a whole is where it's really at."
LocStringValues.ELECTRICCURRANT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Electric Currants create electrical fences between ones planted on the same row or column, damaging zombies caught in-between.
LocStringValues.ELECTRICCURRANT_TOOLTIP: Creates electric fences & zaps eating zombies
LocStringValues.ELECTRICPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}As the latest member of the Electric Family, he's all about puns and jokes. But in battle, he's all serious and concentrated. To him, their resistance is futile, and they'd better be shocked about his ability. But, at the end of the day, he just wants to get back to his ohm sweet home, eat some light snacks and learn watt are the current jokes.
LocStringValues.ELECTRICPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Electric Peashooters fire pea-like orbs that crackle with electrical power, zapping nearby zombies until the orbs hit a target.
LocStringValues.ELECTRICPEASHOOTER_TOOLTIP: Shoots electric peas that zap zombies in a radius
LocStringValues.ENCHANTMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be instant recharged

{FLAVOR}"I just love musical theater," says Enchant-mint. Yeah, it doesn't have much to do with magic or his abilities or strategic strengths, but it's a fact. He just likes the songs.
LocStringValues.ENCHANTMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Enchant-mints boost all plants' HP and HP-related effects.
LocStringValues.ENCHANTMINT_TOOLTIP: Boosts all plants' HP and HP-related effects
LocStringValues.ENDURIAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"When other plants talk about me, they say I'm too gruff. They say I'm difficult to approach, that I'm afraid to let others get too close to me. Also, I smell terrible," said Endurian. But deep down inside, he knows that he's so much more than that. He's also short-tempered.
LocStringValues.ENDURIAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Endurians are defensive plants that deal damage to zombies attacking them.
LocStringValues.ENDURIAN_TOOLTIP: Defends while dealing damage to zombies attacking it
LocStringValues.ENFORCEMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be instant recharged

{FLAVOR}Enforce-mint may seem a bit off-brand for a guy who's all about melee damage. He shrugs. "I don't set policy," he says.
LocStringValues.ENLIGHTENMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can only be used once
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be imitated or instant recharged

{FLAVOR}She was right. It is way too soon.
LocStringValues.ENLIGHTENMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marigolds give you coins on the battlefield.
LocStringValues.ENTER_UNIQUE_PLAYER_NAME: The name you entered is already being used.  Please enter a unique player name.
LocStringValues.EPIC_QUEST_AWARD_BODY: Keep an eye out for more Epic Quests!
LocStringValues.EPIC_QUEST_DESC: Some super crunchy Epic Quest Placeholder text YEAHHHHH!!!
LocStringValues.ESCAPEROOT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}tap Escape Root and another plant to swap them

{FLAVOR}The other plants put on a big surprise party for Escape Root last week, but he did his thing and suddenly it was a surprise party... FOR THEM!
LocStringValues.ESCAPEROOT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Escape Roots can be swapped with other plants that are in danger.
LocStringValues.ESCAPEROOT_TOOLTIP: Can be swapped with other plants
LocStringValues.EXIT_DANGER_ROOM_BODY: Are you sure that you want to leave? Doing so will end your game.
LocStringValues.EXPLODEONUT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"I was once the champion of the League Championship in bowling, that was five years ago...", says Explode-O-Nut, "and then, the Bulb team from the Northern Shores showed up. I kept trying, harder and harder", but all that effort got him nowhere near to them. "We haven't really talked much since we met each other. They are good kids, though". At least, all that training gave him the most unique talent in the field he now has - a body full of nitroglycerine that's ready to be unleashed anytime!
LocStringValues.EXPLODEONUT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Explode-O-Nuts provide protection, and when their shells are eaten, they explode to blow up zombies.
LocStringValues.FAILED_CANNON_MINIGAME:
PENNY IS
NOT IMPRESSED
WITH YOUR SCORE!
LocStringValues.FILAMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be instant recharged

{FLAVOR}Fila-mint hovers enigmatically and electrically over the lawn, surveying his surroundings. He nods, once. It is good.
LocStringValues.FILAMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Fila-mints immobilize ALL zombies for a long duration.
LocStringValues.FIREPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost, warms nearby plants

{FLAVOR}Fire Peashooter knows that what she does looks exciting. But working with an open flame is serious and, more importantly, dangerous business. That's why, in her spare time, she talks to children about the importance of fire safety. "I'm a trained professional," she explains. "Don't try this at home, kids."
LocStringValues.FIREPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Fire Peashooters shoot big flaming peas down the lane.
LocStringValues.FORCE_RESTORE_PURCHASES_BODY: This item has been purchased before. Restore Purchases will allow you to claim all of your past purchases in any profile.
LocStringValues.FUMESHROOM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"I think of myself as a pretty confident shroom and an all-around fungi," says Fume-shroom. "But sometimes, when I'm eating Plant Food, I hear them chuckling. I hear them calling me 'Balloon-shroom'. I don't think they know how much that hurts."
LocStringValues.FUMESHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Fume-shrooms shoot fumes that damage all zombies in an area.
LocStringValues.FUMESHROOM_TOOLTIP: Fumes all zombies in a range
LocStringValues.GAMECENTER_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: You must connect to Game Center outside the PvZ2 app to access achievements and leaderboards.
LocStringValues.GARLIC_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Good against zombies, as well as proof against any vampires who might accidentally wander by.
LocStringValues.GARLIC_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Garlics divert zombies that ate them into other lanes.
LocStringValues.GEMS_STORE_TEXT: Need more gems? Choose a package below.
LocStringValues.GHOSTPEPPER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}explodes after 10s, dealing 200 damage to all nearby zombies
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}hovers above ground or water, can phase through a few objects

{FLAVOR}You might not know it looking at her, but Ghost Pepper didn't always wear that white sheet everywhere she went. She first put it on as a lark for a Halloween party one year. Everyone else had these elaborate costumes, and she thought it would be funny to dress like a plain ol' ghost. But she fell in love with that costume. It spoke to her. She'd found her calling.
LocStringValues.GHOSTPEPPER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Ghost Peppers haunt zombies that pass by and explode after a limited time.
LocStringValues.GHOSTPEPPER_TOOLTIP: Haunts all zombies that pass by and explodes after a limited time
LocStringValues.GOLDBLOOM_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Sun Production: {STAT}225
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be imitated

{FLAVOR}"Your botanists were so preoccupied with whether they could," says Gold Bloom, about nothing and to nobody in particular, "they didn't stop to think if they should."
LocStringValues.GOLDBLOOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Gold Blooms instantly produce a burst of sun all at once.
LocStringValues.GOLDBLOOM_TOOLTIP: Gives an instant burst of sun
LocStringValues.GOLDLEAF_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"For a small initial investment, you too can generate huge sun," says Gold Leaf. She's a firm believer in solar markets.
LocStringValues.GOLDLEAF_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Gold Leaves instantly create Gold Tiles on planting.
LocStringValues.GOLDLEAF_TOOLTIP: Creates a Gold Tile on planting
LocStringValues.GOOGLE_PLAY_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: You must connect to Google Play to access achievements and leaderboards.
LocStringValues.GOT_A_POWERUP: You got a new POWER UP!
LocStringValues.GRANT_WORLDKEYS_COMPLETIONIST_BODY_TEXT: You already have all your keys!
LocStringValues.GRANT_WORLDKEYS_MIDPLAYER_BODY_TEXT: You just got keys for all the worlds! Check them out!
LocStringValues.GRANT_WORLDKEYS_NEWPLAYER_BODY_TEXT: You shouldn't be seeing this message, it is only for older players.
LocStringValues.GRANT_WORLDKEYS_TITLE_TEXT: Hey, time traveler! Here's all the world keys.
LocStringValues.GRAPESHOT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"Spa-BOOM!" enthuses Grapeshot. "You like that? I got a million of 'em! Wa-POW!  Buh-BLAM! Za-... um... Ker-... hmmm... Okay, I guess I've only got the three."
LocStringValues.GRAPESHOT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Grapeshots explode and scatter bouncing projectiles in eight directions.
LocStringValues.GRAVEBUSTER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}deals damage to nearby grid items after consuming a grave
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water

{FLAVOR}He may appear spiky or ill-tempered, but Grave Buster just wants to give you a big hug. Unless you're a puppy. He's terrified of those.
LocStringValues.GRAVEBUSTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Grave Busters consume graves they're planted on.
LocStringValues.GUACODILE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water

{FLAVOR}Ask Guacodile to tell you a little bit about himself and he'll give you a wry smile. "I'm a Guacodile. I've got a bite like a bear trap. Heck, I've been known to walk on water. I'm pretty much the whole enchilada." Yeah, the guy is a bit of a braggart but he's good at what he does.
LocStringValues.GUACODILE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: When attacked, Guacodiles will rush off the lawn, biting any zombies they encounter.
LocStringValues.GUACODILE_TOOLTIP: Rushes & bites all zombies ahead of him when attacked
LocStringValues.HOLLYKNIGHT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}tap to arm, tap on target tile to fire

{FLAVOR}Holly Barrier would like to advise folks not to eat his berries. "It's rude to eat somebody's berries without asking," he says. "In addition, they are highly toxic."
LocStringValues.HOLLYKNIGHT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Holly Barrier deals damage to zombies attacking him, and can launch 5 prickly barrier leaves to damage zombies in a tile.
LocStringValues.HOLLYKNIGHT_TOOLTIP: Packs 5 heavy-slamming barriers ready to launch
LocStringValues.HOLONUT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}can't protect plants planted after Infi-nut

{FLAVOR}As a young nut he spent way too much time standing between two mirrors and trying to look into infinity.
LocStringValues.HOLONUT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Infi-nuts protect plants 2 tiles forward and backward. They can also regain health over time.
LocStringValues.HOLONUT_TOOLTIP: Protects plants 2 tiles forward & backward and regains health over time
LocStringValues.HOMINGTHISTLE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Don't even think about trying to pull one over on Homing Thistle. He's got a bead on you. He sees right through your facade. It's like he has a laser beam ... aimed at your soul.
LocStringValues.HOMINGTHISTLE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Homing Thistles fire seeking shots at targets that are the closest to home.
LocStringValues.HOTDATE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Hot Date's a charmer. He's polite, well-read, has lots of interesting opinions, and practices active listening. He's the life of every single party - you should have seen him dance! Girls line up around him wherever he goes.
LocStringValues.HOTDATE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Hot Dates instantly attract zombies from lanes above and below them.
LocStringValues.HOTPOTATO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water

{FLAVOR}How does Hot Potato stay so positive and even-peeled all the time? Yoga, that's how. She never misses a class. Also, regular meditation. It's the only way she can handle the hard work of fighting zombies, day in and day out, without melting down.
LocStringValues.HOTPOTATO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Hot Potatoes melt the ice blocks and octopis they're planted on, dealing light damage to passing zombies.
LocStringValues.HURRIKALE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}blows away most flying zombies in lane

{FLAVOR}You could say Hurrikale is a "blow hard" in the truest sense of the phrase. He is the first chair trombonist in the Biennial Philharmonic Orchestra. He is also proficient in the trumpet, saxophone and the tuba. But man o' man, you should really see him on the flugelhorn. Dude absolutely kills it.
LocStringValues.HURRIKALE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Hurrikales push back all zombies in their lane with a chilling wind that also slows them down.
LocStringValues.HURRIKALE_TOOLTIP: Blows a chilling wind that pushes back zombies in lane
LocStringValues.HYPNOSHROOM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Hypno-shroom has no trouble persuading zombies to fight on behalf of the plants. But he has yet to convince one to cluck like a chicken. "One day," he says. "One day."
LocStringValues.HYPNOSHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: When zombies eat Hypno-shrooms, they will turn around and fight for you.
LocStringValues.HYPNOSHROOM_TOOLTIP: Hypnotizes a zombie that ate it
LocStringValues.ICEBURG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Don't get lost staring into Iceberg's adorably cute eyes. If you do, it will be your last step... but only if you're a zombie.
LocStringValues.ICEBURG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Iceberg Lettuces temporarily freeze a zombie when stepped on.
LocStringValues.ICEBURG_TOOLTIP: Freezes zombies that step on it & extinguishes flames
LocStringValues.IDENTITY_RECONCILIATION_INTRO_TEXT: We have detected multiple different identities associated with you. On the following screen please review the data with each identity and select which one you would like to proceed with.
LocStringValues.IDENTITY_RECONCILIATION_SAVE_FAILURE: Identity save has failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
LocStringValues.IDENTITY_RECONCILIATION_WARNING_TEXT: Are you sure you would like to proceed with this identity? This will be the permanent identity associated with you. All Arena Winstreak, Arena League, and Adventure progress will be lost on other identities.
LocStringValues.IMITATER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Having studied French Theater at Julienne, the Imitater went to the streets with his art, and has perfected his technique he calls "Potato stuck in a box."
LocStringValues.IMITATER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Imitaters let you use two of the same plant during a level by imitating them!
LocStringValues.IMITATER_PLANTFOOD: Performs Plant Food effect of the plant it's imitating.
LocStringValues.IMITATER_TOOLTIP: Lets you have two of the same plant
LocStringValues.INTENSIVECARROT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"How do I revive defeated plants?" asks Intensive Carrot. "In a word: vitamins. Vitamins and sorcery."
LocStringValues.INTENSIVECARROT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Intensive Carrots instantly bring eaten plants back to life.
LocStringValues.INTENSIVECARROT_TOOLTIP: Brings eaten plants back to life
LocStringValues.JACKOLANTERN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}tap for a flame burst that lasts 1s

{FLAVOR}"Boo! Mwah-ha-ha-haaaaah," opines Jack O' Lantern. Oh, yes. Things and stuff are scheduled to be seriously spooky when he's around. Count on it.
LocStringValues.JACKOLANTERN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Jack O' Lanterns spray fire down a lane, doing extensive burning damage over the whole lane.
LocStringValues.JACKOLANTERN_TOOLTIP: Charges powerful jets of flame over the whole lane
LocStringValues.JALAPENO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}This jalapeno is one spicy character by day and The Macrame Vigilante by night. You might be wondering what his secret weapon is... it's knots.
LocStringValues.JALAPENO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Jalapenos instantly destroy an entire lane of zombies.
LocStringValues.JALAPENO_TOOLTIP: Instantly destroys an entire lane of zombies
LocStringValues.KERNELPULT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}50% chance to fling butter that immobilizes zombies for 4s

{FLAVOR}While working as an usher at the local movieplex, he saw "Fried Green Tomatoes" and found his higher calling. He packed up his husks, his kernels, his butter, and enlisted.
LocStringValues.KERNELPULT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Kernel-pults fling corn kernels and occasionally butter at zombies.
LocStringValues.KERNELPULT_TOOLTIP: Flings corn kernels and occasionally butter at zombies
LocStringValues.KIWIBEAST_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}has full board range at stage 2 and 3x3 range at stage 3
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}knocks back zombies during growth

{FLAVOR}"I like to keep an even keel," says Kiwibeast. "But zombies... oooh... zombies make me so mad! And when I get mad... RARRRRRGGG!"
LocStringValues.KIWIBEAST_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Kiwibeasts smash the ground to emit damaging thumps, and become bigger and more powerful the more they are hurt by zombies.
LocStringValues.KIWIBEAST_TOOLTIP: Emit damaging thumps & becomes more powerful as it takes damage
LocStringValues.LASER_BEAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}After a laser eye surgery had gone horribly right, Laser Bean gained a sense of purpose and a new-found affinity for competitive staring contests.
LocStringValues.LASER_BEAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Laser Beans fire down a lane, hitting all zombies ahead of it.
LocStringValues.LASER_BEAN_TOOLTIP: Fires lasers through all zombies in a lane
LocStringValues.LAVAGUAVA_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}lava pool lasts 50s, doing 50 damage per second
 
{FLAVOR}Lava Guava frowns with barely-repressed rage. He's trying to keep it in check. He's trying so hard. But one day some zombie's going to push him too far, and he can't be held responsible for the consequences.
LocStringValues.LAVAGUAVA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Lava Guavas erupt when a zombie approaches, damaging nearby zombies and creating a lava pool that incinerates zombies in its tile.
LocStringValues.LAVAGUAVA_TOOLTIP: Erupts and leaves behind a burning lava pool
LocStringValues.LEAVE_DANGER_ROOM_GAME: Do you want to return to the world map? Leaving will count as a loss and you will need to restart this level.
LocStringValues.LEAVE_GAME_BODY:
Are you sure you want to exit the level?
Doing so will lose your current progress in this level.
LocStringValues.LEVEL_OF_THE_DAY_NOT_ACCESSIBLE: You must complete Ancient Egypt - Day 5 before you can start the event.
LocStringValues.LIGHTNINGREED_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}This may come as a shock, but Lightning Reed has a serious passion for ham radio. His call sign is El3ctric H1ccup. You can tune in every Tuesday to hear him read the classics to elderly plants. This week: Seeds and Sensibility.
LocStringValues.LIGHTNINGREED_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Lightning Reeds shoot lightning at the nearest zombie, even on adjacent lanes. The bolt will then arc and hit other zombies.
LocStringValues.LILYPAD_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Not many people know this, but Lily Pad absolutely loves square dancing. There he is, a circular plant gliding across the dance floor making squares. He loves how it pushes his boundaries and really makes him think outside the sphere.
LocStringValues.LILYPAD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Lily Pads let you plant non-aquatic plants on top of them.
LocStringValues.LILYPAD_TOOLTIP: Lets you plant non-aquatic plants on top of it
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ALMOST_02: {ZOMBIE} thinks you're scared! Show 'em you've got what it takes!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ALMOST_03: {ZOMBIE} wants a chance to eat yer brainz, come show 'em who's the boss!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_FULL_RIFT_FUEL_REFRESH: Your Penny Pursuit Fuel has refreshed!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_BIRTHDAY_1: Day 3 of Birthdayz Party is on! Play now and take a bite out of Birthday Cake Pharoah.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_BIRTHDAY_2: Play day 4 of the Birthdayz Party event right now for zombies jet-packed with presents!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_BIRTHDAY_3: Gargantuar has crashed today's Birthdayz Party. Play now to wrap him up!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_1: Feastivus Day 2 is on! Do I hear reindeer on the lawn? Play now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_10: It's beginning to look a lot like the end of Feastivus. Only a few days left. Play now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_11: It's the final day of Feastivus! Fa-la-la-la-last chance!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_2: Get double Snowballs when you win a power up in Feastivus. Snowball fight is on!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_3: Win Snow Pea's winter hat collection. Keep your brains warm. Feastivus is on!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_4: Try out Sap-fling in Feastivus today. Stickier than fruitcake! Play now.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_5: Win 5 in a row and get special Feastivus rewards from Senior Pinata. He loves a good holiday bash!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_6: Day 11 of Feastivus is on. The Imps have been hung by the Gargantuars with care. Don't miss out!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_7: Sap-fling is back for Day 12 of Feastivus. Pinecones, away!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_8: Play Feastivus and start off the New Year with a fresh brain!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_9: Feastivus is on! The holidays haven't stopped, and neither has Gargantuar in his ugly sweater. Play now.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_01: 24-hour zombie sneak attack! Battle zombies from all worlds in a special level for big prizes!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_02: 24-hour zombie party level is live! Complete {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} parties in a row and win bigger prizes.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_03: Pinata Party is now live! Frantic Zombie Mayhem from all worlds at once. Play now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_04: It's Pinata Party Time. Complete {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} parties in a row and meet Senor Pinata!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_05: It's 24 hours of Zombie Party Time! Your next Pinata Party is ready. Play now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_06: The latest Pinata Party is closing soon! Finish now to beat Senior Pinata.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_07: Just one more Pinata Party to get the {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL}-streak Senior Pinata! Ending soon.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_08: Hey, Pinata Party animal! Hurry on over for a shot at Senior Pinata. Ends soon.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_PARTY_ANIMAL: Pinata Party animal! Play now for a shot at Senior Pinata.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_PARTY_TIME: It's Pinata Party time. Win {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} in a row to meet Senior Pinata!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_PLAY_TODAY: Play today's Pinata Party to win big tomorrow!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_TODAY: Today's Pinata Party is on! Whack some zombies now.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_WIN_5: Win {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} Pinata Parties in a row for big prizes!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_WIN_PRIZES: Win PRIZES in a 24-hour battle with zombies from all worlds!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_WIN_TODAY: Win today's Pinata Party for {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} in a row!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEW_LEVEL_UNLOCKED: A new Penny Pursuit level has unlocked!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_DANGER_ROOM_01: You have a personal best of Level {LEVEL_NUMBER} in {DANGER_ROOM_NAME}. Think you can do it again?
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_DANGER_ROOM_02: You reached Level {LEVEL_NUMBER} in the {DANGER_ROOM_NAME}. The Zombies say you can't go higher. Prove 'em wrong.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_DANGER_ROOM_03: You're so close to your personal best of Level {LEVEL_NUMBER} in {DANGER_ROOM_NAME}. Can you make it?
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_DANGER_ROOM_04: The Zombies say you can't pass Level {LEVEL_NUMBER} in {DANGER_ROOM_NAME}. Silly Zombies. Go for it.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_JOUST_EVENT_REFRESH: The current tournament has ended, and a new one begins!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_JOUST_EVENT_SOON_REFRESH: The current tournament ends tomorrow! Last chance to compete!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_JOUST_FREE_PLAY_REFRESH: You have another Free Play in Arena mode!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_PINATA_HUNT_REFRESH: Your pinatas have refreshed! Replay levels to win World pinatas!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_RIFT_EVENT_REFRESH: The current Penny Pursuit event has ended, and a new one begins!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_RIFT_EVENT_SOON_REFRESH: The current Penny Pursuit event ends tomorrow! Last chance to earn awards!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_SEASON_SOON_REFRESH: The current season ends soon! Last chance for awards!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_SEASON_STARTED: A new season has begun! Compete for awards!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_QUEST_MAINLINE: Travel Log Update: Onward to {WORLD}! {QUEST_TITLE} to earn {XP_GRANTED} points.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_QUEST_METERED: Travel Log Update: You've defeated {DEFEATED_COUNT} brain-hungry zombies! Only {DEFEATS_NEEDED} left to complete the Quest.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_QUEST_NEAR_LEVELING: Travel Log Update: You're almost there! Earn {XP_NEEDED} points and level up to Rank {NEXT_RANK}.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_6D_01: Play Vasebreaker today! Those vases won't smash themselves.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_ENDLESS_CONTINUE: You're smashing it up in Vasebreaker! Play now to break your all-time zombie-wave record.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_ENDLESS_TRYAGAIN: Take another go at Vasebreaker! Stand up. Dust off your plants. The zombies are waiting.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_UNLOCK_BUTTERZOMB: Unlock the Butterizer! Defeat three Vasebreaker levels and all the butter is yours.
Take on the Vasebreaker again to unlock the mighty Butterizer!
Don't stop Vasebreaking now! One more level and Butterizer and its mighty butter are yours!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_UNLOCK_MOVEVASE: The zombies are coming in Vasebreaker! Defeat {ENDLESS_WAVE} waves to take control with the Vase Displacer!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_UNLOCK_REVEALVASE: See hidden zombies. Finish the Vasebreaker tutorial now and get X-Ray power!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_EMPTY_POT_1D_01: You have sprouts waiting in your Zen Garden. Plant them quick and add power to your game.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_EMPTY_POT_3D_01: You have unplanted sprouts in your Zen Garden. Grow 'em up right to give your plants a boost.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_1D_01: Your plants have grown. Collect your boosted plants in Zen Garden!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_1D_02: Your plants have grown! Visit your Zen Garden to collect heaps of coins.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_1D_03: Your plants have grown! Collect your boosted plants in Zen Garden!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_3D_01: It's getting dry in your Zen Garden. Water your plants now to get more BOOM in your blooms.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_3D_02: Water your Zen Garden now and get cool gifts. Don't let your happy plants go dry.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_3D_03: Your plants have grown! Collect your boosted plants in Zen Garden!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_BOOST_1D_: Your plants are sporting super powers! Visit Zen Garden to unleash them.
The plants in your Zen Garden have boosted!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_BOOST_3D_: Your plants are all grown up.  Visit your Zen Garden to pick up your boosts.
You have boosts waiting to be used!   Visit Zen Garden for buffed up buds.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_SINGLE_01: Your {PLANT} has grown! Water it again to give it super powers.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_SINGLE_02: Your {PLANT} has grown! Collect your boosted plants in Zen Garden!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_SINGLE_03: Your {PLANT} has grown! Water it again to boost its power.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_SINGLE_BOOST_: Your {PLANT} has grown to full size! Visit Zen Garden to pick up your super plant powers.
Your Marigold is fully grown! Visit your Zen Garden for an extra-big payout.
Your Marigold just kicked out some serious coin!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_SINGLE_MARIGO: Your Marigold has grown! Water it again for an extra-big payout.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZOMBOSS_ESCAPING_SOON: Dr. Zomboss will escape soon. Defeat him for rewards!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT: What's in Treasure Yeti's lunchbox? Defeat him to find out!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_01: What's in Treasure Yeti's lunchbox? Defeat him to find out!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_02: Treasure Yeti won't give up without a fight. So fight him!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_03: Sometimes Treasure Yeti sneaks up on you. Like right now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_04: Treasure Yeti is loose! Defeat him now to win his riches.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_05: Fight for the awesome things in Treasure Yeti's lunchbox.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_06: Defeat the Treasure Yeti now to get what's in his lunchbox.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_07: Eat the Treasure Yeti's delicious lunch... of treasure!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_08: The Treasure Yeti thinks you're weak. Prove him wrong!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_09: Defeat the Treasure Yeti and take his lunchbox. Do it now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_10: There's only one way to get Treasure Yeti's riches. Fight!
LocStringValues.LOD_NEXT_TIME_SUBHEADER: Take some whacks at SENIOR PINATA by playing {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} consecutive parties.
LocStringValues.LOD_NEXT_TIME_SUBHEADER_DAYS: Play {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} days in a row to earn a Grand Prize!!
LocStringValues.LOD_NEXT_TIME_SUBHEADER_HEROES: Take some whacks at the Hero-Tron 5000 by playing 5 consecutive parties.
LocStringValues.LOD_NEXT_TIME_SUBHEADER_HOLIDAY: Get a giant present by playing {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} consecutive parties.
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_BIG_REWARD_SUBHEADER: Whack SENIOR PINATA x3 times to open the Mystery Treasure!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_BIG_REWARD_SUBHEADER_HEROES: Whack the Hero-Tron 5000 to open the Mystery Treasure!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_BIG_REWARD_SUBHEADER_HOLIDAY: Tap the giant present 3 times to open the Mystery Treasure!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_BIG_REWARD_SUBHEADER_SUMMERNIGH: Tap the fireworks box 3 times to open the Mystery Treasure!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_REWARDS_BIRTHDAYZ_FOOTER: Double coin rewards with every win!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_REWARDS_FOOTER_SUMMERNIGHTS: Summer Nights - Loads of coins with every win!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_REWARDS_SUBHEADER: TAP to open and find out what treasure lies inside.
LocStringValues.LOW_DISK_SPACE_WARNING: Your device is low on disk space. Your progress may not be saved.
LocStringValues.MAGNETSHROOM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Despite his unusual appearance, Magnet-shroom doesn't have a problem attracting girlfriends. But he does have a problem keeping them. It's the same thing every time. In the end, they always find him too clingy.
LocStringValues.MAGNETSHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Magnet-shrooms remove helmets and other metal objects from zombies around them.
LocStringValues.MAGNETSHROOM_TOOLTIP: Removes helmets and other metal objects from zombies
LocStringValues.MAGNIFYINGGRASS_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}tap to spend 50 sun for an attack

{FLAVOR}Magnifying Grass understands the inherent power of a rainbow. Beneath her stoic features she takes great joy in delivering radiant multicolored destruction to the zombie horde.
LocStringValues.MAGNIFYINGGRASS_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Magnifying Grass turns sun into a bolt of colorful damage.
LocStringValues.MAGNIFYINGGRASS_TOOLTIP: Charges a powerful shot for 50 sun
LocStringValues.MAINMENU_DELETE_PROFILE_BODY: If you DELETE this profile you will lose all game play data associated with this profile including any purchased coins.
LocStringValues.MARIGOLD_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}while on the lawn, produces a silver coin every 15s

{FLAVOR}Marigold has dedicated herself to the Zen lifestyle. She's a team player, and gives it her best there in the garden. But if she never has to confront another zombie on the lawn again it will be too soon.
LocStringValues.MARIGOLD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marigolds give you coin rewards in Zen Garden.
LocStringValues.MARIGOLD_TOOLTIP: Gives you rewards in Zen Garden
LocStringValues.MELONPULT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"Everyone says my head looks like a melon," said the middle child of the Pult family, "and they would be right." Don't ask him if he's seedless or not though, it offends him and frankly it's none of your business.
LocStringValues.MELONPULT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Melon-pults do heavy damage to groups of zombies.
LocStringValues.MELONPULT_TOOLTIP: Does heavy damage to groups of zombies
LocStringValues.MINECART_TUTORIAL_1: Drag the mine cart to a new location
LocStringValues.MINECART_TUTORIAL_2: Great work! You can plant on empty mine carts
LocStringValues.MINT_AWARD_HEADER: You got {NUMBER} mints! Use mints to purchase and upgrade Power Mints!
LocStringValues.MISSILETOE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}tap to arm, tap on target tile to fire
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost

{FLAVOR}Other plants often make fun of her, because she doesn't really have any toes despite her name being "Missile Toe". THAT makes her a bit mad... so she took vengeance, in her own way - by hanging herself up as an ornament right above the door during last year's Christmas party. After mortifying several couples and a zombie, she was sure that others wouldn't mess with her again.
LocStringValues.MISSILETOE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Missile Toes launch cold blasts that damage and freeze zombies in an area upon impact.
LocStringValues.MOONFLOWER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Sun Production: {STAT}emits 25 sun at first as well as additional 10 sun for each Moonflower on its lane (max 65)
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}gets crushed when certain zombies appear on its lane

{FLAVOR}Moonflower is a fierce collaborator. She'll collaborate with anything. She'd collaborate with a table if she could.
LocStringValues.MOONFLOWER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Moonflowers radiate a glow that powers up Moonflowers on their lanes while avoiding being eaten.
LocStringValues.MOONFLOWER_TOOLTIP: Gives sun & powers other moonflowers in a lane; can't be eaten
LocStringValues.MULTIPLE_QUEST_ROLLUP_AWARD_DESCRIPTION: You've completed a pile of quests! Have a pile of rewards!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_1000452: {BRINGOUT_TACO}{SAY}{LONG}I've been holding onto this taco for forever!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_1000454: {EXCITED}I want to eat THAT taco again! I need my TIME MACHINE!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_1000455: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Her name is Penny and I'm Crazy Dave. But you can call me Crazy Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_1000456: {SAY:winnie}Finally, another User who can process my queries.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_1000457: {TIRED:winnie}Let me postulate, Dave wants to go back in time to eat his taco... again...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_1000458: {SAY:crazydave}She's so smart! Now let's go after my taco!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_3701: {TIRED}If only there was something that you could feed it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_3702: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Plant Food is packed with vitamins and minerals.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_3703: {PLAYFUL:winnie}It's an essential part of a complete breakfast.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_3800: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED}I wonder if Plant Food works on other types of plants?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_3900: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{TIRED}{LONG}Aww...you let your plant get eaten! Try again!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_4000: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}{LONG}I love the smell of coconut cannons in the morning!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_4100: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}{LONG}It appears the zombies have been gathered in that corral.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_4102: {SAY}{MEDIUM}Better plant something before they get loose.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_4200: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Oh good. There are no zombies here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_AILMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_AILMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_AILMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Ail-mint family includes fungi and poison plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_FIND_MORE_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Tap 'Find More' to see where you can find more seed packets for each plant.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_INTRO_2: {EXCITED}A place where you can read about plants and zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_UPGRADE_PEASHOOTER_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Take those seed packets you won and upgrade your Peashooter!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_UPGRADE_WALLNUT_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Looks like you can upgrade your Wallnut too!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_APPEASEMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie} Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_APPEASEMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_APPEASEMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Appease-mint family includes peas and other straight shooters.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ARMAMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ARMAMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ARMAMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Arma-mint Family comprises various lobbing and cannon plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_BANANA_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}User Dave. Please note the line of Banana Launchers.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_BANANA_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Let's get to it! After all, bananas are a very a-PEELING fruit!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_BANANA_4: {TIRED:winnie}User Dave, if I had a head, I would be shaking it right now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_BOWLING_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}My research indicates that the sport of bowling experienced a heyday during this era.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_BOWLING_2: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Are you thinking what I'm thinking, Penny?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_BOWLING_3: {TIRED:winnie}I find your thought process indecipherable, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_BOWLING_4: {SAY:winnie}I was thinking that Bowling Bulbs would make excellent allies here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_BOWLING_5: {SAY:crazydave}Huh. I was thinking how much I love wearing bowling shoes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_BOWLING_6: {EXCITED:crazydave}So many colors ... right there on my feet!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_CHOMPER_2: {PLAYFUL:winnie}...we need a plant with the appetite of a shark.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_CHOMPER_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}I catch your drift, Penny. You're talking about Chomper!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_CHOMPER_4: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. His sharp teeth could turn the tide of battle.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_CHOMPER_5: {EXCITED:crazydave}Hey, I have an idea too! We could call this Chomper Week!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_CHOMPER_6: {TIRED:winnie}If we must, User Dave. If we must.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_2: {SAY:crazydave}It's got everything a growing plant needs!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_4: {SAY:winnie}Caution, User Dave. My sensors indicate there are zombies on your beach...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_5: {SAY:winnie}... and far too much water. It will overwhelm the plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_6: {SAY:crazydave}No problem-o! We'll just lay down some Lily Pads.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_7: {EXCITED:crazydave}Then the other plants can ride the waves!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_8: {PLAYFUL:winnie}Or as the vernacular of this era goes: They can "hang ten."
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}Listen up, dudes! I'm here to totally bum you out.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_2: {SAY}Way down deep, there's a certain creep...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_3: {SAY}When he swims up, your brains he'll keep!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_6: {TIRED:winnie}He is also quite unpleasant, User Dave. Quite unpleasant.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_ALT_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}Dudes, like, you're totally in for it now!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_ALT_2: {SAY}The Deep Sea Gargantuars have their slimy sights on you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_ALT_4: {SAY}But you can't escape their scaly grip!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_ALT_6: {TIRED:winnie}He is also quite unpleasant, User Dave. Quite unpleasant.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GUACODILE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}I tell ya, Penny, these surf-loving zombies are the pits!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GUACODILE_3: {PLAYFUL:winnie}Hmmm. Pits. Very interesting. User Dave! You are a genius!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GUACODILE_5: {TIRED:winnie}No. No you are not. However, you have given me an idea.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GUACODILE_6: {EXCITED:winnie}Guacodile! This plant fights zombies with pit-like projectiles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GUACODILE_7: {SAY:winnie}And he employs a powerful bite as well.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_GUACODILE_8: {EXCITED:winnie}Plant him on the front lines. You'll see.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_HOMINGTHISTLE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}Whew! Fighting zombies that arrive in waves AND tides isn't easy.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_HOMINGTHISTLE_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}You know what we need, Penny? An ally with a lot of 'tude!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_HOMINGTHISTLE_3: {SAY:crazydave}And by 'tude, I mean attitude. In case you need translation.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_HOMINGTHISTLE_4: {SAY:winnie}Then I suggest we call upon Homing Thistle.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_HOMINGTHISTLE_5: {SAY:winnie}I believe he has this 'tude you speak of.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_HOMINGTHISTLE_6: {EXCITED:crazydave}His eyes! Intense! He can shoot the zombies a real mean look.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_HOMINGTHISTLE_7: {EXCITED:winnie}More importantly, he can shoot deadly darts that home in on their target.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_HOMINGTHISTLE_8: {EXCITED:crazydave}Two painful blows for the price of one! Radical!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_TIDES_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}User Dave, data suggests that we should beware the tides.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_TIDES_2: {SAY:crazydave}When the tide comes in, it'll be a WIPE OUT for our plant friends?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_TIDES_3: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. But the tide line indicates how high the water will rise. Plan accordingly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_TIDES_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}The tide comes in, the tide goes out. Who can explain it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Yo beach bums! Don't flip your lid.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}But have you noticed that Chomper and Bikini Zombie have been ultra cozy lately?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Could a beachside plant-zombie romance be in bloom?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_4: {SAY:zombossicon}Speaking of which, how sure are you of Chomper's loyalties?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_5: {SAY:zombossicon}I can't help but notice ... that plant has the appetite of a zombie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_6:
{SAY:zombossicon}Chew on that land lovers! Later dudes!
Dr. Zomboss
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_7: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}A plant-zombie romance? Penny ... my mind is BLOWN!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_8: {SAY:winnie}User Dave, do not jump to conclusions. I suggest something more productive.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Alert! I've detected a strange statue of surfing-era significance.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}Well lookie there! It's a tiki statue. With crazy eyes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_3: {SAY:winnie}Analysis indicates this tiki could inflict a terrifying challenge upon any who follow it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}So you're saying that a tiki torture awaits? Get it? A tiki TORCH-er?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_5:
{TIRED:winnie}User Dave, I must say, your pun is...
TORCH-er-ous.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SHOUT:crazydave}And I know a thing or two about craaaazy!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:winnie}I concur. I suspect Dr. Zomboss was attempting to sow seeds of discontent.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_4: {SAY:crazydave}From now on, we are the only ones sowing seeds around here!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_5: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_EXIT:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Totally bogus! Little do you know what I have in store for you!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_6: {SAY:zombossicon}The seeds of destruction have been planted! Brace yourselves for a wipe out!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_7: {SAY:zombossicon}But for now, I gotta split. Catch you dweebs later!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED:crazydaveicon}Look! It must be time to play Beach Zombie Bungo!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_ZOMBIENOTE_3: {SAY:crazydaveicon}You already won, Penny? Wow. You're good at this!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEGHOULED_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I am picking up a grid of plants, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEGHOULED_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}My scans suggest that they can be swapped to create matches of three.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEGHOULED_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}I saw a game like that once on my telephoney!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEGHOULED_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}You can use sun to upgrade the plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BLASTBERRYVINE_EQ_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Vines are special plants that can be planted on top of other plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BLASTBERRYVINE_EQ_2: {SAY:winnie}Plant Blastberry Vines on other plants for an offensive boost!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BOMBARDMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BOMBARDMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BOMBARDMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Bombard-mint Family is made up of explosive plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUFFZ01_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Some levels may have Buffz & Bruisez active.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUFFZ01_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}This means zombies can be weak, resistant, or immune to damage from certain plant families.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUFFZ01_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}This time, zombies are WEAK to plants in the Fila-mint family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUFFZ01_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Lightning Reeds will do a lot of damage.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUFFZ02_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Buffz & Bruisez can work the other way as well.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUFFZ02_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Zombies can resist damage from certain plant families.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUFFZ02_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}This time, zombies RESIST damage from plants in the Fila-mint family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUFFZ02_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Lightning Reeds will do less damage than normal.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUFFZ03_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}At the greatest extreme, Buffz & Bruisez can nullify a plant family completely.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUFFZ03_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}This time, zombies are IMMUNE to damage from plants in the Fila-mint family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUFFZ03_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Lightning Reeds will do no damage. Use them as blockers!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUY_PLANTFOOD_3: {SPECIAL4}Here neighbor, have some moola! Why? Because I'm CRAAAZY!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUY_POWERUPS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED}{LONG}If you want to use a Power Up, you can buy one with coins!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUY_POWERUPS_2: {LONG}Just tap on that doohickey down there and you're in business!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_CHALLENGE_BRANCH_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}Uh-oh, the road is forked. What do we do?!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_CHALLENGE_BRANCH_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Those are where you flex your brains with new plants and upgrades.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_CHALLENGE_BRANCH_INTRO_4: {TIRED:crazydaveicon}Brain busting? Very dangerous. You go first.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_CONCEALMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_CONCEALMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_CONCEALMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Conceal-mint family includes all the shadow plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_CONTAINMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_CONTAINMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_CONTAINMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Contain-mint Family includes stalling and slowing plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_26_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I say, Penny, old thing, tally ho! Pip-pip and such!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_26_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie} We are in the Wild West, User Dave. Not Victorian England.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_26_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}We are likely to encounter far more ferocious former frontiersmen, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_26_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}We will need upgraded plants to stake any claim.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_31_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}The rough terrain forbids the mowing of lawns.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_31_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Our battles shall be more fraught from here on.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_35_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Even as the West was wild, so is my fury even wilder!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_35_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Face me! Face me and the rebuilt and improved Zombot War Wagon!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_35_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}It was a stagecoach, it was a robot... it was Complete Cowboy CRAAAAY-ziness!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_35_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Our upgraded plants proved up to the task, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_35_OUTRO_3: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_EXIT:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}All my efforts... useless! I begin to seriously question my capacity to succeed!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_A_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}It's high noon, and waves of zombies about.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_A_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Time to show them who's got the fastest plants in time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_B_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}I could really go for a tub of fried chicken right now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_B_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:winnie}Well, they've let loose the birds of war, so you're in luck.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_MINIGAME_A_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Put on your bloomers and charge your reeds.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_MINIGAME_B_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED}That is a lot of mine carts.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_MINIGAME_B_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}I didn't know mine carts could do math!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_MINIGAME_C_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}My great grandpappy was a lawman around these parts.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_PRESET_B_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SPECIAL17}They're coming 'round the mountain for your brains!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_PRESET_C_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}I can't believe there were so many chickens.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_PRESET_C_3: {SAY:winnie}This will be remembered as the Great Chickening of 1850.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_CHALLENGE_PROTECTPLANTS: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}These levels can be tough nuts to crack.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}And I want to see the delicious creamy center.
{TIRED:winnie}The point is not to crack them.
{SAY:crazydave}It sounds like a stampede of pianos!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}You've got the fastest fingers in the West.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Agents are arriving to mark your brains as my property.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I don't want my brains all marked up.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_INTRO_LEVEL7_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}Like cow tipping, zombie tipping is best done from the side.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_INTRO_LEVEL7_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Trust me, do not try and tip a cow from behind!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}Have you considered that you are sharing in Crazy David's madness?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}There is no zombie outbreak threatening you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}You are not using plants to defend your home.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_4: {SAY:zombossicon}The zombies and I are normal people, simply trying to help you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}I bet you'll tell us there are no spoons, too!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NEW_OUTRO_LASTTLEVEL_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}User Dave, it's time to saddle up and leave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NEW_OUTRO_LASTTLEVEL_3: {EXCITED:winnie}Where do you think the future will take us?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NEW_OUTRO_LASTTLEVEL_5: {SAY:crazydave}We should take another look at my Time-Space Taco Map.
