LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}My Uncle Milo used to have one these, he called it a boom box.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}Actually, that's close enough. I'll allow it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_GARGANTUAR_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Maybe we can use that to unlock our minds.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_GARGANTUAR_2: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}I still have some cleaning to do.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_GARGANTUAR_3: {SAY:winnie}It would be better used gaining access to a World.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_GARGANTUAR_4: {TIRED:winnie}You know, for the greater good of...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_LASTTLEVEL_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}User Dave, it's time to saddle up and leave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_LASTTLEVEL_3: {EXCITED:winnie}Where do you think the future will take us?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_LASTTLEVEL_6: {SAY:crazydave}{SPECIAL15}Just remember. Tomorrow is always a taco...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_LASTTLEVEL_7: {SPECIAL16:crazydave}And a taco is what we find inside of all of us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}That's right! These plants versus you and your zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:crazydave}And we didn't even use any spoons...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_4: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}I admit you are correct in this regard.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_5: {SAY:zombossicon}We have no existential conflict over the nature of spoons.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}That looks like it could be all futurey.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_12: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}That Mr. Boss guy seems like a really nice fellow!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_13: {TIRED:winnieicon}We should be wary of that one User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_15: {EXCITED:winnieicon}Earning Stars will prepare you for Star Gates we find later!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_16: {SAY:winnieicon}Also, Endless Zones will keep you sharp for future trials.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_17: {SAY:crazydaveicon}{SPECIAL15}Just remember. Tomorrow is always a taco...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_18: {SPECIAL16:crazydave}And a taco is what we find inside of all of us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_2: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}I bet Future Dave has solved our taco paradox.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}I'm detecting a rush of tachyon particles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnieicon}Maybe Future Penny is trying to make contact.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_6: {SAY:zombossicon}The Future will be requesting your presence.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_8: {SAY:zombossicon}Upon entry, legal possession of your brains...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_INTRO_9: {SAY:zombossicon}Will be transferred to one Dr. Edgar Zomboss.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_WORLDMAP_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL}Let's get these plants to the watering hole.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}It appears brains are outlawed around here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTROWRAPUP_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}Nice pick, let's see how far you can get!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_BEACH_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Hi neighbor! Welcome to Endless Zone - High Tide!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_BEACH_2: {SAY:crazydave}The lawn is always flooded, so treat your Lily Pads well!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_BEACH_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Remember to lose at least one time so you get the right set of starting plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_COWBOY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to Endless Zone - Auto Sun!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_COWBOY_2: {SAY}More sun will drop over time, but you have no sun producers!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_COWBOY_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Remember to lose at least one time so you get the right set of starting plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DARK_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to Endless Zone - Classic Night!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DARK_2: {PLAYFUL}It's your Classic Endless Zone, but now sun will not fall at all!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DARK_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Remember to lose at least one time so you get the right set of starting plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DINO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Howdy, neighbor! Welcome to Endless Zone - Sun Headstart!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DINO_2: {PLAYFUL}You start with more sun, but watch out for more powerful hordes!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DINO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Remember to lose at least one time so you get the right set of starting plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_EGYPT_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to the Endless Zone - Classic II!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_EGYPT_2: {SAY}It's your perfect daytime battlefield, but a lot more intense!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_EGYPT_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Remember to lose at least one time so you get the right set of starting plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_EIGHTIES_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Howdy, neighbor! Welcome to the GREATEST HITS!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_EIGHTIES_2: {PLAYFUL}I hope you're ready for a righteously up-tempo experience!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_FUTURE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to Endless Zone - All Out!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_FUTURE_2: {PLAYFUL}You start with nearly all the plants, but the zombie hordes will be harder to fight!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_FUTURE_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Remember to lose at least one time so you get the right set of starting plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_ICEAGE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to the Icebound Battleground!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_ICEAGE_2: {SAY:crazydave}This place is cold as, uh, ICE ... not to mention chock full o' zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_ICEAGE_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Best bring some hot zombie-fightin' moves. And maybe a nice warm coat too.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_LOSTCITY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to Endless Zone - Classic!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_LOSTCITY_2: {PLAYFUL}It's your perfect daytime battleground across time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_LOSTCITY_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Remember to lose at least one time so you get the right set of starting plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_MODERN_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Howdy, neighbor! Welcome to Highway to the Danger Room!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_PIRATE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to Endless Zone - Quick Charge!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_PIRATE_2: {PLAYFUL}All plants recharge twice as fast, but you have no instants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_PIRATE_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Remember to lose at least one time so you get the right set of starting plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_LAWNMOWER_SUCCESS_: {SAY}Your Plant Food carries over to the next level!
{PLAYFUL}Now it's time to pick another plant!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_POWER_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}The Endless Zones are harder than usual!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_POWER_2: {SAY:winnie}Power Ups and Plant Food can only be purchased once per level.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_SUCCESS_3: {SAY}In the Endless Zones, your lawn mowers carry over to the next level!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_SUCCESS_5: {SAY}Your Plant Food carries over to the next level as well!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_SUCCESS_7: {PLAYFUL}Now it's time to pick another plant!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_TUTORIAL_3: {SAY}Now you get to pick one more.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_EVILPOTIONS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Warning! I've detected carafes containing chemical compounds of a malevolent makeup!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_EVILPOTIONS_2: {TIRED:crazydave}Can you translate that into Crazy Dave Talk for me?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_EVILPOTIONS_3: {TIRED:winnie}There are evil potions on the lawn!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_EVILPOTIONS_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}Evil medieval potions! They're the most dangerous kind...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_EVILPOTIONS_5: {EXCITED:crazydave}On account of having twice the evil!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_2: {TIRED:winnie}No one, User Dave. We have simply arrived in the Dark Ages.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_4: {PLAYFUL:winnie}Indeed. According to my research, a plague has swept this era.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_5: {SAY:winnie}Also, sun no longer falls from the sky.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_6: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}What we need is someone to brighten this place up!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_8: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}These guys not only know how to turn a frown upside down...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_9: {EXCITED:crazydave}They make more sun as they grow! Great guys, very talented.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_FUMESHROOM_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}I'm afraid the Dark Ages are giving me a bad case of the vapours.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_FUMESHROOM_2: {SAY:winnie}User Dave, the vapours are no longer considered a real ailment.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_FUMESHROOM_3: {SAY:winnie}But I believe Fume-shroom will be of use here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_FUMESHROOM_4: {EXCITED:winnie}His vapors are quite real and provide a distinct advantage against the right zombie opponents.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_FUMESHROOM_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Fume-tastic! Let's give the zombies a case of the vapours instead!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_2: {SAY:zombossicon}It is my fervent medical opinion that your humours are out of balance!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Methinks the siphoning of thine brains is the only way to correct this ailment!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Hey! I prefer my humors and my brains unbalanced!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_HYPNOSHROOM_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}Data suggests the Dark Ages were a time of intellectual decline and moral  confusion.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_HYPNOSHROOM_2: {PLAYFUL:winnie}Perhaps now is a good time to call upon the persuasive powers of the Hypno-shroom?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_HYPNOSHROOM_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Good idea, Penny! We'll convert the wicked Dark Ages style!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_HYPNOSHROOM_4: {SAY:crazydave}Deploy this shroom and the zombies won't know what bit them...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_HYPNOSHROOM_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Until they see that it was their fellow zombies! Then, mind BLOWN!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_MAGNETSHROOM_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}According to my data, iron and other metals were routinely put to use during the Dark Ages.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_MAGNETSHROOM_2: {EXCITED:winnie}Thus, Magnet-shroom should make an excellent ally here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_MAGNETSHROOM_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}He can pull buckets, helmets and other metal objects off of zombies!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_MAGNETSHROOM_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Some people think it's magic. But really, it's just physics.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_PEANUT_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Boy, Pea-shooter and Wall-nut sure are good at what they do.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_PEANUT_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}Talk about two great plants that fight great together!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_PEANUT_3: {EXCITED:winnie}User Dave! Perhaps you are not as cerebrally unsound as you periodically insist!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_PEANUT_4: {PLAYFUL:winnie}What if there was one plant that behaved like both a Pea-shooter AND a Wall-nut?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_PEANUT_6: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Two plant powers in one legume's body?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_PEANUT_7: {EXCITED:crazydave}Keep talkin' like that and people are going to call you Crazy Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_PEANUT_8: {SAY:crazydave}Which would be weird for both of us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}A question for you, my Ignoble Foes!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Hast thou noted how violent thine plants become upon consuming Plant Food?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Perchance, hast thou wondered what Plant Food is truly made of?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_4: {SAY:zombossicon}Verily, I shall tell thee. It's zombies! Plant food is made out of zombies!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Unpossible! We feed our plants only the highest quality organic uhm...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_6: {TIRED:crazydave}Hey Penny, what is Plant Food made of?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_7: {SAY:winnie}I fear the true nature of Plant Food requires further analysis, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_8: {TIRED:winnie}Excuse me while I run some tests.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Why would anyone go and stick a nice sword into a dirty ol' rock?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {TIRED:winnie}I understand it to be a test, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_3: {EXCITED:winnie}Only someone with great physical strength and strength of character may remove it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_4: {SAY:crazydave}I bet someone with a jackhammer could remove it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_6: {TIRED:winnie}An inelegant but no doubt effective solution to the test, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I have found no evidence that Plant Food contains zombies or zombie byproducts.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {TIRED:crazydave}Phew! Plants shouldn't eat zombies who eat plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Except Chomper. He has to. Dude needs the fiber.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_4: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_EXIT:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Why dost thine time-traveling jalopy lie to thee?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_5: {SAY:zombossicon}Perchance, a question best left for another day?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_6: {SAY:zombossicon}Now, I pray, imagine maniacal laughter as I depart.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY:winnieicon}User Dave, we have encountered a scroll.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_ZOMBIENOTE_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED:crazydaveicon}I love side-scrollers! They're my second favorite kind of game.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_ZOMBIENOTE_3: {SAY:winnieicon}This is not a game. It's a piece of parchment bearing a message.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DARK_ZOMBIENOTE_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Will ya look at that! It's Dark Ages email. Neat-o!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_15_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}A meteorite. Curious. My records indicate this should be... bigger.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_15_OUTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}More like super Seattle-sized. I hope history has not gone awry...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_16_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Surrender your brains forthwith, inane time stumblers!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_16_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Else you shall share the fate of these terrible thunder lizards: EXTINCTION!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_16_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}But I don't want to get extincted!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_17_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}I just always wanted a primitive sunflower who gave big suns!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Alert, User Dave. My sensors indicate we have moved 153,954,765 years into the past.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_1_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}Yabbers! That's before I was even born!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Correct. We seem to have landed in some form of Jurassic Marsh.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_21_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Beware the Jurassic Bully zombies, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_21_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They are immune to the Primal Peashooter's knockback effect.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_21_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Zuh? But how? Even Gargantuars get knocked back!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_21_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}True, User Dave. The Bully is simply too stupid to observe typical physics.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_23_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I detect Primal Potato Mines nearby, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_23_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Their prepaleolithic potency will far exceed our more refined modern versions.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}This epoch is known for its unusual lifeforms, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_2_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I was thinking more in terms of saurians, User Dave. Dinosaurs.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}They won't attack us directly and we can't affect them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_2_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}However, they will definitely react to zombies. Be wary!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_33_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Hey! The past is still just when we left it!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_33_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}True, with differences. More Jurassic zombies have appeared, with amplified abilities.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_33_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Our plants may need to be upgraded to provide sufficient protection.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_34_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Time fluxes interfere with mowing technology, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_34_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We must plant with additional care lest we be overrun.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_42_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Bah! Your infernal interference enrages me! Bah!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_42_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon} The Zombot Dinotronic Mechasaur, 2nd Edition, shall end your travels permanently!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_42_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}We did it! Thanks, occasionally helpful dinosaurs!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_42_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Our upgraded plants proved invaluable as well, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_42_OUTRO_3: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_EXIT:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Arrg! How could a robot dinosaur fail? MY PLAN WAS FOOLPROOF.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I can feel the ground a-trembling, Penny! More dinos?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_6_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. A herd of stegosaurs approaches.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_6_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}My sensors indicate they will snare zombies with their tail, and then flick them off.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_8_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I have analyzed a new plant, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_8_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}The Perfume-shroom charms dinosaurs and turns them against the zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_8_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Dino-sour power? On OUR side? This is taco-level great news!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Penny! I just remembered how much I love silent letters!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_9_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Coincidentally, User Dave, a flock of Pterodactyls is approaching.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Is there nowhen I may go to avoid your imbecilic interference?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Stay right where you are. I have an enormous rock scheduled to make your acquaintance.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I see a toenail! Of unusual size!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}This raptor claw bespeaks an ancient arena of dinosaurian dimensions, User Dave!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I detect an incoming meteor, User Dave
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:winnie}I advise immediate egress from this timezone.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Bye-bye, dinos! You'll be birdies in no time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_4: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_EXIT:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}Bah! You leave me no choice but to enact... Project Paradox!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_26_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}The time fissure is strengthening zombies from all epochs, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_26_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We should expect more powerful versions of some zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_26_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}We may need to retreat to another timeline and return when our plants are stronger.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_31_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}The timeline is exhibiting instabilities, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_31_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Fixed-loop paradoxes are forbidding the presence of lawnmowers.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_35_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Once more we meet in the sands of time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_35_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Have you enjoyed my new and improved zombies?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_35_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Or should I say ancient and improved?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_35_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}Bah! They are nothing to my Zombot Sphinxinator 2.0!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_35_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}We may travel to other timelines freely, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_35_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}But I detect further timeline expansions in the future.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_BLOOMERANG_LEVELUP_INTRO: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Indeed they do, User Dave. But they are not.
{SAY:winnie}The lower Bloomerang is at MAX LEVEL.
{SAY:winnie}Oh, and no need for sun. Plants are coming special delivery!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_CONVEYOR_INTRO: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}No need for sun.  Plants are coming via special delivery.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_CONVEYOR_OUTRO: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}Awesome! I've always wanted to eat one of those.
{SAY:crazydave}Wait... that's not a starfish. It's an actual star.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_A_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}This will be the first last stand. There will be more lasts to come.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_B_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}I love sitting, but now is not the time! Let's get crazy.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_C_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}I hope that pharaohs had some heirs.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_C_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}I guess that was their last stand too.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_MINIGAME_A_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}There's a brand new symbol to match. It's a bucket.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_MINIGAME_B_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED}Match the symbols and win a prize!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_PRESET_A_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}This level is a locked coordinate in time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_PRESET_A_2: {EXCITED:winnie}You must take these plants to win.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_PRESET_B_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}Can't we build a modern fence to stop these ancient zombies?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_PRESET_B_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Who needs fences when you have offense?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_CHALLENGE_PROTECTPLANTS_: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED}There's a plant call on the banana phone. It's an S.O.S.!
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}They'll be sitting plants if we don't help. Let's take that root and save them!
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}My sensors have detected plants in danger.
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}There's too many tombs. Let's clear them out.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SHOUT:crazydave}I'm hyperventilating I'm so excited right now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_2: {SAY:winnie}Please wait 4500 years for your taco to be ready... more or less.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_4: {PLAYFUL}I'm sure my taco is around here somewhere, but in the meantime...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_2: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}Special couriers have been dispatched to retrieve your brains.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Please have your release forms signed before their arrival.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Cool, that Mr. Boss guy wants your autograph!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_INTRO_LASTLEVEL_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SPECIAL7}Whoa... this world goes to eleven! That's crazy!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}Have you ever wondered why your neighbor David hungers so?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}What secret ingredient in the taco would drive his desire?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Could it be that he needs your brains as much as we do?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Wha-?! No way. I would never eat a brain taco!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_5: {TIRED:crazydave}But, I don't remember what was in it...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Though tetrahedrons are pyramids, this one is not a Platonic solid.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}I'm so hungry, I would love a Platonic solid.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_3: {TIRED:winnie}User Dave, this is also not a taco salad.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_GARGANTUAR_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}It looks like a courier had his own delivery to make!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_GARGANTUAR_2: {EXCITED:winnie}These will be useful for traveling to other times.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_GARGANTUAR_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Yeah! Time to try the Taco Map!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_LASTTLEVEL_4: {TIRED:winnie}User Dave has been waiting to use that joke since we got here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_LASTTLEVEL_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Do you know what's better than a wrap? A Taco. Let's go!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {TIRED:crazydave}There was never any meat in that taco.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}I still have Tofunky in my beard to prove it!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_4: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Well, that just leaves more brains for us... later.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_5: {SAY:zombossicon}I'll find you again, in another where and another when!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_STAR_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}Look! Now there's a star on the time-space map!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_STAR_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Stars appear on the map where you earned them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_STAR_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:winnieicon}Stars could help us get back to the year 2009 and your taco.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_STAR_INTRO_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Well let's get going and find some more!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_STAR_INTRO_OLD_4: {TIRED:winnieicon}Empty stars show where you can go to earn stars.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_WORLDMAP_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}Now this looks like the map to my taco!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_WORLDMAP_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}To be precise this is a world map where we can find plants that can help us and...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_WORLDMAP_INTRO_4: {TIRED:winnieicon}User Dave, there are more important things at hand than...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_WORLDMAP_INTRO_OLD_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}Good news! Penny found a map to my taco!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_WORLDMAP_INTRO_OLD_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}No, that is a time-space map to the plants that can help us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}My Google translator indicates the zombies have a plan.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_15_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Somebody passed me a note in homeroom, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_15_OUTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}It says to meet behind the bike racks at lunchtime for a funderful surprise!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_15_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I believe some skepticism about this note is in order, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_16_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Do you feel that you have grooved? Did you bang your head? Have you "dug it"?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_16_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Now the party is over! Melt before the musical might of my majestic Hair Metal Gargantuar!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_16_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I'm scared, Penny! It's two minutes to midnight!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_16_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Be brave, User Dave. We'll jilt this ditty... on rock and roll!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_17_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Mmm! Penny, do you smell something scrum-dicious?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Flashback! I remember this decor from when I chased squirbos as a kid!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. We appear to have arrived in the midst of a Neon Mixtape Tour.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I suspect the musical tempo may affect the zombies' speeds.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_1_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}I'm feeding the rhythm, I'M FEEDING THE RHYTHM!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_22_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Spore-shrooms have a unique ability, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_22_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}If they defeat a zombie, a new Spore-shroom will spawn where that zombie fell.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_26_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Say, Penny, do you think Intensive Carrots can be used to revive defeated plants?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_26_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Sorry. It just confuses me when you pay attention.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I believe special zombies may display unique abilities while their preferred music is playing.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_2_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}You mean they'll jam their jam when their jam is jamming?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Yes, correct, yes, and yes, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_32_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Hmmmm... you're in danger above. You're a fool; and so knew I!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_32_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Hear me now: Ever shall you give up; ever shall you be down; always you'll run aground, I'll revert you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_32_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}I intend to make you cry; I mean for you to say goodbye; I'm not really that nice a guy - I alert you!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_32_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}Yarbs! That was close... with so many exciting timing and rhythm changes!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_32_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I fear we have only hit pause on Dr. Zomboss's heinous deal.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_32_OUTRO_3: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_EXIT:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}Indeed, next verse, same and yet worse! I go now to when you cannot imagine!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I got a real Cactus feeling about this, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, Cactus has changed over time, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_3_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Now she fires a thorn for ranged damage, but hides for ground damage when zombies approach.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_3_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}That's so Cactus... always varying her attack and defensive profiles!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY: {SAY:crazydave}Karaoke time! At last my tangerine dreams will come true!
{SAY:winnie}Caution, User Dave. This dropped mic promises a banned battle of heavy petal proportions!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ELDER_ALMANAC_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}Let's go to the dandy-handy Almanac to upgrade a plant!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ELDER_ALMANAC_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Visit the Almanac to upgrade your plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ELDER_QUEST_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}Travel Log's got some kinda new thing! Check it out!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EMPOWERMINT_LEVELUP_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints can be leveled up with mints you earn from Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EMPOWERMINT_LEVELUP_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Leveled up Power Mints last longer, have more powerful effects, and can be planted more often.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ENCHANTMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ENCHANTMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ENCHANTMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Enchant-mint family is made up of magic plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ENFORCEMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ENFORCEMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ENFORCEMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Enforce-mint family includes short-range, high-damage melee plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ENLIGHTENMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ENLIGHTENMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ENLIGHTENMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Enlighten-mint Family is made up of sun-producing plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ENLIGHTENMINT_LEVELUP_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Enlighten-mint can be leveled up with Season Award seed packets.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ENLIGHTENMINT_LEVELUP_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}A leveled up Enlighten-mint lasts longer, produces more sun, and can be planted more often.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ESCAPEROOT_LOD_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Tap the Escape Root, then tap another plant, to make them switch places.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ESCAPEROOT_LOD_2: {SAY:winnie}Escape Root explodes when a zombie gets close.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EVENT_BEGHOULED_BEYOND_001_INT: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The Kiwibeast becomes larger and more powerful the more damage it takes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EVENT_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:winnie}There are 5 levels that you have one chance to beat in a row.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EVENT_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}Each level is very challenging, but zombies will drop more coins than usual.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EVENT_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnie}Once you start, you cannot restart. You also forfait if you quit!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EVENT_INTRO_5: {EXCITED:winnie}Make this one chance count. Good luck!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FILAMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FILAMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FILAMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Fila-mint Family is made up of electric plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FILAMINT_INTRO_4: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Sorry I'm late, what did I miss? Mint sauce?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_26_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}The future's not what it used to be! There's more of it!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_26_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I believe zombies may be drawing strength from the time fissure, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_26_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We will likely encounter more powerful versions of select zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_26_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}We may need to retreat to another timeline and return when our plants are stronger.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_31_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Hey! Our futuristic lawnmowers are in the past!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_31_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I detect Dr. Zomboss' hand in this, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_31_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Either way, things just got 108% craaaaaazier around here!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_35_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}The future is as we have made it!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_35_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}The rise of the fallen, the life of death!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_35_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Is it over? Has it started? I can never tell with these time-gummy-nummers!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_35_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}We have survived this futuristic gauntlet, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_35_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Though I suspect our challenges are not complete.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_A_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I like to save some sun for a rainy day.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_A_2: {TIRED:winnie}It can get you out of a pickle or into an E.M.Peach.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_CHALLENGE_PRESET_A_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}You can pick your friends, but you can't pick these plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_CHALLENGE_PRESET_A_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}But some of my best friends are plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_CHALLENGE_PRESET_B_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{TIRED}Looks like we don't have much firepower here Penny.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_CHALLENGE_PRESET_B_3: {EXCITED:winnie}Magnifying Grass can pack quite the punch.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_CHALLENGE_PROTECTPLANTS: {EXCITED:crazydave}It takes a lot of pulp to stand your ground like that.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_CHALLENGE_SUNBOMBS_A_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{TIRED}You know how sometimes suns are bombs?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}The Future! Weird, I thought I would be hungrier.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}After all I haven't eaten in 4000 years!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_4: {SAY:crazydave}Hey, what happened to the lawn? It's so glowy!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_5: {SAY:winnie}I'm detecting an array of Power Tiles on the space-lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_2: {SAY:zombossicon}In this year your brains were collected ages ago.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Collect them again soon, Dr. Edgar Zomboss.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Watch out neighbor, I'm pretty sure he wasn't talking about my BRAINS!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_5: {PLAYFUL:winnie}I would say there's evidence to the contrary.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}Isn't it convenient that your neighbor is so helpful in your fight against us zombies?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Crazy David's apparent incompetence is only eclipsed by his usefulness.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}However, with one secret word my sleeper agent will turn against you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_6: {PLAYFUL}Can I borrow your brains? Um, I mean hot sauce!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_MAGNIFYING_GRASS_FAILUR: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Oops, you should give it another shot!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_MANUAL_MOWERS_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}You can decide to launch one mower early now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_MANUAL_MOWERS_2: {EXCITED:winnie}Just press and hold a mower when the time is right.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_MANUAL_MOWERS_3: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Sometimes that's the most strate-logical thing to do!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I spy with my crazy eye a U.F.B.! An unidentified flying brain!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}Something more formidable than a brain lies within.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}I want to eat THAT hypno-taco again! I need my TIME MACHINE!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {TIRED:crazydave}What? Wait a minute... what was I saying again?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}It says there's an error.  Can you come here and fix it Penny?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_ZOMBIENOTE_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}Did you try unplugging it and plugging it back in?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_001_INTRO_2: {SAY:greenshadow}The battle between plants and zombies has become SUPER-POWERED!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_001_INTRO_8: {SAY:greenshadow}Well, now you face the GREEN SHADOW!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_001_INTRO_9: {SAY:greenshadow}It's an epic clash between bloom and doom!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_002_INTRO_2: {SAY:greenshadow}Wear your Green Shadow costumes with pride!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_003_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:solarflare}{SAY:solarflare}Hi! Good ol' SOLAR FLARE here! Let's get sunny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_003_INTRO_2: {SAY:solarflare}We're gonna see some great costumes today!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_003_INTRO_4: {SAY:solarflare}Uh-oh! Time to light up this bozo!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_004_INTRO_3: {SAY:solarflare}Though I gotta say... I love those flashy duds!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_008_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:solarflare}{SAY:solarflare}When the Hero-Tron 500 exploded, it turned plants and zombies into Heroes... and made a big mess!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_008_INTRO_3: {SAY:solarflare}I won't be charmed by your suave charms!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_010_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:greenshadow}{NPC_ENTER:superbrainz}{SAY:greenshadow}I knew we'd meet again, Super Brainz!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_010_INTRO_3: {SAY:greenshadow}Yes, I already... You know what? Forget it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_011_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:greenshadow}{NPC_ENTER:impfinity}{SAY:greenshadow}Where are the missing Hero-Tron 5000 parts, Impfinity?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_013_INTRO_2: {SAY:impfinity}We stole the Hero-Tron bits! Yep! Stuck em in my hat!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_014_INTRO_2: {SAY:solarflare}They just keep coming! They never stop!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_014_INTRO_4: {SAY:solarflare}And let's face it... their conversation is not illuminating!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_015_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:greenshadow}{SAY:greenshadow}Solar Flare! Did you find the Hero-Tron components?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_015_INTRO_12: {SAY:impfinity}...and check out Plants vs. Zombies HEROES!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HEROES_EVENT_015_INTRO_2: {NPC_EXIT:greenshadow}{NPC_ENTER:solarflare}{SAY:solarflare}Nope! Just lots of junk! How about you, Wall-Knight?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HOLLY_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}Tap Holly Barrier, then tap the target to launch barrier leaf.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HOLLY_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Launched attacks knock back zombies and leave prickly barriers in empty tiles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_HOLLY_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Holly Barrier can launch 3 barriers and also deals prickly damage to attacking zombies!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_CHARDGUARD_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}These Cave Zombies sure are hard headed.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_CHARDGUARD_2: {TIRED:crazydave}They just won't take "no brains" for an answer.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_CHARDGUARD_3: {PLAYFUL:winnie}According to my data, Neanderthal zombie skulls are 33.2 percent harder than other zombie skulls.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_CHARDGUARD_4: {SAY:winnie}I propose we deploy Chard Guard. He has a secret up his leaves.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_CHARDGUARD_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}You mean his ol' Knock 'Em Dead maneuver?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_CHARDGUARD_6: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}It'll knock those zombies back where they came from!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_CHARDGUARD_7: {TIRED:winnie}I guess it's not a secret any more, now is it User Dave?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIREPEASHOOTER_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}W-w-warning, User Dave! I am r-r-running l-l-low on antifreeze!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIREPEASHOOTER_2: {TIRED:winnie}If my systems f-f-f-freeeze up, we could be stuck here forever!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIREPEASHOOTER_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}It'll be a cold day in heck before I let that happen, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIREPEASHOOTER_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}She can apply heat to those zombies, and warm up nearby pals too!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Brrrrr. It's colder than a polar bear eating an ice pop!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_2: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. It appears we have arrived in the Frostbite Caves.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}We've traveled so far back in history ... we've arrived in PREhistory!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_4: {SAY:winnie}A historic moment indeed, User Dave. But more importantly...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_5: {EXCITED:winnie}My sensors indicate there is an ice floe on the lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_6: {SAY:winnie}Data suggests it will block both plants and zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_7: {EXCITED:winnie}Though I predict hungry zombies will find a way around it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_8: {SAY:crazydave}Don't worry. We'll plant wisely and stop those zombies COLD!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FLAMETHROWER_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}Global cooling is the pits. What we need is a heat wave!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FLAMETHROWER_2: {SAY:winnie}Agreed. Please note, I have now replaced the snowballs with fireballs.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FLAMETHROWER_3: {SAY:winnie}The Flamethrower power-up melts frost and damages zombies too.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FLAMETHROWER_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Neat-o! You know, they say revenge is a dish best served cold.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_FLAMETHROWER_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}But I say it's best served hot. Fiery hot! With extra hot sauce.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Me Zomboss. Me write you another threatening note.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_2: {SAY:zombossicon}You in trouble. Biiiiig trouble. Gargantuan trouble, in fact!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Sloth Gargantuar smash! Smash your tiny, shivering plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_4: {SAY:zombossicon}Sloth Gargantuar deliver prehistoric plague of Imps!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_6: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I postulate evolution will never come to that zombie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_7: {SAY:crazydave}Not in a million, billion, gazillion years.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_HURRIKALE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}My data suggests Hurrikale would be of great use here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_HURRIKALE_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}A blast of air from him, and the zombies will chill out and slow down!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_HURRIKALE_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}The guy's a real blow hard. And I mean that in the nicest way possible.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_ICEBLOCKS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Don't look now, Penny, but those plants have a bad case of freezer burn!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_ICEBLOCKS_2: {TIRED:winnie}It's the freezing winds from this time period. They've immobilized the plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_ICEBLOCKS_3: {EXCITED:winnie}I suggest we call on Hot Potato. She can melt those ice blocks.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_ICEBLOCKS_4: {SAY:crazydave}I'm warming up to the idea already!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_MINIGAME_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}It's too quiet. Where is everyone? I have a bad feeling about this.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_MINIGAME_2: {SAY:winnie}My sensors indicate there are zombies hiding under the ice.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_MINIGAME_3: {SAY:crazydave}I know this game! They call it Hide & Eat Brains.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_MINIGAME_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Time for a game of our own: I call it Whack-A-Zombie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_MINIGAME_5: {SAY:winnie}Whack them good and they will surely drop better hammers.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_MINIGAME_6: {SAY:crazydave}I'm sorry. Can't help it. Have to say it. It's ... hammer time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_PEPPERPULT_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}I'm starting to get cold feet about this place.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_PEPPERPULT_2: {SAY:crazydave}Also, my feet are getting really cold.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_PEPPERPULT_3: {PLAYFUL:winnie}Time to turn up the heat. I recommend Pepper-pult for the job.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_PEPPERPULT_4: {SAY:winnie}He lobs hot peppers at zombies and also keeps nearby plants warm.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_PEPPERPULT_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Let's pick a peck of Pepper-pults! It's the perfect plant for our predicament!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_PEPPERPULT_6: {TIRED:winnie}Must you rhyme, User Dave? Must you?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_STUNION_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}I wish these prehistoric zombies would just go back to their caves.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_STUNION_2: {EXCITED:winnie}User Dave, perhaps it's time to try a new tactic.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_STUNION_3: {SAY:winnie}Data suggests Stunion would make for a ... potent ... ally here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_STUNION_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Great idea, Penny! That guy's breath is stunning!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_STUNION_5: {SAY:crazydave}Not even exaggerating. He stuns zombies ... with his bad breath.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_XSHOT_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Penny, what we need right now is a nice hot cup o' cocoa!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_XSHOT_2: {SAY:winnie}User Dave, that is an unproven zombie-fighting weapon.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_XSHOT_3: {SAY:winnie}I recommend we call on Rotobaga instead.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_XSHOT_4: {EXCITED:winnie}She can hover above ground AND shoot at zombies in four directions!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_XSHOT_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Kid's got talent! Maybe she knows how to make hot cocoa too?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Gurrreetings! Dr. Zomboss have prehistoric question for pitiful plant friends.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Why you hunt for taco? Is taco all it cracked up to be?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Could it be ... trap? Could it be ... trick?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_6: {TIRED:winnie}User Dave, ignore the taco. Ignore the taunts.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED: winnie}User Dave, I've detected an incoming ice cube.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_3: {SAY:winnie}Analysis suggests this creepy cube unlocks a chilly challenge.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}You know what I say? Brrrrr-ing it on!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Well done. We have defeated Dr. Zomboss.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}And his attempt to make me question my taco!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_4: {SAY:winnie}You know that it is about more than just a taco.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_5: {TIRED:crazydave}I suppose you're right, Penny. It's also about-
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_7: {SAY:zombossicon}Dr. Zomboss crawl back from brink of destruction!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_8: {SAY:zombossicon}Dr. Zomboss return when you no expect him. Bring BIG SURPRISE!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_9: {SAY:zombossicon}Dr. Zomboss stop speaking about self in third-person now! Guuudbye!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{TIRED:crazydaveicon}Penny, hath you ever tried licking an ice-thickle and got your tongue thtuck to it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_3: {SAY:crazydaveicon}Uh ... me neither. Thath would be craaaazthy.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_4: {SAY:winnieicon}Sigh. While your tongue heals, please note the strange stone tablet.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_5: {SAY:winnieicon}It appears to be a warning sign, written in Cave Zombie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_6: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Doesth it warn people not to lick ice-thickles?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_JACKOLANTERN_LOD_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Tap Jack O' Lantern for a burst of flame.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_JACKOLANTERN_LOD_2: {SAY:winnie}Tap and HOLD for an extended burst that does increasing damage!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_JOUST_UNLOCK_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY:winnieicon}User Dave. I have detected a new rift has opened. We are now able to access an "Arena."
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_JOUST_UNLOCK_2: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}Arena?! That sounds like an arborena of gardening warfare!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_JOUST_UNLOCK_3: {SAY:winnieicon}Arena will allow us to demonstrate our planting prowess for prestige and prizes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_JOUST_UNLOCK_4: {SAY:crazydaveicon}That's a lot of peas! That's how I know it's good.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LAWN_MOWERS_FILL_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:winnie}Whoa, mowers can chase down zombies and just keep going!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LAWN_MOWERS_FILL_2: {SAY:crazydave}Keep an eye out for mowers dropped by zombies, but in the meantime...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LAWN_MOWERS_FILL_3: {SAY:crazydave}Let me get your mowers back to fightin' form.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LAWN_MOWERS_FILL_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Don't worry, this one's on the house, or next to the house.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}You are truly amazing! Most deserving of the name... Senior Pinata!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_2: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Have you seen my taco Senior Pinata? It was about this big...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}That's it. Please disrupt this anomaly before User Dave gets too attached.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}User Dave, this does not look like a party.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}It could still be a surprise party, with gifts and everything!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}You'll see Penny, I think these zombies are different.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{EXCITED}There is an impending attack on your house in modern times!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}I bet it's not an attack... I bet it's a party! Oh, I hope it's a Pinata Party!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnieicon}It's not a party, there are zombies from all different time periods ready to strike!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnieicon}Who knows what else they could have brought with them?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Sounds like a party to me! Better hurry up, we don't want to miss out!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}The party is over for now, but those zombies will be back some day.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnieicon}Defending against multiple parties in a row could lead to a massive "pinata" anomaly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}I can't wait for the next Pinata Party, and the one after that!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydaveicon}But those pinatas just remind me of my sad lost taco. Let's go!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}Missing a "Pinata" Party will reset the build up to the massive "pinata" anomaly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnieicon}I won't pretend to understand why, but the data does not lie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}Just let us know of any more Pinata Parties you detect!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}For a party they can be pretty sneaky.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}What did I tell you Penny? A surprise Pinata Party!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}Does not compute. It appears a level 3 diagnostic check is in order.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Pinatas! Let's bust some open and see what we get!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_16_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Unfortunately for you, the Porter Gargantuars are about to ruin your day!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_16_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}They carry imps. Imps! Prepare to become ancient history!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_16_INTRO_4: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I wish someone would carry me around in a tiny house!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_16_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}I wish for a lot of things, User Dave. That is not one of them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_17_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie} Alert, User Dave! My sensors sense incoming Imp Porters.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_17_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Negative. They pitch tents on Gold Tiles, and the tents spawn zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}User Dave, this is no ordinary jungle. A scan of my records indicates that this is the fabled Lost City.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Historical texts state that the Sun was worshipped here. Resources should be plentiful.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}I suggest that we try planting on the Gold Tiles that we find here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}They should continuously generate sun as long as they have plants on them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_1_INTRO_6: {EXCITED:crazydave}Lost City? This is it Penny! We've found it!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_1_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}Where else would I find my lost taco, except in a Lost City?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_1_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}Your continued fixation defies all logic or reason, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_22_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Beware, User Dave! I detect trap tiles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_22_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They are triggered by zombies, or when you plant on them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_22_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}If you equate tacos with jets of flame and huge boulders, then yes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}My sensors indicate movement incoming from above.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_2_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}Maybe it's presents. Presents from the sky!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_2_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The chances of that statement being true are statistically irrelevant.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}I believe it to be a new form of zombie threat. We should be cautious of unexpected guests.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We are facing considerable threats, User Dave. I suggest that we retaliate with tremendous force.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_3_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}More forceful! That's it! We'll give them all a stern talking to.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_3_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I was referring to the Lava Guava. Its explosive blasts leave behind dangerous magma.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_3_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}That sounds even better! First a stern talking, then some lava!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_4_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Caution, User Dave. I detect a zombie with a shovel.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_4_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}It appears to block incoming shots. We need a way to get projectiles over the shovel.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon} Do not think to usurp our discovery of the fabled Lost City!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}I and my zombies have already submitted our find to the Eminent Journal of the Missing and the Mislaid!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}We will publish and you will PERISH!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY: {SAY:winnie}My sensors indicate this amulet points the way to a long-lost challenge.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}All that discovering and still no taco!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:winnie}The search will no doubt continue, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_EXIT:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}My discovery remains intact. The taco is still unfound. And your brains will certainly one day be mine!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Well lookie-here, Penny! It's a treasure map!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_ZOMBIENOTE_2: {SAY:winnie}My analysis suggests that the origins of that map are highly suspect.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_ZOMBIENOTE_3: {SAY:crazydave}It has a big red X on it, Penny. When have big red Xs ever been bad?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}Facebreaker is a blast from the past, right to your face!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}In that case, it must be right to your vase!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MISSILETOE_LOD_1: {NPC_ENTER:Winnie}{SAY:Winnie}Tap Missile Toe to arm her, then tap the target to fire.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have picked up a Shadow-shroom seed packet, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie} Shadow-shrooms are shadow plants, so be sure to plant them next to Moonflowers for bonus effects.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_15_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}No, User Dave! You must not! I detect high levels of trappiness!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_16_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Fools! You have fallen into my excruciatingly obvious trap!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_16_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon} My vast and varied array of Gargantuars will pummel you into total oblivion!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_17_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The Dusk Lobber is yet another shadow plant, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_17_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}On its own, it lobs exploding projectiles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_17_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}In its powered state, however, it lobs down three lanes!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_17_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}That's a lane for each of my thumbs and noses!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_19_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Escape Root is a tricky plant, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_19_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}When threatened, it swaps in an explosive plant!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_19_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}And if you tap it, and then another plant, they will switch places!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_19_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}You can use Escape Roots to rescue endangered plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_19_INTRO_5: {EXCITED:crazydave}Whaaaaa-? Plants can be in-dangered? CALL THE POLICE!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We have arrived moments before our departure!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}If my guess is correct, Dr. Zomboss will attempt to prevent your initial taco-consumption!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_1_INTRO_7: {EXCITED:crazydave}...OOOOOOOO! Sorry, I was busy screaming "No." Did you say "taco"?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_1_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}We must beware, User Dave. Dr. Zomboss will surely deploy all his time-varied zombies against us!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_21_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They tackle and destroy the first plant they encounter!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_22_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Oy howdy! I think it's one of those Beghouled-y grids again, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_23_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The Grimrose is a shadow plant, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_23_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}It drags down a zombie that enters its lane.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_23_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}When powered, it can dispose of three zombies before it expires.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_23_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}That just seems like it's trying too hard!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_24_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Engage caution, User Dave. I detect Super-fan Imps ahead!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The Moonflower emits sun, User Dave. But that is not all.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}My scans show that it creates a special glow that augments plants of its type.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_2_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Planting Moonflowers next to each other should increase their power.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}I suspect they will have the same effect on any other shadow plants we may find.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_32_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}It is presently a moment of your apocalypse!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_32_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Your reckless pursuit of an already-eaten taco has shattered all of time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_32_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}It falls to me to restore future, now, and past!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_32_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Has our quest ruptured the timestream itself?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_32_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}Allow me to address your concern thusly:
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_32_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}Fools! Do you not value the validity of time?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_32_OUTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Care you not if one moment follows another?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_32_OUTRO_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie} {EXCITED:crazydave}It's not a pot, it's a handled basin!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_32_OUTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}I am concerned, User Dave. What if he speaks true?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_32_OUTRO_6: {EXCITED:crazydave}I'm too taco-addled to care, Penny! FORWARD!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_33_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}I beseech you, time-zippers, you must listen to reason!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_33_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Stuff is all jiggy and super wacked-out, like!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_33_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}I am telling the truth, Insane Dave Person!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_33_OUTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}My words are utterly not an attempt to trick you!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_33_OUTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}You cannot re-eat a taco! It is impossible!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_33_OUTRO_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Imp-possible? I HATE IMPS! WITH A PASSION!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_34_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}If you will not listen, then you will be destroyed!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_34_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}David, I implore you! You must give up your hopeless dream of a long-ago taco!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_34_OUTRO_10: {EXCITED:crazydave}THIS IS THE GREATEST DAY IN MY OR ANYBODY ELSE'S LIFE!!!!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_34_OUTRO_11: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, perhaps we have misjudged Dr. Zomboss all this time...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_34_OUTRO_12: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_EXIT:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon} {SAY:zombossicon}Ha ha ha! Perhaps you HAVE misjudged me. Or... perhaps not!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_34_OUTRO_13: {SAY:zombossicon}I surely have no devious plans for the future! Or... do I?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_34_OUTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}It is gone, gone forever! But please, in its place, take this!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_34_OUTRO_8: {SPECIAL2}{EXCITED:crazydave}A TACO WITH A WAFFLE IN IT!!!!!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_34_OUTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}I detect high levels of deliciousness, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_35_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}But do I smell more zombies ahead?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_35_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Tacos-With-Waffles-In-Them or not, zombies still want brains.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_35_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Stay on the lookout for stronger versions of zombies we've seen.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The Shrinking Violet is well named, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}It shrinks zombies and makes them weaker.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_3_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Tiny zombies! Stay away from my shins!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_40_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. Perhaps this is a consequence of Dr. Zomboss' Project Paradox.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_40_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We likely will not be able to rely on them going forward.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_40_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}But I need them for squirbo hunting!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_44_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}Did you enjoy your augmented taco, David?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_44_INTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}Surely then you shall appreciate my augmented zombies in equal measure!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_44_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I think we survived, Penny! Can you check?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_44_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Scanning... I calculate 98% chance of survival with 3% margin of error.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_44_OUTRO_4: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_EXIT:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Curses! It appears that further zombie game-upping shall be required!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The Nightshade is another shadow plant, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}By itself it deals slapping damage to zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_5_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}But if it is planted next a Moonflower, both will become more powerful.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_8_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I am picking up a grid of plants, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_8_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}My scans suggest that they can be swapped to create matches of three.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_8_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}I saw a game like that once on my telephoney!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}My sensors are picking up increased helium levels, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_9_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I suspect we may be facing one or more Balloon Zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_9_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}I hate one or more Balloon Zombies!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Penny! A random length of sewer pipe!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}Be careful, User Dave. That pipe is part of a municipal mulch of endless engagement!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MORE_LEVELS_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}There's still more levels in open worlds.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MORE_LEVELS_2: {EXCITED:winnieicon}And there are still plants and rewards to earn too.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MORE_LEVELS_4: {TIRED:crazydaveicon}We haven't forgotten about you my dear lost taco.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_FUTURE_NEXT_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}Where do you think the future will take us?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_FUTURE_NEXT_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}Practicing advanced planting techniques in the Endless Zones...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_FUTURE_NEXT_3: {SAY:winnieicon}Will keep you sharp for future trials.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_FUTURE_NEXT_4: {SAY:crazydaveicon}{SPECIAL15}Just remember. Tomorrow is always a taco...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_FUTURE_NEXT_5: {SPECIAL16:crazydaveicon}And a taco is what we find inside of all of us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}It may look like the end of the road...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_10: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Could you put it in the fridge?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_2: {SAY:crazydaveicon}But the road goes on when searching for a taco on the space-time continuum.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY:winnieicon}In the meantime, be sure to practice advanced planting techniques in the Endless Zones.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Penny is right. It's important to stay sharp.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_5: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}You never know when you might find zombies on your lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_9: {SAY:crazydaveicon}But if you do find my taco on your lawn...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PEPPERMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PEPPERMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_26_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I see more seas! Arrrr there more zombies?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_26_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}More pirate zombies have appeared, and with greater strength.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_26_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We may need to retreat to another timeline and return when our plants are stronger.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_31_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Ai-yowza! Our lawnmowers have walked some planks!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_31_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}The temporal energies are too powerful for them, User Dave.
