LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_31_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We cannot allow even a single zombie past our defenses.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_31_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Good thing we popped all those pinatas earlier!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_35_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}The timbers be shivered! The seas are ablaze!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_35_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Your doom is assured! Your mind is a haze!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_35_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}The Zombot Plank Walker 2.0 shall soon rule the waves!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_35_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}We lived! Take that, planks and zombies and seaweed!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_35_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave, piracy is not a victimless crime.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_35_OUTRO_3: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_EXIT:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}These upgraded plants are egregious and unfair!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_A_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}It's low tide and the waves are coming in.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_A_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Grab your water wings! We're going to get wet.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_CHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_C_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}You've got a boat load of sun. Don't go overboard.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_CHALLENGE_MINIGAME_A_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}Target score activated. Let's see if you can beat my high score.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_CHALLENGE_MINIGAME_A_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}And put in KRZYDV as your initials.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_CHALLENGE_MINIGAME_B_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Who cares? We have cannons and a score to beat.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_CHALLENGE_MINIGAME_C_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Congratulations on beating my scores. I'm not bitter.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_CHALLENGE_PRESET_A_2: {PLAYFUL}That's what butter and spikes are made of.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_CHALLENGE_PRESET_A_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That's hard to argue or agree with.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_CHALLENGE_PROTECTPLANTS: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}And don't let those beans walk the plank.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}Those Spring Beans are living on the edge.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}It is now clear that these beans are being stalked.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}I thought we were trying to get back home and get your taco.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_INTRO_FIRSTLEVEL_2: {SHOUT:crazydave}But Pirates! Hang on to your parrots and peg legs!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_INTRO_GARGANTUAR_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Be advised that your sailing vessel is of insufficient size.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}I've discovered a mysterious trait in your rattletrap time machine.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Its temporal signature is nearly identical to my own creations.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Explain to me, how was this "Penny" created in the first place?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Could I really be some form of Zombot?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_5: {TIRED:winnie}User Dave, am I the daughter of Dr. Zomboss?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_6: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}That was one fine sandwich! So, what did I miss?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Finally, one of these pirates dropped some booty!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {PLAYFUL:winnie}I'm detecting something more challenging than treasure inside.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_GARGANTUAR_2: {SAY:winnie}With it we can access another World.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_GARGANTUAR_3: {TIRED:crazydave}Nuts. I was hoping it would make our boat bigger.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_LASTTLEVEL_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}I'm ready to go. Pirates are great, but I think I'm getting homesick.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_LASTTLEVEL_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}No time for that. There's a taco to find!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}Please, tell me about your creation process.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}It was pretty easy! I found some timey wabby wabbo stuff.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:crazydave}Then I put it between two slices of bread...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_5: {NPC_EXIT:winnie}{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Such proliferous bunk. I should have expected as much.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_6: {SAY:zombossicon}I'll have the answers someday, when David's brains are on my plate.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_WORLDMAP_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SPECIAL11}Shiver me timbers. I've always wanted to do some swashbuckling!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_WORLDMAP_INTRO_2: {PLAYFUL}And I've always wanted a poop deck of my own.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_WORLDMAP_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}Yes, let's go. I'd hate for him to improvise a poop deck here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_ZOMBIENOTE_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}To treasure! It says no zombies. Maps don't lie!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_POWERUPS_TUTORIAL_INITIAL_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED}You have some Power Ups! I'll show you how to use them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_POWERUPS_TUTORIAL_INITIAL_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SPECIAL6:crazydave}Yeah, and now we can break the seal. Let's get crazy!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_POWERUPS_TUTORIAL_REPEAT_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}You can try out your Power Ups for free here!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PUMPKIN_EQ_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie} Plant Pumpkins on other plants for a tough protective shell!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PYREVINE_EQ_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Vines are special plants that can be planted on top of other plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PYREVINE_EQ_2: {SAY:winnie}Plant Pyre Vines on other plants for warming against cold and a fiery offensive boost!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_QUEST_INTRO_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}What's that, Travel Log? You provide guidance, progress and rewards?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_QUEST_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}The Log is not, in fact, speaking, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_QUEST_LOG_AWARD_SCREEN_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Visit the Travel Log to claim your quest reward.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_REINFORCEMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_REINFORCEMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_REINFORCEMINT_INTRO_4: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Sorry I'm late, what did I miss? A mint pun?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_SCORETEST_01_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}The multiplier drops if you go too long without defeating a zombie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_SCORETEST_01_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The multiplier also drops when zombies destroy plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_SOLARTOMATO_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}Solar Tomato stuns zombies in a 3x3 area, with each stunned zombie giving 50 sun.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_SOLARTOMATO_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Use it to stun large crowds of zombies!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_SPEARMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena mode.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_SPEARMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_SPEARMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Spear-mint family is made up of piercing plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_STARGATE_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}It appears to be some sort of gate... of stars.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_STARGATE_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnieicon}The map shows you where new Stars can be earned!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_STARGATE_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnieicon}By earning enough Stars we can unlock the gate?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_STORE_EGYPT_PINATA_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}This Peashooter packet might have what we're looking for. Try to buy one!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_STORE_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{PLAYFUL}Nice work! Hey Penny, what does this button do?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_STORE_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{EXCITED}Most interesting, there's special items in there!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_STORE_MORE_GEMS_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Check the Twiddydinkies often to buy more pinatas!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_STORE_OPEN_PINATAS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}Want some new stuff? Check out my Twiddydinkies! I sell cool upgrades and pinatas in there!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL10_OUTRO_10: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Her name is Penny and I'm Crazy Dave. But you can call me Crazy Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL10_OUTRO_11: {SAY:winnie}I believe we have been introduced to each other before.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL10_OUTRO_13: {TIRED:winnie}We will need to travel through time to defeat Zomboss and his army... again...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL10_OUTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}I found a new note! From... Mr. Boss guy!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}I have polluted the timeline with my zombie hordes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL10_OUTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}Soon the entire time stream will be mine!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL10_OUTRO_6: {SAY:zombossicon}And I'll be collecting your brain with my timely army.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL10_OUTRO_8: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{SAY:crazydave}Cool! Mr. Boss guy wants us to travel through time with him!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL10_OUTRO_9: {SAY:crazydave}We're going to need my time machine!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL1_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:winnie}Play all 10 Tutorial levels in a row. Do not exit!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL1_OUTRO_2: {PLAYFUL:winnie}If you exit or skip, youll miss out on starting plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL_PLANTLEVELS_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}I sure hope no Buckethead Zombie attacks that poor lil' Peashooter!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL_PLANTLEVELS_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}At its current level, it is even stronger than a regular Repeater.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ULTOMATO_EQ_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Plant Ultomatos on top of themselves to mutate them up from green to yellow to red!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_UNIVERSE_INTRO_TUTORIAL_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}Yes, this is a time-space map to the worlds we could explore.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_UNIVERSE_INTRO_TUTORIAL_3: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}Mummies and pirates and cowboys, oh my!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_UNIVERSE_INTRO_TUTORIAL_4: {SAY:winnieicon}We should be able to access the other worlds.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_UNIVERSE_INTRO_TUTORIAL_5: {SAY:winnieicon}For now we must press on in Ancient Egypt!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}A lawn of vases is like a box of chocolates.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}Some are awesome! Others taste downright ugly!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_INTRO_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}But all vases are much harder on your teeth!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Be careful with how fast you break vases.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_INTRO_5: {EXCITED:winnie}You might end up with more ugly than you can handle.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VETERAN_WARNING_10: {SAY:winnie}It is not necessary to shout, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VETERAN_WARNING_3: {SAY:crazydave}Should we mention these post-Zomboss nodes are REALLY difficult?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VETERAN_WARNING_4: {SAY:crazydave}And that it would be CRAAAA-ZY to try them without leveled-up plants?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VETERAN_WARNING_8: {SAY:crazydave}YOU SHOULD GET SOME PLANTS UP TO AT LEAST LEVEL 5 TO BEAT THEM!!!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_WINTERMINT_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie} Power Mints are powerful plants you can acquire through Arena.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_WINTERMINT_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They provide a big boost to plants in their family.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_WINTERMINT_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The Winter-mint family comprises chilling and freezing plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_YETI_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{PLAYFUL}My Penny sense has detected a rare and curious lunch box.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_YETI_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{PLAYFUL}I smell a Yeti! Let's go after him!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_SPEE: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}You can use gems to grow this Sunflower instantly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_WELC: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED}Zen Garden is just for growing Marigolds.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_S: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}If you wait a while, your Marigold will grow.
{PLAYFUL:winnie}But you can speed up the process with Gems!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_W: {EXCITED:crazydave}Maybe if you water it, you'll get coins?
{PLAYFUL:crazydave}At least, I think that's how it works.
LocStringValues.NETWORK_ISSUE_DESCRIPTION_CLOUDCONNECTIO: We could not verify your cloud connection. Please check that you are signed into Google Play Game Services to protect progress and preserve progress across devices.
We could not verify your cloud connection. Please check that you are signed into iCloud to protect progress and preserve progress across devices.
LocStringValues.NETWORK_ISSUE_DESCRIPTION_INVALIDDATA: Sorry, it looks like there's a network data issue. Arg! Click to exit Arena.
LocStringValues.NETWORK_ISSUE_DESCRIPTION_TIMEOUT: An internet connection is required to play Arena. Please connect to the internet and "Retry" to try again, or "Exit" to leave Arena.
LocStringValues.NETWORK_ISSUE_DESCRIPTION_TIMEOUT_ENDLEV: Your internet connection has been lost. Tap "Exit" to continue (your reward streak will be lost).
LocStringValues.NETWORK_ISSUE_DESCRIPTION_TOURNAMENTEXPI: The current tournament has expired!  Return to collect your winnings!
LocStringValues.NETWORK_ISSUE_TITLE_CLOUDCONNECTION_ANDR: Sorry, it looks like there's a network data issue.
LocStringValues.NIGHTSHADE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}For Nightshade, stabbing is a duty and a privilege. He comes from a long line of ardent stabbers, and his family counts three kings, four ambassadors and a president as among those proudly stabbed around.
LocStringValues.NIGHTSHADE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Nightshades stab zombies with sharpened leaves.
LocStringValues.NOTIFICATION_CHANNEL_QUESTS_DESCRIPTION: Turn on Travel Log Quest notifications
LocStringValues.NOT_ENOUGH_SPROUTS: No more sprouts. Play levels to find more!
LocStringValues.OFFLINE_FACEBOOK_LOGIN_BODY: Please connect to a network in order to log in to Facebook.
LocStringValues.OUT_OF_CONTENT_HEADER: You need to download assets for this level.
LocStringValues.PACKET_LAST_STAND_LOCKED: This plant cannot be planted during Last Stand setup.
LocStringValues.PARSNIP_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}can't attack zombies that are too close to him
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water

{FLAVOR}Being a crab means he doesn't have much to do most of the time. Sure, he enjoys loafing around the beach and burying himself under the sand, but with his giant claws for hands, he can't really do much without tearing everything into pieces. Still, he tried, and while making a scrapbook for him and his friends seems impossible without him snipping every image, he's glad that he finally found a hobby he can enjoy.
LocStringValues.PARSNIP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Parsnips snip at zombies, then charge down the lane when heavily damaged.
LocStringValues.PARSNIP_TOOLTIP: Snips zombies, then charges down lane when heavily damaged
LocStringValues.PATCH_VERIFICATION_FAILED: Downloaded content may have been corrupted. Updated content will need to be downloaded again.
LocStringValues.PEANUT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}peanuts fly at random angles

{FLAVOR}Pea-nut knows that some folks have an aversion to him. He tries to be sensitive to their concerns and give them the space they need. Still, he can't help but miss the good old days - back when he was the most popular nut around.
LocStringValues.PEANUT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pea-nuts can shoot peanuts and block zombies.
LocStringValues.PEAPOD_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Having studied Quantum Spatial Mechanics in Clown College, Pea Pod has been amusing families of all ages.
LocStringValues.PEAPOD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pea Pods can be planted in the same space for up to 5 times the destruction.
LocStringValues.PEAPOD_TOOLTIP: Shoots peas at enemies and can be planted on top each others
LocStringValues.PEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"What is it like being famous?" asked the Peashooter while sipping his bottled water, "I can't talk right now, I'm finishing my merchandising deal. Hold my fir coat."
LocStringValues.PEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Peashooters are your first line of defense. They shoot peas at attacking zombies.
LocStringValues.PEPPERMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}takes a long while to go away, acting like a crater
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be imitated

{FLAVOR}Pepper-mint likes heat. He's down with flames, he digs on fire, he's a total madman for oxidization and ignition. If he sees you rubbing two sticks together, he'll come over and ask about it. He can't help himself.
LocStringValues.PEPPERMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pepper-mints set off lane-wide bursts of flame when planted, doing massive damage to all zombies.
LocStringValues.PEPPERMINT_TOOLTIP: Does massive fire damage to all zombies
LocStringValues.PEPPERPULT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost, warms nearby plants

{FLAVOR}Some say Pepper-pult is a hot head. Some find his fiery disposition off-putting. But the truth is, he's just very focused and determined. He loves what he does. He appreciates everything he has. "I came from the weedy side of the lawn," Pepper-pult explains. "I worked hard to pull myself up by my roots. I'm a self-made pepper and I don't take a single thing for granted."
LocStringValues.PEPPERPULT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pepper-pults lob flaming peppers at zombies.
LocStringValues.PERFUMESHROOM_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}affects all dinosaurs in a lane

{FLAVOR}Perfume-shrooms emit a pure, concentrated mist of aerosolized love.
LocStringValues.PERFUMESHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Perfume-shrooms enchant dinosaurs and charm them into working against the zombies.
LocStringValues.PERM_LAWN_MOWER_TUTORIAL_2: Save your brains and gas up another!
LocStringValues.PHATBEET_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Phat Beet has been known to drop sick rhymes, dope grooves, and highly satisfactory jams, often within seconds of each other.
LocStringValues.PHATBEET_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Phat Beets thump out damage every second.
LocStringValues.PINATA_HUNT_REFRESH_BODY: Spend gems to refresh all pinatas, or watch an advertisement to refresh one pinata.
LocStringValues.PINATA_HUNT_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION: Replaying any world level awards a pinata from that world. Get more when the timer resets!
LocStringValues.PLANT_FOOD_TUTORIAL_1: Drag the Plant Food onto the plant
LocStringValues.PLANT_FOOD_TUTORIAL_2: Use Plant Food to take out those zombies!
LocStringValues.PLANT_FOOD_TUTORIAL_5:
Glowing green zombies carry Plant Food!
Collect that Plant Food the zombie dropped!
LocStringValues.PLAY_LEVEL_OF_THE_DAY_DESC: Beat zombies, win seed packets and coins!
LocStringValues.POISONPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}poison and slowness stack with more shots (max 10 stacks)

{FLAVOR}Goo Peashooter is a goopy shooter. See? See how that works? It's a play on words. Words are often playful, folks!
LocStringValues.POISONPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Goo Peashooters shoot poison peas at zombies, poisoning them as well as slowing them down.
LocStringValues.POISONPEASHOOTER_TOOLTIP: Fires poisonous peas that slow zombies down
LocStringValues.POKRA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pokra's scrappy, she's a fighter, she's not afraid to jab below the belt to get the job done. She won't, because that would be cheating, but she's not afraid to. "Just so we're clear," she says with a resolute glint in her eye.
LocStringValues.POKRA_TOOLTIP: Rapidly stabs zombies & slows them down in a range
LocStringValues.POTATOMINE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Believe it or not, SPUDOW! did not happen overnight. Having been forced to try out new catchphrases and focus testing as many variations as possible (Tubular? Really?), Potato Mine weeded out the competition to stick with what he knows best.
LocStringValues.POTATOMINE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Potato Mines explode on contact, but they take time to arm. Plant them ahead of zombies.
LocStringValues.POTATOMINE_TOOLTIP: Explodes on contact, but takes time to arm itself
LocStringValues.POWERLILY_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water

{FLAVOR}From seedling to sapling, to full grown foliage, Power Lily's experience as a life coach has shown her the best way to empower and support plants everywhere.
LocStringValues.POWERLILY_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Power Lilies instantly create Plant Foods out of thin air.
LocStringValues.POWERLILY_TOOLTIP: Creates one Plant Food for use
LocStringValues.POWERTILE_TUTORIAL_1: Put Plant Food on a Peashooter
LocStringValues.POWERTILE_TUTORIAL_3: Awesome! You can plant anything on Power Tiles
LocStringValues.POWERUP_BEGHOULED_SHOVEL_DESCRIPTION: Use Power Shovel in Beghouled to remove plants and fill in craters!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_BEGHOULED_SHUFFLE_DESCRIPTION: Use Power Shuffle in Beghouled to shuffle plants for more matches!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_FLAMETHROWER_DESCRIPTION: Hold your finger down to thaw ice and burn zombies in Frostbite Caves!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_FLICK_DESCRIPTION: Swipe a zombie to toss it around. Swipe it twice to send it off the screen!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_PINCH_DESCRIPTION: Pinch a zombie to destroy it!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_SNOWBALL_DESCRIPTION: Hold your finger down on a zombie to throw chilling snowballs at it!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_VASEBREAKER_BUTTER_DESCRIPTION: Tap to butter a single zombie in Vasebreaker!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_VASEBREAKER_BUTTER_UNLOCK: Complete Egyptian Challenge Pack to unlock.
LocStringValues.POWERUP_VASEBREAKER_MOVE_DESCRIPTION: Tap to select a vase, tap again to relocate to an empty tile in Vasebreaker!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_VASEBREAKER_MOVE_UNLOCK: Complete Wave {ENDLESS_WAVE} in Endless to unlock.
LocStringValues.POWERUP_VASEBREAKER_REVEAL_DESCRIPTION: Tap to reveal the contents of one vase in Vasebreaker!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_WIZARDFINGER_DESCRIPTION: Hold your finger down on a zombie to electrocute it!
LocStringValues.PREMIUM_PLANT_QUEST_DESC: Take a premium plant out for a spin and earn rewards while doing it!
LocStringValues.PREMIUM_PLANT_QUEST_TITLE: Try a Premium Plant for Free!
LocStringValues.PREREQ_TEST_01_DESC: Whitelist - Player must have Kiwibeast - award Kiwibeast seed Packet
LocStringValues.PREREQ_TEST_02_DESC: Blacklist - Player must not have Hurrikale - award Hurrikale seed packets
LocStringValues.PREREQ_TEST_03_DESC: Number of plants owned - must have 10 or more plants - award 50 gems
LocStringValues.PREREQ_TEST_04_DESC: Number of plants at X level - Player must have 10 plants at Level 3 - award 50 gems
LocStringValues.PREREQ_TEST_05_DESC: Has Spent - Player must have spent - reward pinata_spend pinata
LocStringValues.PREREQ_TEST_06_DESC: Churn 1 - spender at risk of churn (0.7 or higher) - award pinata_churn
LocStringValues.PREREQ_TEST_07_DESC: Churn 2 - non-spender at risk of churn (0.7 or higher) - award pinata_churn
LocStringValues.PREREQ_TEST_08_DESC: Days since install - 2 Days - reward pinata_day2
LocStringValues.PREREQ_TEST_09_DESC: Days since install - 7 Days - reward pinata_day7
LocStringValues.PREREQ_TEST_10_DESC: Days since install - 14 Days - reward pinata_day14
LocStringValues.PREREQ_TEST_11_DESC: Currency - Player has <5000 coins, >7Days install - award 5000 coins
LocStringValues.PRIMALPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Primal Peashooter may be primitive, but that doesn't stop him from enrolling and excelling in several software development correspondence courses.
LocStringValues.PRIMALPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Primal Peashooters shoot heavy peas that knock zombies back and immobilize them.
LocStringValues.PRIMALPEASHOOTER_TOOLTIP: Shoots heavy peas that knock zombies back and immobilize them
LocStringValues.PRIMALPOTATOMINE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Primal Potato Mine doesn't consider himself to be primal. As far as he's concerned he's state-of-the-art. And who knows? Maybe he is.
LocStringValues.PRIMALPOTATOMINE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Primal Potato Mines do damage over a large area, but take a while to arm.
LocStringValues.PRIMALPOTATOMINE_TOOLTIP: Blows up a huge area, takes time to arm itself
LocStringValues.PRIMALSUNFLOWER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Sun Production: {STAT}25

{FLAVOR}Primal Sunflower is new to all this sun-giving business, so be patient with her. She's an early adopter of the all-you-can-stuff-yourself buffet style of sun production.
LocStringValues.PRIMALSUNFLOWER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Primal Sunflowers pop out suns more frequently than their modern counterparts.
LocStringValues.PRIMALWALLNUT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}smashes from Gargantuars only deal 20 damage

{FLAVOR}"Grunt," explains Primal Wall-nut. "Grunt oog grunt-grunt," he goes on to say. "Ook-urg grunty grunt grunt," he concludes. A nut of many opinions, is Primal Wall-nut.
LocStringValues.PRIMALWALLNUT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Primal Wall-nuts block zombies and protect your plants. They can also take on multiple smashes from Gargantuars.
LocStringValues.PRIMALWALLNUT_TOOLTIP: Blocks zombies and withstands Gargantuars' smashes
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_ERROR_EXPIRED_A: Your authorization code has expired.  Go back and enter your email again to get a new code.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_ERROR_GENERIC: Failed to register.  Try again later.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_ERROR_SEND_CODE: We couldn't send an email to your email address.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_ERROR_TOO_MANY_: We couldn't send an email to your email address.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_LINK_PERSONAL_I: View our Privacy and Cookie Policy
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_NOTE_CODE_SENT:
We sent you an e-mail with a unique code.
Enter the code in the field above to verify your e-mail.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_NOTE_CODE_TO_YO: We'll send a unique code to the e-mail address you enter above.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_NOTE_PERSONAL_I: We do not share any of your personal information.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_SUCCESS_NOTE: Your email has been successfully registered and linked to your game profile.
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_BEACH_DANGER_DESC: This party never stops. Just be careful not to wipe out!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_COWBOY_DANGER_DESC: It's a never-ending hootenanny. Can you handle it?
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_DARK_DANGER_DESC: Test your mettle in a battle for the ages. The Dark Ages, that is!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_DINO_DANGER_DESC: It's a never-ending martial marsh! Survive it!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_EGYPT_DANGER_DESC: There's more zombies than we can keep under wraps in this pyramid. Can you dig it?
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_EIGHTIES_DANGER_DESC: Eternal Eighties zombies assail you! You're not gonna take it!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_FUTURE_DANGER_DESC: Experience your Endless Zone - All Out, today. It's time for battle!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_ICEAGE_DANGER_DESC: In this frozen fracas, it's chill or be chilled!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_LOSTCITY_DANGER_DESC: Endless zombies are out to ruin your day. Don't lose your way!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_MODERN_DANGER_DESC: It's zombies from now, then, and later, all at once! DOOOOM!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_MODERN_DANGER_TITLE: Challenge Highway to the Danger Room!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_PIRATE_DANGER_DESC: Scallywags, avast! How long can you last?
LocStringValues.PROMPT_FOR_TARGETED_ADS:
We rely on third-party partners to deliver personalized in-game ads.
If disabled, you still will see third-party ads, but these ads may not be as relevant to you. You can change your preference by visiting your settings. See EA's Privacy Policy for more details.
LocStringValues.PROMPT_FOR_TARGETED_ADS_HEADER: Targeted Advertising Provided by Third Parties
LocStringValues.PUFFSHROOM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Puff-shroom is hip to all the latest social networks. He loves to surf Sporebook, FungusedIn and ShroomstaGram. But sometimes he misses the simple camaraderie of a good ol' fashioned Lawn Area Network party.
LocStringValues.PUFFSHROOM_TOOLTIP: Shoots spores with a short range
LocStringValues.PUMPKIN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pumpkin may be a hollowed-out shell, but he still has a rich inner life filled with feelings, fantasies and surprisingly disappointing opinions.
LocStringValues.PUMPKIN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pumpkins can be planted on top of other plants to provide a tough additional layer of armor.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_COINS_IN_APP_STORE: Visit the App Store to purchase coins?
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_COSTUMES_WITH_GEMS: Plant costumes are not shared with all profiles.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR: Unable to contact store at this time.  Please try again later.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_BODY:
Unable to complete purchase.
Please try again.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_DEFERRED_TRANSACTION_CONF: You already have an in-progress transaction for the requested product.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_COINS: Oops, you don't have enough coins for that!
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_GEMS: Oops, you don't have enough gems for that!
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_MINTS: Oops, you don't have enough mints for that!
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_TICKETS: Oops, you don't have enough tickets for that.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_INVALID_SKU: The requested SKU could not be found in the catalog.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_NOT_AUTHORIZED_BODY: You are not authorized to purchase on this device.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE_BODY: Either you're not connected to the internet, or there are issues connecting to the application store!
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_GEMIUM_BUNDLE: Items purchased with Gems are not shared with all profiles.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_RECLAIM_ITEM_BODY: Item has already been purchased on another profile. Claim for current profile at no cost!
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_REFRESH_FAIL: Some purchase were not refreshed correctly, please try again.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_SINGLE_PROFILE_PLANT_FREE: Free plants are not shared with all profiles.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_SINGLE_PROFILE_PLANT_WITH_COINS: Plants purchased with Coins are not shared with all profiles.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_SINGLE_PROFILE_PLANT_WITH_GEMS: Plants purchased with Gems are not shared with all profiles.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_SINGLE_PROFILE_PLANT_WITH_MINTS: Plants purchased with mints are not shared with all profiles.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_SINGLE_PROFILE_PLANT_WITH_TICKE: Plants purchased with Tickets are not shared with all profiles.
LocStringValues.PVZ2_NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app would like access to your calendar to display interactive ads.
LocStringValues.PVZ2_NSCameraUsageDescription: This app would like to access your camera to update your profile picture and display interactive ads.
LocStringValues.PVZ2_NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app would like access to your location when in use to display interactive ads.
LocStringValues.PVZ2_NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app would like to save images to your photo library to display interactive ads.
LocStringValues.PVZ2_NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app would like to send reminders to display interactive ads.
LocStringValues.PYREVINE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pyre Vine considers his holdings, his fortune, his vast hoard of wealth. He feels it should please him, and yet nevertheless he is anxious and fearful.
LocStringValues.PYREVINE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pyre Vines can be planted on top of other plants to provide protection from cold plus an additional close range flame attack.
LocStringValues.PYREVINE_TOOLTIP: Can be planted on top of a plant to provide warmth and close range fire attack
LocStringValues.QUESTS_DISABLED_EGYPT2: Oops! You need to finish Egypt Day 2 before activating the Travel Log.
LocStringValues.QUESTS_DISABLED_LEVEL_COMPLETION: Oops! The Travel Log can't be activated yet.
LocStringValues.QUEST_CONTENT_COMPLETE: Quests are complete in this tab! Check back here soon for more Quests.
LocStringValues.QUEST_RANK_ROLLUP_AWARD_DESCRIPTION: You already completed some quests, before they even existed! It's funny how time travel works.
LocStringValues.QUEST_RANK_UP_AWARD_DESCRIPTION: You've added another notch to your Travel Log.  Good work like that deserves to be rewarded!
LocStringValues.QUEST_RECYCLE_BUTTON_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: If you REFRESH this quest you will lose any progress you have made on it, and replace it with a new quest. You may refresh {x} times each day.
LocStringValues.QUEST_REVEAL_HEADER: You have a new quest, try to show it how awesome you are by beating it!
LocStringValues.Quests_disabled_50MB: Oops! You need to download additional content before activating the Travel Log.
LocStringValues.REDSTINGER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Flexibility is of key importance to Red Stinger. "I do stretching exercises every morning," he says. "It's important to stay mentally and physically nimble."
LocStringValues.REDSTINGER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Red Stingers fire shots at full force when close to home and become more defensive the further from it they get.
LocStringValues.REDSTINGER_TOOLTIP: Fires shots at full force when close to home and becomes more defensive further from it.
LocStringValues.REINFORCEMINT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Reinforce-mint isn't scowling. He's just workshopping defense strategies, doing what he can to support the team. Maybe he's scowling a little bit... fine. He definitely is.
LocStringValues.REINFORCEMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Reinforce-mints push all zombies back when planted.
LocStringValues.REPEATER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"Everyone always asks me if we've met before," says Repeater. "Everyone always asks me if we've met before. Wait, did I just say that?"
LocStringValues.REPEATER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Repeaters fire two peas at a time.
LocStringValues.REPEATER_TOOLTIP: Shoots peas at enemies, 2 at a time
LocStringValues.RESISTANCES_TOOLTIP_BODY: Plants from different families can be STRONG, WEAK or INEFFECTIVE against zombies.
LocStringValues.RESTART_LEVEL: Are you sure that you want to restart the level?
LocStringValues.RESTART_LEVEL_BODY:
Do you want to try this level 
again from the beginning?
LocStringValues.RESTORE_PURCHASES_OFFLINE_BODY: The device needs to be connected to the internet to restore purchases.
LocStringValues.RETRY_AD_FOOTER: Spend coins to try again, or watch an advertisement (if available) to retry for free.
LocStringValues.SAPFLING_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}You've gotta see Sap-fling's throwing arm to believe it. He may be young, but everyone agrees ... the kid's got TALENT. Scouts from some of the biggest Pinecone Ball teams have been keeping a close eye on him. He could be headed to the majors. Oh sure, some knock him for his incredibly sticky spitball. But he only uses all-natural sap, so it's entirely legal.
LocStringValues.SAPFLING_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sap-flings lob cones that create zombie-slowing puddles of sap.
LocStringValues.SECURITY_GOURD_DIALOG_BODY: Your brains are in danger! Hire a Security Gourd and push back the zombies!
LocStringValues.SEEDBANK_PLANT_LOCKED: The {PlantName} cannot be used on this level.
LocStringValues.SEEDBANK_PLANT_LOCKED_TEMPORARILY: Complete {LevelName} to unlock using the {PlantName} on this level.
LocStringValues.SEED_CHOOSER_CHALLENGE_CONSUMABLE_PLANTS: Using a {PLANT_NAME} counts as losing a plant for this level, are you sure you want to continue?
LocStringValues.SEED_CHOOSER_GRAVE_WARNING: There are no graves on this level, are you sure you want to pick the Grave Buster?
LocStringValues.SEED_CHOOSER_NO_LILY_PAD_WARNING: You haven't chosen any lily pads.  Are you sure you want to continue?
LocStringValues.SEED_CHOOSER_RENT_PLANT_NOT_ENOUGH_COINS: Oops!  Gather more coins to rent this plant.
LocStringValues.SEED_CHOOSER_SUN_WARNING: You haven't chosen any sun producing plants, are you sure you want to continue?

If disabled, EA will only collect your device data we need to provide necessary online services. See EA's Privacy and Cookie Policy for more information. (Changes will be reflected in your next gameplay session.)
LocStringValues.SETTINGS_DATASHARING_PROMPT_DISABLED: EA collects data from your device to develop our products and services. If disabled, EA will only collect your device data we need to provide necessary online services. See EA's Privacy and Cookie Policy for more information. (Changes will be reflected in your next gameplay session.)
LocStringValues.SETTINGS_PLAYERTARGETING_EA_PROMPT: We use your data to serve marketing we think may be of interest to you. If turned off, you will still see ads from EA, but we will not personalize them for you.
LocStringValues.SETTINGS_PLAYERTARGETING_PROMPT: We rely on third-party partners to deliver personalized in-game ads. If disabled, you still will see third-party ads, but these ads may not be as relevant to you. You can change your preference by visiting your privacy settings. See EA's Privacy and Cookie Policy for more details.
LocStringValues.SETTINGS_PLAYERTARGETING_PROMPT_DISABLED: We rely on third-party partners to deliver personalized in-game ads. If disabled, you still will see third-party ads, but these ads may not be as relevant to you. You can change your preference by visiting your privacy settings. See EA's Privacy and Cookie Policy for more details.
LocStringValues.SETTINGS_PLAYERTARGETING_TITLE: Targeted Advertising Provided by Third Parties
LocStringValues.SETTINGS_PRIVACY_TITLE_AGEGATE: EA's Privacy and Cookie Policy applies.
LocStringValues.SETTINGS_RESTORE_PURCHASES_PROMPT: Restoring your purchases will allow you to claim any previously purchased, non-consumable items from the store, including premium Plants and Upgrades, and purchased Worlds.
LocStringValues.SHADOWPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}hides and swallows zombies that get too close

{FLAVOR}"Phoot," Shadow Peashooter says, emitting a shadowy, ah, hmmm, I guess you could call it a pea, at a distant zombie. "Uph!" gasps the zombie in evident surprise. There's a lot going on under the surface between these two.
LocStringValues.SHADOWPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Shadow Peashooters fire shadowy peas that deal heavy damage, but they will speed up the zombies and remove all debuffs upon impact.
LocStringValues.SHADOWPEASHOOTER_TOOLTIP: Shoots strong shadowy-peas that speed up zombies
LocStringValues.SHADOWSHROOM_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}powered Shadow-shrooms make poisoned zombies poison other zombies

{FLAVOR}Despite being such a poisonous and profoundly inedible fungus, Shadow-shroom is nonetheless a total cutie-pie.
LocStringValues.SHADOWSHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Shadow-shrooms poison zombies who ate them, inflicting damage over time.
LocStringValues.SHADOWSHROOM_TOOLTIP: Poisons zombies over time & spreads the poison when powered
LocStringValues.SHRINKINGVIOLET_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} shrinks imps to oblivion

{FLAVOR}Shrinking Violet started out shy, but it's remarkable how discovering a magical talent for zombie-reduction can change your whole outlook.
LocStringValues.SHRINKINGVIOLET_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Shrinking Violets shrink zombies in an area, forcing them to take 3 times as much damage as normal and reducing the bite damage they inflict.
LocStringValues.SLINGPEA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sling Pea keeps a keen eye on the whole battle space. He's alert and attentive. "If something slips through," he muses quietly, "it would be my fault. And I just couldn't forgive myself if that happened."
LocStringValues.SLINGPEA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sling Peas fire 5 peas in a burst, targeting the zombies closest to your house each time.
LocStringValues.SLINGPEA_TOOLTIP: Fires 5 peas at zombies closest to your house
LocStringValues.SLOT_UNLOCKED: A new pot is available for sprouts!
LocStringValues.SNAPDRAGON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Although the most powerful dragon in the plant kingdom, he still dreams of wings and seeing the world beneath him.
LocStringValues.SNAPDRAGON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Snapdragons breathe fire that causes damage in 6 adjacent tiles.
LocStringValues.SNAPDRAGON_TOOLTIP: Breathes fire in an area in front of it
LocStringValues.SNAPPEA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"I'm a picky eater, I'll admit it," admits Snap Pea casually. "I'll eat a zombie, no problem, but there's just something about heads. I feel like they're looking at me."
LocStringValues.SNAPPEA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Snap Peas dive underground, burrow towards the first zombies in their lanes, then pop up underneath to swallow them in one gulp. Snap Peas then return to their starting spot, chew on the entire matter for a while, and finally spit the zombies' heads out at attackers.
LocStringValues.SNAPPEA_TOOLTIP: Smudges underground to eat zombies and spit out their heads
LocStringValues.SNOWPEA_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost

{FLAVOR}As a professional table tennis player, in the off-season he also enjoys skiing, playing the bongos, and spelunking.
LocStringValues.SNOWPEA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Snow Peas fire chilling peas that slow zombies down upon impact.
LocStringValues.SNOWPEA_TOOLTIP: Shoots chilling peas that damage and slow zombies
LocStringValues.SOLARTOMATO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Solar Tomato wishes folks would just stop and enjoy the sunshine sometimes. "Stop," she says. "Enjoy the sunshine. I said stop! Hold it right there! Don't move! I MEAN IT!!!"
LocStringValues.SOLARTOMATO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Solar Tomatoes stun zombies in a 3x3 area, causing each zombie to drop 25 sun.
LocStringValues.SOLARTOMATO_TOOLTIP: Makes surrounding zombies drop sun and stuns them
LocStringValues.SPEARMINT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"Slash!" Spear-mint enthuses. "Slishy-slashy-slice!" she adds, wanting to make sure she's getting her point across. She wants to be very clear on this.
LocStringValues.SPEARMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Spear-mints instantly summon 5 Spikeweeds at the same level on the board.
LocStringValues.SPIKEROCK_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can't be eaten by zombies
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}can only take three hits from rolling zombies

{FLAVOR}Being the most metal plant, Spikerock has decided to hold his ultimate metal plant concert at Madison Rock Garden. Tickets have been sold out for many harvests.
LocStringValues.SPIKEROCK_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Spikerocks destroy multiple rolling zombies and damage zombies that walk over them.
LocStringValues.SPIKEROCK_PLANTFOOD: Metal spikes push all zombies in its lane onto itself, damaging them in the process.
LocStringValues.SPIKEROCK_TOOLTIP: Breaks 3 rolling objects, hurts zombies that step on it
LocStringValues.SPIKEWEED_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can't be eaten by zombies
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}crushed by rolling zombies

{FLAVOR}Although Spikeweed grew up on the seedy side of town, his acupuncture business has been blooming.
LocStringValues.SPIKEWEED_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Spikeweeds destroy one rolling zombie and hurt any zombies that step on them.
LocStringValues.SPIKEWEED_TOOLTIP: Breaks 1 rolling object, hurts zombies that step on it
LocStringValues.SPLITPEA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"It's my turn with the eyebrows," said Frontie. "Fine, we'll split them," said Backie. Sprouted two minutes apart, their eyebrow war is eternal.
LocStringValues.SPLITPEA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Split Peas shoot 1 pea forward and 2 peas backwards.
LocStringValues.SPORESHROOM_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}shrinks small zombies into oblivion upon one hit (does not produce Spore-shrooms that way)

{FLAVOR}"My favorite arithmetic operation?" wonders Spore-shroom. "I guess I'd have to say, um, addition. Hang on, no... multiplication."
LocStringValues.SPORESHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Spore-shrooms fire spores that create new Spore-shrooms out of defeated zombies.
LocStringValues.SPORESHROOM_TOOLTIP: Fire spores that spawn new Spore-shrooms from defeated zombies
LocStringValues.SPRINGBEAN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}gets sleepy after springing

{FLAVOR}He's the strong, silent type and little is known about Spring Bean. What is known though: his fan club is a million followers strong. And the ladies love him.
LocStringValues.SPRINGBEAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Spring Beans bounce back zombies that get too close.
LocStringValues.SPROUTS_STORE_TEXT: Need more sprouts? Choose a package below.
LocStringValues.SQUASH_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Squash is actually his stage name. His birth name was Tracy.
LocStringValues.SQUASH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Squashes will smash the first zombies that gets close.
LocStringValues.STALLIA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"Life moves too quickly in our modern world," says Stallia. "Folks need to slow down and smell some spores."
LocStringValues.STALLIA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Stallias slow down and knock back zombies with a puff of perfume when they get too close.
LocStringValues.STALLIA_TOOLTIP: Slows and knocks back zombies in nearby lanes
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_BEACH_FINALE: Survive a massive attack at Big Wave Beach
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_CAMEL_MINIGAME: Match symbols to destroy the zombies
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_COWBOY_FINALE: Survive a massive attack during the Wild West
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_DARK_FINALE: Survive a massive attack in the Dark Ages
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_DINO_FINALE: Survive a massive attack in Jurassic Marsh
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_EGYPT_FINALE: Survive a massive attack in Ancient Egypt
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_EIGHTIES_FINALE: Survive a massive attack during the Neon Mixtape Tour
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_EVILSHROOMS: Survive while evil potions boost zombies
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_FUTURE_CONVEYOR: Survive the zombie attack with the given plants
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_FUTURE_FINALE: Survive a massive attack in the Far Future
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_ICEAGE_FINALE: Survive a massive attack in the Frostbite Caves
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_MINIGAME: Plan your defense and defeat the zombies
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_LAWN_MOWER_WARNING: Don't trigger any lawn mowers to complete the goal.
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_LOSTCITY_FINALE: Survive a massive attack in the Lost City.
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_MODERN_FINALE: Survive a massive attack in Modern Day.
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_MOSTLY_PRESET_PLANTS: Survive the zombie attack with most plants picked for you
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PIRATE_FINALE: Survive a massive attack in the Pirate Seas
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PLANT_BEFORE_LINE: Survive without planting on Dave's mold colonies
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PRESET_PLANTS: Survive the zombie attack with the given plants
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PROTECT_THE_PLANT: Survive and protect the endangered plants
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PROTECT_THE_PUFFSHROOMS: Survive and keep the Puff-shrooms alive
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_SPEND_SUN_HOLDOUT: Don't spend any sun for {COUNT} seconds
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_TARGET_SCORE: Defeat zombies to earn points. Get a higher score than your opponent to win.
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_ZOMBIES_ONSCREEN: Have {COUNT} or more zombies on the lawn!
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_ZOMBIE_DISTANCE: Don't let the zombies trample the flowers
LocStringValues.STARFRUIT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Just a small town fruit that travelled to the big city and found his way to the future. His favorite modes of transportation: conveyor belts, hoverboards, and rockets. WEEEEE!
LocStringValues.STORE_MULTI_CATEGORY_INTRO: The {COUNT} seed packet(s) are an assortment of:
LocStringValues.STRAWBURST_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}tap to fire
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}self explode if the zombies are too close

{FLAVOR} "Big is good," says Strawburst. "Though small's pretty choice as well. And you should never discount medium. I just like sizes, really."
LocStringValues.STRAWBURST_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Strawbursts grow a berry for small, medium or huge damage, with bigger and bigger explosion area.
LocStringValues.STRAWBURST_TOOLTIP: Charges berries over time that deal more damage the more they grow
LocStringValues.STUNION_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Oh sure, everyone knows Stunion as the battle-hardened warrior with the potent breath. But he's so much more than that. He's an accomplished pianist. He speaks five languages fluently. Heck, he's the leader of a Cub Shallots group in his spare time. Dude's got layers. Go on, peel 'em back. You'll see.
LocStringValues.STUNION_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Stunions breathe a stunning cloud of gas on nearby zombies in its lane.
LocStringValues.STUNION_TOOLTIP: Stuns nearby zombies in the lane
LocStringValues.SUGGEST_TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION: Need help choosing plants? Power Picks will set you up with aggressive attackers, a brawny guardian, and the right sun producer you need to win.
LocStringValues.SUNBEAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}As the eldest of the bean brothers, Sun Bean often finds his siblings exasperating. Chili Bean is a little crude, Laser Bean is too far out, and Spring Bean is just plain lazy. Still, he loves them just the same. That's how it is with family.
LocStringValues.SUNBEAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sun Beans infect zombies that ate them with a sun plague. As they take damage sun will be generated.
LocStringValues.SUNBEAN_TOOLTIP: Zombies that ate it drop sun when damaged
LocStringValues.SUNFLOWER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Sun Production: {STAT}25

{FLAVOR}After the release of her first major YouTuber video "Zombies On Your Lawn," Sunflower's YouTuber channel has been bursting with fun. She is currently putting the final touches on her reality show TV pitch "Sunflower Thinks She Can Dance."
LocStringValues.SUNFLOWER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sunflowers are essential for you to produce extra sun. Try planting as many as you can!
LocStringValues.SUNSHROOM_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Sun Production: {STAT}15 - 25 - 50
{KEYWORD}Grow Time: {STAT}120s - 240s

{FLAVOR}Oh sure, Sun-shroom is known for his ever-present grin and sunny disposition. But truth be told, even he has his dark days. It ain't easy keeping things light when you live in the shadows.
LocStringValues.SUNSHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sun-shrooms give small suns at first, then more sun as it grows.
LocStringValues.SWEETPOTATO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sweet Potato really is as sweet as she looks. Her favorite animal is the unicorn. Her favorite color is (and this is a direct quote) "all the colors of the rainbow." When she writes the letter "i", she draws a little heart where the dot belongs. Frankly, if it were anyone else, this amount of syrup would be sickening. But on her, well, it just seems right.
LocStringValues.SWEETPOTATO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sweet Potatoes attract zombies from other lanes when they are close by.
LocStringValues.SYNC_DATA_INFO:
"By registering your account, your player data will be merged across available player IDs to ensure all progress across devices and platforms is kept. You can also force sync your data for your current player ID to ensure you are up-to-date with what is stored on our servers.
To see your current player IDs, go to Settings -> Download Preferences."
LocStringValues.SYNC_FAILED_TO_LOAD_BODY: We were unable to load your player data from our game servers for. Please find a more stable internet connection or try again later.
LocStringValues.SYNC_FAILED_TO_SAVE_BODY: We were unable to save your player data to our game servers for. Please find a more stable internet connection or try again later.
LocStringValues.SYNC_LOADING_DATA: Loading player data from game server...
LocStringValues.SYNC_SAVING_DATA: Saving player data to game server...
LocStringValues.SYNC_SUCCEEDED_BODY: Player data was saved with the game server and reloaded.
LocStringValues.TALLNUT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water & can't be frozen

{FLAVOR}Tall-nut is opening a chain of stores for Tall and Taller gentlemen. "I'll shell out the savings to you!"
LocStringValues.TALLNUT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Tall-nuts are heavy-duty wall plants that block low flying zombies.
LocStringValues.TALLNUT_TOOLTIP: Has great toughness & blocks low flying zombies
LocStringValues.TANGLEKELP_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}deal damage to Gargantuars instead

{FLAVOR}Tangle Kelp likes to go deep. He majored in philosophy. Grab a root beer with him, and he'll go on and on about Nietzsche's "Thus Spoke Zucchini" or hold forth on Kant's "Critique of Petunia Reason." It's cool and all, but sometimes you just want to keep the conversation light. Sometimes you just want to talk about the temperature of the water.
LocStringValues.TANGLEKELP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Tangle Kelp are aquatic plants that pull the first zombie that approaches them underwater.
LocStringValues.TEST_FEASTIVUS_QUEST_DESC: Defeat Treasure Yetis before they totally overrun Feastivus!
LocStringValues.THREEPEATER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Threepeater loves playing multiplayer in video games, but split-screen never works out because the left head always cheats.
LocStringValues.THREEPEATER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Threepeaters shoot peas in three lanes.
LocStringValues.THYMEWARP_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}rewound zombies have restored health
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be imitated

{FLAVOR}"Possibilities other to open be to need we." Warp Thyme says, "Limited too far was time to approach unidirectional the that felt always I've."
LocStringValues.THYMEWARP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Thyme Warps rewind time, instantly sending all zombies back to where they started.
LocStringValues.THYMEWARP_TOOLTIP: Sends zombies back where they started
LocStringValues.TOADSTOOL_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}deals damage to zombies she can't gulp down instead
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water

{FLAVOR}Toadstool just can't stand being idle. "I keep everything that I want to do on lists, and keep the lists where I can see them so that I'm always motivated!" she said. Whenever there's work to be done, she's always the first to hop to it.
LocStringValues.TOADSTOOL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Toadstools gulp down zombies whole, then produce sun. They take a while to gobble zombies up and are vulnerable while doing so.
LocStringValues.TOADSTOOL_TOOLTIP: Gulps a zombie at range and chews for a while, producing sun
LocStringValues.TORCHWOOD_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost, warms nearby plants

{FLAVOR}Torchwood and Snapdragon have become fast friends. They like to hang out at either the Tiki Lounge or the Renaissance Faire.
LocStringValues.TORCHWOOD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Torchwoods light up certain projectiles for extra damage. They also deal damage to zombies eating them.
LocStringValues.TORCHWOOD_TOOLTIP: Light up certain projectiles and does damage to nearby zombies
LocStringValues.TUTORIAL_POWERUPS_HAVE_FUN: Now have fun with Power Ups!
LocStringValues.TUTORIAL_POWERUPS_KILL_ALL_ZOMBIES: Kill all the zombies before the timer runs out!
LocStringValues.TUTORIAL_POWERUPS_USE_POWERUP: Great! Now use the Power Up!
LocStringValues.TUTORIAL_POWERUPS_ZOMBIE_WAVE: Great, now don't let these zombies eat your brains!
LocStringValues.TWINSUNFLOWER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Sun Production: {STAT}25 x 2

{FLAVOR}Twin Sunflower's super-chic line of ultra-expensive sunglasses has been a huge hit wherever she goes. Due to this she has been unable to travel without being swarmed by the Poppyrazzi.
LocStringValues.TWINSUNFLOWER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Twin Sunflowers give twice as much sun as a normal sunflower.
LocStringValues.TWINSUNFLOWER_TOOLTIP: Gives twice as much sun as a sunflower
LocStringValues.ULTOMATO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on top of itself, mutating from green to yellow to red
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}costs more sun the more Ultomatoes are on the board

{FLAVOR}
Ultomato yawns as unimaginable energies build up inside his being. It's cool. He can afford to wait. He's got allllll day.
LocStringValues.ULTOMATO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Ultomatoes charge up slowly, then fire a devastating beam down the lane that damages zombies as long as the charge lasts. Ultomatoes can be made more powerful by planting multiple Ultomatoes on the same tile.
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_BEACH_DESC: Use a World Key to unlock the holiday horrors of the Big Wave Beach!
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_COWBOY_DESC: Use a World Key to unlock the pioneering predicaments of the Wild West!
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_DARK_DESC: Use a World Key to unlock the midnight mysteries of the Dark Ages!
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_DINO_DESC: Use a World Key to unlock the mesozoic madness of Jurassic Marsh!
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_EIGHTIES_DESC: Use a World Key to unlock the musical mayhem of the Neon Mixtape Tour!
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_FIND_MORE_TOOLTIP: Collect limited time seed packets during the {PLANT} event to unlock.
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_FIND_MORE_TOOLTIP_PRODUCT: Collect limited time seed packets during the {PLANT} event to unlock.
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_FOR_PACKETS_CONFIRMED_BODY:
You unlocked {UNLOCKED_ITEM}!

Plants unlocked with Seed Packets are not shared between all profiles.
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_FUTURE_DESC: Use a World Key to unlock the electric excitements of the Far Future!
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_ICEAGE_DESC: Use a World Key to unlock the chilling challenge of the Frostbite Caves!
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_LOSTCITY_DESC: Use a World Key to unlock the historical hazards of the Lost City!
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_MODERN_DESC: Use a World Key to unlock the contemporary calamity of Modern Day!
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_PIRATE_DESC: Use a World Key to unlock the marine mischief of the Pirate Seas!
LocStringValues.UNLOCK_ZEN_SLOT_DESCRIPTION: Opens up another pot to plant sprouts and earn sweet loot and boosts!
LocStringValues.UPDATE_DOWNLOADED_BODY: Update data has downloaded. Press OK to apply patch.
LocStringValues.UPDATE_REQUIRED_BODY: Update required. Press OK to download update now.
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_7_SLOTS_INFO: Lets you choose another plant type in every level!
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_8_SLOTS_INFO: Lets you choose another plant type in every level!
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_FIND_MORE_TOOLTIP: Earn seed packets from pinatas to upgrade your plant.
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_FIND_MORE_TOOLTIP_EMPOWERMINTS: Earn seed packets from pinatas to upgrade your plant.
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_FIND_MORE_TOOLTIP_HOMEWORLD: Earn seed packets from pinatas to upgrade your plant.
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_FIND_MORE_TOOLTIP_HOMEWORLD_PROD: Earn seed packets from pinatas to upgrade your plant.
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_FIND_MORE_TOOLTIP_PRODUCT: Earn seed packets from pinatas to upgrade your plant.
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_MANUAL_MOWERS_DESCRIPTION_1: Manually launch one mower by tapping and holding!
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_PF_REFRESH_INFO: Instantly refresh a seed packet by dragging and dropping Plant Food on it.
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_PF_SLOT_DESCRIPTION: Hold onto one more Plant Food during a level!
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_PLANTFOOD_EXTRA_SLOT_1_INFO:
Hold onto one more Plant Food during a level!

(from Ancient Egypt)
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_PLANTFOOD_EXTRA_SLOT_2_INFO:
Hold onto one more Plant Food during a level!

(from Store)
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_SEEDSLOT_DESCRIPTION: Lets you choose another plant type every level!
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_SHOVEL_DESCRIPTION: Get an additional 25% of sun cost back when shoveling up plants!
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_STARTING_SUN_1_INFO: Start with 25 extra sun in the bank!
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_STARTING_SUN_2_INFO: Start with 25 extra sun in the bank!
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_STARTING_SUN_DESCRIPTION: Start with 25 extra sun in the bank!
LocStringValues.UPGRADE_WALLNUT_FIRSTAID_INFO: Fully repair damaged defensive plants by planting on top of them.
LocStringValues.USER_ERROR_MESSAGE: Please enter your name to create a new user profile for storing high score data and game progress.
LocStringValues.VASEBREAKER_EGYPT_LEVEL_NAME_1: Egyptian Challenge: One at a Time
LocStringValues.WALLNUT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Having retired from his days as a champion bowler in the Pro Leagues, Wall-nut is looking forward to a real challenge on the front lines of home defense. DEFENSE! DEFENSE!
LocStringValues.WALLNUT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Wall-nuts have hard shells which you can use to protect your other plants.
LocStringValues.WALLNUT_TOOLTIP: Blocks off zombies to protect your other plants
LocStringValues.WASABIWHIP_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost, warms nearby plants

{FLAVOR}"The trick to proper whipping is all in the wrist," says Wasabi Whip. "Well, not the wrist, exactly, since I don't have any. You have to, like... BE the wrist."
LocStringValues.WASABIWHIP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Wasabi Whips lash out with their flaming whips, delivering whuppings to zombies both in front and behind.
LocStringValues.WINTERMELON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}You may recognize Winter Melon's voice from such incredible documentaries as "It's Cold Up Here," "Ice Bingo," and "Surfin' Swedes."
LocStringValues.WINTERMELON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Winter Melons do heavy damage and slow groups of zombies.
LocStringValues.WINTERMELON_TOOLTIP: Does heavy damage and slows groups of zombies
LocStringValues.WINTERMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}constantly apply 20s of chilling while it's on the board

{FLAVOR}Winter-mint has advanced degrees in cryonics and cryogenics, is a master builder of snowmen, and subscribes to season passes at three different ski resorts. He does think it's a little chilly in here, though.
LocStringValues.WINTERMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Winter-mints chill all zombies when planted.
LocStringValues.WIN_SINGLE_JOUST_MATCH_DESC: Seriously, go win an Arena match! It's fun!
LocStringValues.WITCHHAZEL_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}targets Wizard Zombies first
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}deals damage to Gargantuars instead

{FLAVOR}As one of the most powerful magic users in the Plant Kingdom, she's often chosen to participate in the magical duels between plants and zombies. She's not really too stable though - as she's known for quickly snapping at other plants. She also enjoys petting any cat within her sight... and talk shows, for some reason. Is that a Witch thing?
LocStringValues.WITCHHAZEL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Witch Hazels use magical sorcery to transform zombies on adjacent lanes into Solar Tomatoes.
LocStringValues.WORLDKEY_GIFT_COMPLETIONIST_BODY_TEXT: Hang on to your keys! You may need them for upcoming Travel Log quests.
LocStringValues.WORLDKEY_GIFT_MIDPLAYER_BODY_TEXT: Check your Travel Log for recommended destinations.
LocStringValues.WORLDKEY_GIFT_NEWPLAYER_BODY_TEXT: This key unlocks new worlds! Check your Travel Log for recommended destinations.
LocStringValues.WORLDKEY_GIFT_TITLE_TEXT: Hey, time traveler! Here's a free World Key.
LocStringValues.WORLDMAP_EVENT_BEGHOULED_BEYOND_DEFAULT_: It's a wacky variation on traditional PvZ gameplay!
Swap your way to a better world in the Beghouled Beyond event!

LocStringValues.WORLDMAP_EVENT_YETI_DESC: Hunt him down and collect sweet loot!
LocStringValues.WORLDMAP_YETI_EVENT_ALERT_DESCRIPTION: A Treasure Yeti has spawned in this level. Destroy him and get treasure before he vanishes!
LocStringValues.WORLDMAP_YETI_OTHER_WORLD_ALERT_DESCRIPT: A Treasure Yeti has spawned in this world. Destroy him and get treasure before he vanishes!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_BEACH: Take a trip back to the '60s and hang ten on the ocean waves! Tides are changing and those gnarly zombies make it not-so-safe to go back in the water!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_COWBOY: Head down the dusty trail for a showdown with the outlaw zombies of yesteryear! Gather up your plants for the big Brain Rush of 1850!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_DARK: Bring out your undead to the year 948! Defend in the dark of knight and get medieval on zombies from the days of yore!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_DINO: Defend against an ancient army as the ground thunders under the awful feet of terrible prehistoric zombies!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_EGYPT: Zombies infest one of Earth's earliest civilizations! Tackle mummified monsters and more under the scorching sun of Egypt, circa 2500 BC!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_EIGHTIES: Stock up on hairspray and rewind to the 1980s! With synthesized music and voraciously radical zombies, this heinous dance party will, like, totally tax you to the MAX!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_EVENT: Use this place to practice for the real event!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_FUTURE: In the year 2323, the zombies will have brain extraction down to a science! Can the plants of the future save you from the undead of tomorrow?
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_ICEAGE: Explore the frozen wastes of prehistory and chill out with the coolest zombies ever. Beware the winds or your plants will be frozen veggies.
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_LOSTCITY: Discover the vanished city of gold, where sun is plentiful and misplaced zombies abound! Use special tiles for extra sun, for these treasure-seekers are no idol threat!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_MODERN: Return to moments before you left in a contemporary contest stocked with zombies of the modern era!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_PIRATE: The year is 1679, the golden age of zombie piracy! Keep your booty close and your plants closer as zombies take to the seas to plunder your brains!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DISCLAIMER: Purchased content can be claimed by any of the user profiles!
