LocStringValues.XSHOT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}hovers above ground or water

{FLAVOR}Sometimes Rotobaga hears the other plants gossiping about each other. "Did you notice that so-and-so has been putting on weight?" they might say. Or, "I hear that so-and-so is dating so-and-so. Can you believe it?"  But Rotobaga isn't the kind of plant to engage in idle gossip. She's not interested in talking about anyone behind their leaves. She does her best to just rise above it.
LocStringValues.XSHOT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Rotobagas shoot piercing projectiles along the four diagonals, in each direction that has a target.
LocStringValues.XSHOT_TOOLTIP: Shoots piercing projectiles along the diagonals
LocStringValues.YETI_FUE_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: When a yeti appears on the map, go after him quickly! If you can spot and defeat him in the level, he'll drop fabulous prizes!
LocStringValues.ZENGARDEN_USE_BOOST_BODY: Gets instant Plant Food effect when planted on the lawn.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_BEE_TUTORIAL_USE_BEE: Tap a plant. The bee will speed it up!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_BUY_SLOT_DIALOG_BODY: Opens up another pot to plant sprouts and earn sweet loot and boosts!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_DESTROY_BOOST_DIALOG_BODY: Are you sure you want to shovel this plant?  It will lose its boost.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_COLLECT_COINS: Here's some coins while you work towards a boost!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_RETURN_REMINDE: Return to Zen Garden often to plant your Marigolds!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_WATER_PLANT_FO: She's ready for water. Keep her growing to get a nice Sunflower!
It's a Sunflower! She's thirsty for water.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_COLLECT_COI: Marigold's growing up! And she has coins for you.
A batch of coins and she's done!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_PLACE_SPROU: You may plant another sprout now!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_RETURN_REMI: Return to Zen Garden often to earn coins!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_WATER_PLANT: It's a Marigold! She needs water.
The Marigold is ready for water.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MULTIPLANT_TEXT: You may plant multiple sprouts to add a bonus to your chance to get an uncommon or rare plant.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_WORTH_NO_SPROUTS: The bee will take your plant, but it hasn't grown enough to be worth any sprouts.  Sell anyway?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BARRELROLLER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}imps thrown from barrel when destroyed
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}Jalapeno can destroy both the Imps and the barrel

{FLAVOR}Barrel Roller Zombie is part of a super underground secret awesome club. You probably haven't heard of it. Also, his left arm is slightly longer than his right arm.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BARRELROLLER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His rolling barrel crushes plants and provides excellent protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Go to the beach, they said. Put a cone on your head, they said. So, yeah, that's what Pompadour Conehead did. He's at his best when following simple instructions.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His starfish cone gives him thrice the toughness of a normal pompadour zombie.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pompadour Buckethead tried to learn to play the ukulele. He figured it would be easier to learn than the guitar on account of how small it is. But his stiff fingers ... they just weren't made for it. Now he just bangs on his bucket. And he's not half-bad either.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His scallop shelled bucket gives him great resistance to damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pompadour Zombie recently noticed that he was wearing only one flip-flop. He THINKS he lost the other one while doing the limbo at a bonfire party the other night. But to be honest, that entire night is a little hazy ... and that flip-flop could be anywhere.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}See that starfish on Bikini Conehead's cone? She put that there herself. She gets a lot of compliments on it too. And sure enough, now it seems like everyone is accessorizing with starfish. She's a trendsetter, that one.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Her starfish cone makes her thrice as tough as a basic bikini zombie. Deals less damage while biting than her Pompadour counterpart.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Bikini Buckethead had big ambitions. She wanted to do more than just lurch around on a beach all day. Her life's dream: to perform internationally with a synchronized swimming team. Sadly, the nose plug was her undoing. If she only had a nose ...
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Her scallop shelled bucket provides great protection from damage. Deals less damage while biting than her Pompadour counterpart.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Is it weird that we haven't seen any female zombies before? Some say yes. Some say no. Either way, Bikini Zombie is used to breaking new ground. She's not afraid to go where no woman zombie has gone before. You could call her a pioneer. You could call her a hero.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Regular beach blanket zombie. Deals less damage while biting than her Pompadour counterpart.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FISHERMAN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}plants next to him are tossed off the lawn

{FLAVOR}Everyone is tired of Fisherman Zombie's fishing stories. He's always bragging about the size of his catch. Time and time again, he claims to have caught "the big one." But the fact of the matter is, no one has seen him actually catch a fish. Not once. It's more than a little suspicious.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FISHERMAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Casts his line to pull far plants towards him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Talk about a disgruntled zombie. Beach Flag Zombie is fed up. None of the other zombies seem to appreciate just how difficult it is for him to swim while holding a flag. Not once have they thanked him for doing the hard work that needs to be done. So it shouldn't come as a surprise: He's been interviewing for jobs elsewhere.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge wet "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with driftwood
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches Imp Mermaid when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}This big guy loves the water. When he's deep down in it, he feels light as a feather. He feels like he's flying. Most importantly, during those precious moments, he feels as if the weight of Imp Mermaid Zombie has been lifted from his shoulders.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Titanic zombie who isn't shellfish with his might.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Imp Mermaid Zombie couldn't decide whether to wear the top made out of coconut shells or the top made out of seashells. She went with the slinky coconut-shell number because, really, the seashells are soooo last wave.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Washes in past your defenses, then flounders forward.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_OCTOPUS_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}bound plants are passive until their octopus is destroyed

{FLAVOR}It started innocently enough. One day, Octo Zombie decided to get a pet octopus. But he loved that octopus so much, he got another and another ... and another. Next thing you know, he was volunteering at an octopus rescue shelter. And now, well, no one wants to tell him, but he's pretty much the undersea equivalent of a cat lady. You should see how many are living at his house. It's quite startling.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_OCTOPUS_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Throws octopi at your plants to bind them up.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SNORKEL_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to stun and gas effects

{FLAVOR}Snorkel Zombie has a hard time getting the Bikini Zombies. He's tried offering them flowers, jewelry, and even chocolate-covered brains. But nothing seems to work. They just can't seem to see past the snorkel on his face.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SNORKEL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Snorkel zombies can submerges underwater to avoid most attacks.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SURFER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can crush a plant with his board

{FLAVOR}Surfer Zombie took up surfing just last year. At first, he only did it because he thought it would make him look cool. But he was a natural. Now he can hang 10 with the best of them. Now he's headed to the pro circuit. Now he IS cool.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SURFER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Surfs past plants on the water, then carries board on land.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAKETANK_DESCRIPTION: #caketank is the hot new trend. It is trending all over the place. Look under your bed. It's trending there, too.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAKETANK_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: #caketank advances to a set position on the lawn, then emits shocking birthday surprises as its various layers take damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ALMANAC_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Each Camel Zombie is an excellent ballroom dancer, practicing every day by holding up mysterious signs with strange symbols. They call it "The Camel Dance."
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ALMANAC_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Arrives in step with other Camel Zombies in a group of three.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_MANYHUMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Leader of the many hump camel group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ONEHUMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Leader of the one hump camel group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_SEGMENT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Just another camel in the group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_TWOHUMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Leader of the two hump camel group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CANNON_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to chilling, stalling perfume, stun and poison

{FLAVOR}The Imps joined the Order of the Cannon Fraternity, Kappa Pea, and quickly rose through the ranks due to the constant firing of their leadership.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CANNON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Shoots Pirate Imps to mid-lawn. Eventually it can explode and rain down imps if not destroyed quickly.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CHICKEN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Once released onto the lawn chickens run full speed to peck at your brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CHICKEN_FARMER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}After publishing the fourth study on Ornithology, and four years of research at the Hadron Collider, Chicken Wrangler Zombie has finally solved the riddle of what came first.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CHICKEN_FARMER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Releases a flock of chickens once his baling wire is broken.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The sheriff of these here parts. Please pull over the horse and pull out your driver's license, registration, and proof of brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His cowhide cone gives him thrice the toughness of a regular cowboy.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}A five-time winner of the temporal chili cook-off. Those Egyptian zombies don't know their chili, but Cowboys love their beans. The more you eat, the more you brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His chili pot hat makes him greatly resistant to damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cart-Head Zombie could probably move a lot faster if he did a handstand and rolled, but he's not thinking that far ahead.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Cart-head Zombie's cart-shaped chapeau provides extra-wheeled head protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cowboy Zombie thinks he's the roughest, toughest, meanest zombie varmint in the west, south and east. He's anxious to test his skills in the central coast region.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge dusty "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Arrows point to the brain on Cowboy Rally's Flag, as if to say, "Hey, everyone, I would like to emphasize this image." It's canny design.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_H: Cowboy Rally Zombie marks the appearance of a sizable stampede of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with brand
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches Bull Rider when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}Likes candy.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Conehead Peasant is just happy to have a cone over his head. Times are tough, man. He knows a lot of zombies don't even have that.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His stony turret cone makes him thrice as tough as normal peasants.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}None of the other zombies seem to understand just how versatile Buckethead Peasant's choice of headwear is. Sure, his bucket makes for a great battle helmet. But just last night, he cooked a truly divine brain stew in it. And next time you see his band, check out what he's using for a kick drum.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His forged bucket provides great protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Knight Zombie was just as surprised as anyone when Zombie King promoted him. He'd never say this out loud, but he's not sure he deserves the position. He's not sure he has what it takes to wear the armor. But like they say, "Fake it 'til you make it."
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His king appointed helm provides amazing protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Someone shouted, "Bring out your undead!" And then Peasant Zombie found himself here. He simply doesn't remember anything that happened before that.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}They keep telling Peasant Zombie that there is no greater reward than being granted the banner to carry into battle. But when he sees other Peasant Zombies being granted cones, buckets, and even helms, he thinks maybe they're making that up so they don't hurt his feelings.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge dark "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with hammer
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches Imp Monk when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}When Dark Ages Gargantuar wants to find pantaloons that fit him, he has to shop at the "Enormous & Towering" store. He hates it though. It's embarrassing. He just wants to shop for clothes where all the other zombies shop.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Immense zombie who brings the hammer down.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Frankly, Imp Monk Zombie decided to don the robes because of the sweet haircut that went with them.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Summoned past most of your defenses, then shambles onward.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DRAGON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Imp Zombie knows he's too old to wear a dragon costume like a kid on Halloween. But he doesn't care. Let the others judge. His spirit animal is a dragon, and he feels closer to his true self when he's dressed like this.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DRAGON_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Claws forward with a fire-proof dragon suit.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_JUGGLER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Oh sure, everyone loves to laugh at Jester Zombie's clownish routines. But what no one knows is that he has a Master of Fine Arts from the Chewliard Performing Arts School. Heck, he's been on stage with some of the finest classical theatre companies this side of the lawn. But sometimes you just gotta go where the paycheck is.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_JUGGLER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Returns most projectiles that are shot at him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_KING_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}As Shakespeare once wrote, "Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown." And Zombie King couldn't agree more. It is incredibly difficult to get a good night's sleep with a crown on your head. That thing is all kinds of uncomfortable.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_KING_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Grants knight helms to nearby peasant zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_WIZARD_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}All the zombies agree, Wizard Zombie's powers of transmutation are impressive. But what they don't get is ... why sheep? Everyone knows it would be more helpful if the Wizard used his powers to turn plants into, say, more zombies. But yeah, no one is going to say that to his face.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: Jurassic Conehead Zombie is trying to get the jump on the whole "traffic cone" idea. He figures it'll be a HUGE market in about 150 million years.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Cones, or old leftover horns bundled together with string so that they look sort of like a cone, provide some middling protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: The real question, the burning mystery, is: where did he find blue fur for his outfit?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Crude drawings of buckets provide as much protection as the real thing.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION: Contrary to his name, Jurassic Fossilhead's fossil head isn't actually a fossil. That skull's maybe a week and a half old, tops.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Fossil skulls not only provide a huge amount of damage absorption, but are also extremely classy.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}amber covers his mouth, helps him ignore plants

{FLAVOR}If you were to extract DNA from the Amberhead Zombie and combine it with the DNA of a frog, you'd probably be breaking the law at some point.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Amberhead Zombie's head-engulfing ball of amber provides hardened protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_DESCRIPTION: Jurassic Bully is slow, stupid, and smells bad. But hey, at least he's punctual.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: A trudging, damage-resistant zombie who is immune to knockback.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Somebody tied rocks to Jurassic Rockpuncher's hands. Being unable to remove them (because he had rocks tied to his hands), he was left with no choice but to roll with it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HE: Jurassic Rockpunchers are beefier versions of their counterparts. They also spawn Jurassic Imps upon defeat.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_DESCRIPTION: Jurassic Zombie is NOT primitive. See, he's wearing a tie and everything!
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Regular beard-having zombie from the unimaginable past.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: He's not only got a flag, but he's also got a can-do attitude and a fierce hunger for success. Success and brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge epochal "wave" of highly anachronistic zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Where did Jurassic Rally Zombie get his fancy new flag? Nobody knows. It's a mystery. The police should look into it. Or maybe we could get a fund together and hire a detective. It's a real puzzle.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEA: Jurassic Rally Zombie marks the arrival of large group of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with bone
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches 2 Jurassic Imps when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}Jurassic Gargantuar wonders how there can be zombies millions of years before the advent of humanity. He doesn't let it get in the way of his plant-bashing, though.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_IMP_DESCRIPTION: This nasty little nipper can make a serious dent in your defenses if left to his own devious devices.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: A weaker, smaller, much more vicious version of the typical Jurassic zombie.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DISCO_MECH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chilling and Stallia
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback, stun and poison

{FLAVOR}After some initial problems with the sideburn suspension system, the Disco-tron 3000 went on to become the shufflin' dance-bot of doom it is today.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DISCO_MECH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Drops in Disco Jetpack Zombies when dropping the beat.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with sarcophagus
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches Imp Mummy when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}True fact #1: The pyramids were built in an attempt to make Mummified Gargantuar seem small. It didn't work. True fact #2: The Sphinx isn't missing its nose... that is the face of... Gargantuar.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Massive zombie from a royal line of mummies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Imp Mummy prefers to laze around the tomb, hop up on the urns, and scratch at the sarcophagi. The sound of him coughing up a hairball is one you will never forget.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Thrown over most of your defenses, then slinks onward.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_8BIT_DESCRIPTION: Being made out of light and positional co-ordinates has no effect on this erzatz zombie's ravenous hunger for tangy brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_8BIT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pixelated zombie generated by super cool arcade machine. Comes in regular, cone and bucket flavors.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARCADE_DESCRIPTION: When it's a choice between quarters for games and quarters for laundry, Arcade Zombie is prepared to make the ultimate stinky sacrifice.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARCADE_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Pushes an arcade cabinet that spits out 8-Bit Zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: Neon Conehead Zombie used to be a big believer in de-evolution, but then he forgot what it meant.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Cones provide protection and focus the sound of righteous tunes.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: Neon Buckethead Zombie had to go all the way to the dump to find a headband he really liked.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Buckets absorb damage because that's just what they do.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BOOMBOX_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}boom box has no effect on sun producers, Phat Beets and a few other plants

{FLAVOR}Boombox Zombie doesn't want to buy, sell or process anything; he just really wants to consume your brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BOOMBOX_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Holds aloft a boom box that tranquilizes most plants with its heartfelt tunes.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BREAKDANCER_DESCRIPTION: Delivers only the freshest moves at bargain basement prices.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BREAKDANCER_DESCRIPTION_: Kicks zombies forward when transported by the power of rap.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_DESCRIPTION: He's cutting down on his head-banging so as not to bang his head clean off.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: Fluorescent colors and little yellow plastic strips are the marks of a truly hip, groundbreaking new style of zombie wave flag.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge mixtape-making "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with guitar
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}emits sonic blast for every smash
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches Impunk when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}Hair Metal Gargantuar only knows one chord, but you'd better believe he'll play it all night and then some.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_GLITTER_DESCRIPTION: Glitter Zombie inspires zombies everywhere to boogie their brains out, whether it's just one moment or maybe forever, or at least until the lights come on and they're kicking everybody out.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_GLITTER_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Trails glamorous rainbows that protect zombies behind her when she's feeling the beat.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_IMP_DESCRIPTION: Impunk's lyrics have been described as "banal," "incoherent," and "totally expressive of the Zompunk movement at its finest."
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Tossed past most of your defenses, then rocks out to your detriment.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_MC_DESCRIPTION: MC Zom-B doesn't want you to know it, but his fancy bling is really just gold-plated zinc he got from his grandma.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_MC_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Spins microphone to damage plants in a 5x5 area around him when he's dropping his sick, sick rhymes.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_PUNK_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}Magnet-shrooms pull off his head

{FLAVOR}Punk Zombie's piercings represent his individuality and his belief in personal freedom, or maybe just that he fell face-first into a sewing machine.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}cold attacks extinguish torch

{FLAVOR}His impressive friendly mutton chops have always kept food in them for weeks, making sure his explorations are filled with snacks.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Carries a torch that can instantly destroy your plants.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}freezing attacks extinguish torch

{FLAVOR}Torchlight Zombie has no fear of the dark. That's not because he's always got a torch, however, but rather because as a zombie he has no capacity for fear in the first place.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Carries a big torch that instantly incinerates plants and makes him immune to chilling effects.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FOOTBALL_MECH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to Stallia and chilling
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback, poison and stun

{FLAVOR}Now past his prime, Mecha-Football Zombie is ready to be put back into the game. Until he gets some brains, concussions aren't a concern.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FOOTBALL_MECH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pushes plants to the left instead of eating.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Has tried to calculate the volume of his mathematically perfect cone, but he always ends up dreaming about brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His poly-polymer cone gives him thrice the toughness of regular future zombie.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Other zombies call him old-fashioned for being nostalgic for the year 2008.  It was a simpler time when brains were brains, zombies were zombies, and those punk plants kept to themselves.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His techno-bucket greatly increases his protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The force field gets its unique color from frequency harmonics and a liberal dose of purple paint.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Holo Head Zombie's head-mounted force field provides hyper-protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_DESCRIPTION: Future zombies look good in red shirts. Future fact #23: Nothing bad happens to red shirts.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sometimes Future Flag Zombie regrets having to be at the bleeding edge of zombie wave advancement technology.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge future-proof "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}If you look carefully, you'll notice that Robo-Rally Zombie's flag is a sophisticated piece of hovertech combined with a stick.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_H: Robo-Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of an above-average number of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with arms
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}randomly burns tiles with laser eyes
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches 2 Bug Bots when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chilling and Stallia
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback, stun and poison

{FLAVOR}The imp pilots of the Gargantuar Prime series are handpicked by Dr. Zomboss himself. They are the imp elite.  The small, the mean, and the fearless! But mostly the ones who can drive a stick shift.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEA: Has it all: heavy armor, laser eyes, smashing arms, and Bug Bot deployment system.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He always wanted to "see the world," "be his own boss," and "meet and consume interesting brains." He still doesn't understand how he got stuck in this cramped Bug Bot job 24/7.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Lands on the lawn past your defenses, then hops forward.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to freeze and stun

{FLAVOR}The Jetpack Zombie was an early adopter during the brain acquisition tech explosion of 2113. Little did he know he would be stuck with version 1.0 of the simple jetpack.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_DISCO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to freeze and stun
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}tall blocking plants

{FLAVOR}A zombie who 'lives' for drama, he's an original cast member of the stage musical "Disco is BACK! For Revenge!" His signature dance move is "The Weed Whacker."
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_DISCO_DESCRIPTION_: Boosts to float over most plant barriers, in style.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_VETERAN_DESCRIPTIO:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to freeze and stun

{FLAVOR}Blastronaut's rocket-pack is strictly ornamental; his hovering ability comes from a deep meditative state and from being full of helium.
Blastronaut Zombie floats over all plants like a maniac.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_PROTECTOR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chilling and Stallia
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to stun

{FLAVOR}Shield Zombie developed his system using funds from a BiteStarter campaign. The push goal for pushing plants was not met.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_PROTECTOR_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Protect himself and nearby zombies with a force field.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_PROTECTOR_VETERAN_DESCRIPT:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}shield regenerates over time

{FLAVOR}Deflector Zombie saw what Shield Zombie was doing and said to himself, "BRAAAAAAINS," because that's really the only word zombies know.
Deflector Zombie protects himself with a powerful force field that stretches across 5 rows.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_GENERAL_TREADMILL_PHASE3_DESCRIPT: Cardio Zombie is all about health, healthiness and healthy lifestyles. He refuses to consume carbs, downing nothing but high-protein brains for every meal. In his opinion, other zombies really need to up their game. NO EXCUSES!
Advances to a set spot on the board, then tosses buffing brains at other zombies until he's chased away or retreats on his own.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_GENERAL_ZMECH_PHASE3_DESCRIPTION: Z-Mech is taking time out from his PvZ Heroes and PvZ Garden Warfare duties to bring his unique brand of destruction to Plants vs. Zombies 2. Don't worry, though; he's cleared it with his manager.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_GENERAL_ZMECH_PHASE3_DESCRIPTION_: Deploys a set of summoning and teleportation technologies to harass, damage and otherwise imperil plants on the board.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_HOLOHEAD_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can eat plants 2 tiles away from him

{FLAVOR}The force field gets its unique color from frequency harmonics and a liberal dose of purple paint.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_HOLOHEAD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Holo Head Zombie's head-mounted force field provides hyper-protection and enhances his biting.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave Conehead Zombie was the first zombie to invent the cone. He lashed the horn of a mammoth to a slab of petrified wood ... and boom! A cone! The invention of the cone changed everything for the zombies. EVERYTHING.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His mammoth horn cone makes him thrice as tough as normal cave-dwellers.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave Buckethead Zombie likes rocks. He likes rocks A LOT. He strapped a rock to his head and called it a bucket. None of the other Cave Zombies know what a "bucket" is, but they like his style.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His stone "bucket" hat provides great protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to stun and gas effects

{FLAVOR}One day, a Cave Zombie fell head-first into a glacial stream. It had been a bad day already, so he lay there in the frigid water for a long time contemplating the insignificance of his life. When he finally stood up, he discovered that his head was encased in ice. At last, his life had meaning! He was unique! He was Blockhead Zombie! At least, that's his story and he's sticking to it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: The ice block on his head provides decent protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave Zombie was busy painting handprints on cave walls when he was told to start fighting plants. He's not sure why he's fighting plants, but he hopes he can get back to painting soon. He was feeling inspired. He had plans for some big pieces. Art school was finally paying off.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_DODO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Dodo Rider believes dodos are the future of transportation. He believes a public dodo-riding system is not only a wise expenditure of tax dollars but would help the vast majority of zombies get where they need to go more efficiently. Everyone keeps telling him there's no future in dodos, but he refuses to listen.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_DODO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Dodo bird with an imp rider. The dodo can flap and jump over barricades as well as troublesome plants.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave Flag Zombie has been in the flag-carrying business for a long time. It's been his life's work. He's good at it. But sometimes, just sometimes, he longs for a change. He wonders if he could be good at something else. He wonders if he could leave it all behind and start fresh. He's pretty sure he's having a mid-life crisis.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge frosty "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with icicle
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}fires off Yeti Imps when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}Somewhere along the line, Sloth Gargantuar contracted a bad case of Yeti Imps. He used soap, medicinal powders, and a salve made from sloth slobber in an attempt to get rid of them ... to no avail. But the truth is, he's grown used to their presence. The darn things are itchy. They're always squabbling. They nag him endlessly. But at this point, he'd probably miss them if they ever cleared up.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEA: Massive sloth skinned zombie with a case of the imps. Carries and throws three imps instead of just one.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_HUNTER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Shhhhh ... Hunter Zombie didn't actually kill that sabertooth tiger. He found the skin at a thrift store. Also, he's a vegetarian. Tell no one.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_HUNTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Zombie that can throw snow balls at range to cool down plants until they freeze into blocks.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Yeti Imp recently took up knitting. He started with a scarf, moved on to mittens and eventually knitted an entire bodysuit out of hair he shaved off of Yeti Zombie. He just loves knitting. When those needles are in his hands, he feels a sense of calm he's never felt before.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Thrown over most of your defenses, then ambles onward.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_TROGLOBITE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Troglobite has been pushing ice blocks across the tundra day in and day out for as long as he can remember. It's cold and exhausting work, and frankly, he's ready for a vacation. He'd like to go somewhere sunny and warm for a change. He'd like to relax in the sand. He hears Big Wave Beach is nice this time of year.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_TROGLOBITE_DESCRIPTION_HEA: Strong zombie that can push blocks of ice across the lawn.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_WEASELHOARDER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Weasel Hoarder claims she's the one who wrote the song "Pop! Goes the Weasel." And for eons now, she's been demanding royalties for it. But everyone just ignores her. They know that Weasel Hoarder can't even carry a tune, much less write a catchy ditty about the sound vermin make when hugged a bit too tightly.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_WEASELHOARDER_DESCRIPTION_: Zombie hiding in a log with a pack of snow weasels. Weasels are released when her log is shattered.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_WEASEL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Once released, weasels run full speed even over ice floes to nibble your brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_IMPPEAR_IMP_DESCRIPTION: They carry no memory of the zombie they'd been before.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_IMPPEAR_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Zombies converted into Imps by Imp Pear become Imp Pear Imps.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: No one ever presumes that he's Dr. Unlivingstone. Just once, though, he wishes that someone would.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: His expedition cone makes him thrice as tough as normal adventurers.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: Buckethead Adventurer's greatest discovery was that one morning, without warning or reason, there was a bucket on his head.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: His rugged bucket provides considerable protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_BUG_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}Bonk Choy can kill both the bug and the zombie in one final punch

{FLAVOR}Bug Zombie and Bug make a great team, partly because Bug gives Bug Zombie great mobility, but mostly because they share an intense disinterest in horses.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_BUG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Bug carries zombie in over ground defenses and lifts him over barriers.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_CRYSTALSKULL_DESCRIPTION: Unlike the more famous crystal skulls, turquoise skulls are totally non-mysterious and common as dirt.
Uses skull to steal sun, then unleashes energy in a destructive beam.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_DESCRIPTION: Adventurer Zombie just went looking for a jolly good show, and somehow ended up in the Lost City. "Hmm. Yes. Quite." is all that he would say on the matter.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_EXCAVATOR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}blocks straight projectiles
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}bashes Tall-nuts instead

{FLAVOR}Excavator Zombie once heard a song about having a hammer. He liked the idea, but decided it was too mainstream for him - so he got a shovel. Now he's confident that he's clearly the coolest zombie, the others are just too jealous to admit it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_EXCAVATOR_DESCRIPTION_HE: Digs up plants and throws them behind him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: Flag Adventurer Zombie is always shouting "Tally ho!" as he leads the charge. At least, he's shouting it in his head.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of an intrepid "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with big extinguished torch
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}throws Lost City Imp when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}Porter Gargantuar dreams of the discovery that will make him powerful and influential. Maybe then the Imps will be the one carrying him around. It's always nice to have dreams.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMPPORTER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to being shrunken

{FLAVOR}Imp Porter is stronger than he looks. He's also more charming, smarter and has a better education.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMPPORTER_DESCRIPTION_HE: Drops pack on Gold Tile; pack becomes tent from which zombies emerge.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Nepotism got Lost City Imp where he is. He's Bug Zombie's second cousin thrice removed, but he parlayed that connection into a sweet gig getting carried around in a little box.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Gets tossed past most defenses, then explores on foot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_JANE_DESCRIPTION: Wealthy beyond reason, the Parasol Zombie lived a life of luxury - when what she craved was a life of adventure. She funded the expedition to the Lost City and set out to see its wonders for herself, never forgetting to bring her trusty parasol. "In case it rains," she explained - but it only came out sounding like "Brains."
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_JANE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Parasol provides protection from lobbed projectiles.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_LOSTPILOT_DESCRIPTION: He faked his pilot's license and figured nobody would notice. But they did.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_RELICHUNTER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}have 2 relics to disable Magnet-shroom

{FLAVOR}Relic Hunter has hunted some pretty impressive relics in his day. Idols, antiques, curios... he's hunted 'em all.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MECH_CONE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chilling and Stallia
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to Primal Peashooter's knockback, stun and poison

{FLAVOR}Zombie engineers considered the orange cone the height of zombie protective technology. It wasn't until they perfected the design for the Robo-Cone that someone remembered the bucket.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MECH_CONE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: The armor-plated cone offers phenomenal protection for its pilot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_BALLOON_DESCRIPTION: Balloon zombie has no idea where the balloon came from, but he's going with it and he's open to seeing where it takes him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_BALLOON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Balloon makes zombie stay high up in the air, helping him get over most barriers and ground defenses.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_FOOTBALL_DESCRIPTION: Football Zombie is a third-round draft pick and shows a lot of promise, but come on, his salary demands are beyond ridiculous for someone who still doesn't know what football is. Ten million brains per year? For FIFTY YEARS?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_FOOTBALL_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: A heavy-duty zombie who charges your defensive line.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_NEWSPAPER_DESCRIPTION: You can't really blame him for getting so upset; he was THIS close to finishing the crossword (23 down was "Brains.")
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_NEWSPAPER_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Newspaper protects zombie, who is then enraged when it is destroyed.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_SUPERFANIMP_DESCRIPTION: Super-Fan Imp has season tickets, subscribes to the team newsletter, and is super pumped about exploding on contact with fans of the opposing team.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_SUPERFANIMP_DESCRIPTION_HE: An all-too-enthusiastic imp who explodes with rah-rah-rah fervor.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Conehead Mummy Zombie prefers the circular cone shape over the typical pyramid shape. It's a fashion thing, and Conehead Mummy Zombie always stays ahead of fashion.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His cobra cone headdress makes him thrice as tough as normal mummies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Buckethead Mummy Zombie graduated Magna Zom Louder from Zombie Academy where he learned to utilize his diaphragm during groaning lessons.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His sandy bucket greatly protects him from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pyramid-Head Zombie isn't aware that his pyramid is pyramid-shaped. He's a little slow in that respect.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His pyramid-shaped headgear provides triangular noggin protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Is he a mummy? Is he a zombie? It turns out he's a zombie who's rolled himself in toilet paper to protect his fair skin. True fact!
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Egyptian Flag Zombie is so far behind he thinks he's in first place. He's clearly living in de-Nile.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge sandy "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sometimes, a regular Flag Mummy Zombie simply isn't enough to inspire the desired amount of terror and disgust. In these instances, upgrading to the Egypt Rally Zombie isn't the sensible choice, it's the only choice.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HE: He celebrates with increased vigor and truculence the arrival of a new wave of bandaged baddies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_NEWSPAPER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sunday Edition Zombie REALLY loves the comics section, which is why his rage is so all-consuming when it is torn to tatters before he's finished reading it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_NEWSPAPER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEA: The newspaper protects zombie, who becomes enraged when it is destroyed.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PELICAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The Pelican Zombie upgraded from the Seagull Zombie and has no regrets. No egrets, either. Just a pelican.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PELICAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pelican Zombie crosses water without a plank and flies over low plants.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to Stallia, chilling and stun
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to poison
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}moves faster once free

{FLAVOR}The second cousin once removed of King Rot, he rose to power with his disappearing sarcophagus act, but met his untimely end in an unfortunate goat accident. His tale is told in great detail on the back of his sarcophagus, which no one will ever see.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His sarcophagus greatly protects him but slows down a rather fast zombie.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIANO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to chilling, stalling perfume, poison and being shrunken

{FLAVOR}Pianist Zombie only knows two songs, and they're both groaners.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIANO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His rolling piano crushes plants while his music causes dancing Cowboy zombies to switch lanes.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Conehead Pirate is a simple zombie. When asked what his favorite dish is, he'd think for a moment, straighten his ascot, and say, "Rrurrarrbrains." Perhaps he could borrow a cup, neighbor?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His Jolly Roger cone makes him thrice as tough as normal pirates.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Buckethead Pirate Zombie is looking for his bucket. Have you seen it? It's where? Up where? Speak up, he can't hear you.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His sturdy wooden bucket provides excellent protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Dredged from the deepest of seas, Barrelhead Zombie's barrel is a high-quality cask that fits just a bit too snugly.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Barrelhead Zombie's keg-like hat provides augmented protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_BARREL_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}What could it be? Could it be gold? Or some sort of other kind of treasure?  Who knows!
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_BARREL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Contains Imp Zombies that launch out when destroyed.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_CAPTAIN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pirate Captain Zombie isn't actually a captain.  His dry cleaning got mixed up with someone else's, but he thought he looked cool with an eye patch.  Plus, the parrot already knew his name, so he just went with it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_CAPTAIN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His parrot can fly away with your plant and then return to him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_CAPTAIN_PARROT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}dodges most projectiles
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}cannot grab ground plants, rooted plants or burning plants

{FLAVOR}He's a third generation aviation revolutionary. He wants to serve his pirate brethren like his father and his grandmother, Salty Anne, before him.
Quickly flies from the Captain to carry away a plant.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Keeping up with the latest pirate trends is always tricky, but remember, he was planking before it was cool.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge salty "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Jolly Roger Zombie and his flag are fused together into a single brain-munching unit. Their teamwork is an inspiration to ghouls everywhere.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_H: Jolly Roger Zombie marks the arrival of lots and lots of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with shark
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}fires off Pirate Imp when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}Gargantuar Pirate likes short walks off the plank, moonlit raiding parties, and the smell of cannon fire. A true romantic.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEA: Enormous zombie who redefines the shark attack.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He was a bootblack, with a side trade as a pickpocket on the streets of London, but all he stole were oversized footwear. "Time to steal some booty!" was his catchphrase.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Prefers the compact space of barrels, both cannon and rolling.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PONCHO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The grate is his most prized possession. The poncho is there just to protect it from getting rusty. Also, he's looking for his mechanical horse.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PONCHO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sometimes has a hidden armored plate.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PROSPECTOR_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"There once was a zombie who got old, spending all his days looking for gold.  'Til one day in the rain, he finally ate brains... and, wait, where's his other shoe?"
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PROSPECTOR_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Launches over your defenses and appear on the left side of the lawn when his fuse burns down.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_RA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Ra Zombie isn't actually named after the Sun God Ra, though that's a common mistake. He just likes to say "Ra" a lot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_RA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Tries to steal sun, just for safe keeping.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SEAGULL_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Seagull Zombie has racked up the frequent flier miles and dreams of going to the top colleges in the world on a cerebral gastronomy vacation.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SEAGULL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Crosses watery gaps without a plank and flies over low plants.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SWASHBUCKLER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He swashes. He buckles. But, he also writes home every third Sunday and sends brains and treasure via post. He's a good zombie at heart.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SWASHBUCKLER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Swings in on a rope to land midway onto your lawn.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TOMB_RAISER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He dreams about playing fetch, running for the brains. He loves burying himself in the yard, and is not yet indoor trained. He's still looking for his tail.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TOMB_RAISER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Throws out bones to create tombstones on the lawn.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TREASUREYETI_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Speed Details: {STAT}runs away after a short while
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}carries treasure

{FLAVOR}The rare and wondrous Yeti carries his lunch box up and down Mount Brainer to his isolated mountain lodge.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TREASUREYETI_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: A rare and curious creature, he always packs a lunch.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}After a wild night, Conehead Zombie woke up holding a mysterious receipt for a cone and industrial strength adhesive.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: His traffic cone headpiece makes him thrice as tough as normal zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}There was a time when Buckethead Zombie was hailed as a zombie genius for his innovative bucket-on-head strategy. It's been a few years, though, and zombies wonder if he's got any surprises left. His secret? He doesn't.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: His bucket hat makes him extremely resistant to damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}After consultation with various storybook wolves, it was determined that straw helmets and wood helmets were not up to snuff, and that brick helmets had to be seriously considered.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Brickhead Zombie's brick head provides thorough brickheaded brickheadness.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Basic Zombie hates the term "Basic". He doesn't consider himself some generic foe or common corpse. He's an individual, darn it, and he's going to make a difference even if it kills you.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}A spelling impaired zombie named "Brian," Flag Zombie keeps thinking the rest of the zombies are talking to him. At least he feels important.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His flag marks the arrival of a huge pile or "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Rally Zombie splurged on the all-leather flag because, heck, he's worth it.
Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of a large clot or "pile" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with pole
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}throws Imp when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}Gargantuar is the embodiment of power, made real. He is a juggernaut of hunger, from which there is no escape. He is fear unleashed. Well, he's fear slightly leashed.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_H: Gargantuar really is kind of a big deal.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}What he lacks in reach he more than makes up for with his bad attitude, or zombadittude as he likes to call it. Don't encourage him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Is hurled onto the lawn past your defenses, then shuffles ahead.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_VASE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with pole
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}throws Imp when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}The ceramic confines of the Vase Gargantuar's home has done nothing to his endless hunger, his immense power, or his vast destructive potential. However, his footspeed could be better.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_VASE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Phenomenally sized zombie stuffed into a tiny unliving space.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_VEGAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Are the zombies becoming vegetarians? Do they even like eating plants? That's still a mystery of PvZ, but this guy will surely find and eat every plant he encounters! To him, the lawn is his all-you-can-eat buffet. Other zombies told him that he should try brains sometimes, but he was offended by that.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_VEGAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: He can charge into the battlefield, quickly eating everything on his way - even underground plants.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULLRIDER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Had dreams of becoming a rodeo clown but found the clown make-up to just be too creepy.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULLRIDER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Gets launched past all but the tallest plants, then proceeds on foot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}tall plants block flying imp

{FLAVOR}He's not an angry bull. He loves flowers, playing in the fields, sitting under trees, and long walks across the pasture. He wants to settle down when he meets the right cow. Too bad he's a robot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Can launch his zombie rider past most of your defenses.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"Legend" perhaps overstates Rodeo Legend Zombie's status in the rodeo world. Don't tell him that, though, unless you're desperate to hear an hour-long tirade about calf-roping.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEA: Rodeo Legend Zombie smashes a plant and launches his zombie rider past most of your defenses.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_BEACH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}mouth turbine can pull plants to it
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}summoned zombie sharks can consume plants

{FLAVOR}The Zombot Sharktronic Sub is a true labor of love. Dr. Zomboss obsessed over every detail of the aquatic mechanism of doom as he worked on it day in and day out from the wee hours of the morning until well after dark. He carefully handcrafted the shark's nearly impenetrable exterior skin. He shaved each razor-sharp tooth to a point by hand. And he painstakingly installed the lethal plant-consuming fan inside the machine's horrific maw all by himself. Zomboss shed more than one tear of joy when his masterpiece was complete. Say what you will about the evil genius, but he is passionate about his projects.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_BEACH_DESCRIPTION_HEA: The ravenous engine of carnage from the murky depths.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_COWBOY_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}missile attacks can target mine carts

{FLAVOR}Ranchers and farmhands abandon your fields. Rumbling down the dusty trail, this wagon was engineered to strike fear into the heart of any horticulturist who should encounter it. Dr. Zomboss normally doesn't take any bull, but this time he made an exception.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_COWBOY_DESCRIPTION_HE: The stagecoach of destruction from the western wilds.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DARK_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}fire breathing attacks destroy plants
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}lobbed fireballs can hatch Imp Dragon Zombies

{FLAVOR}With a rumble of destruction, Dr. Zomboss forged his Dark Dragon in the heart of a volcano. Then he tempered the beast in the chilled waters of Doom Lake. Finally  he fed its furnace with coal from the Mines of Morbidity. And the paint job - that was done by Carl.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DARK_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: The desolator of all, from dark times.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DINO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}summons dinosaurs

{FLAVOR}With flagrant disregard for temporal tidiness and simple good taste, Dr. Zomboss figured it would be a good idea to build a big metal dinosaur.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DINO_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: A mechanical means of dinosaurian destruction.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EGYPT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}missile attack can create tombstones

{FLAVOR}To add that extra bit of wickedness to the Sphinx-inator Dr. Zomboss chiseled his creation from the stonework of cursed tombs. You should not take this instance of reuse and recycle to mean he's going green. The only thing green about him is his tongue.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EGYPT_DESCRIPTION_HEA: The destroyer of plants from the ancient sands.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EIGHTIES_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}speakers do passive damage (except to ground plants and Phat Beet) and send out shockwave attacks

{FLAVOR}In another world, in another time, Dr. Zomboss would receive the bounty of enthusiastic applause that is his due. Not here and now, though. Nope.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EIGHTIES_DESCRIPTION_: An intimate evening with some of Dr. Zomboss' most recent and painful explorations.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_FUTURE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}missile attacks can destroy Power Tiles

{FLAVOR}When Dr. Zomboss is nestled into the comfy folds of his futuristic cerebral control pod he almost finds it hard to be evil. Of course once he sees a lawn full of happy plants that puts him right back where he needs to be, hungry and evil.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_FUTURE_DESCRIPTION_HE: The Power Tile crushing creation from the Far Future.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_ICEAGE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Dr. Zomboss was real impressed with himself when he came up with the idea to build a weaponized woolly mammoth with the power to blast snow and ice out of its mechanical trunk. But what Dr. Zomboss didn't realize until it was too late: He's allergic to mammoth fur. Now he has to load up on allergy medication every time he wants to take the darn thing out for a spin.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_ICEAGE_DESCRIPTION_HE: The mammoth mech with an ice blast from the past.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_LOSTCITY_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} drops zombies and bags o' sand

{FLAVOR}After repeated failures with variously robotic engines of destruction, Dr. Zomboss decided to go with a kinder, more eco-friendly lighter-than-air option to sow disaster and discord.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_LOSTCITY_DESCRIPTION_: The floating fortress from the skies above.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_PIRATE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannon can rain down imps past your defenses

{FLAVOR}"Hoist the mizzenmast, batten down the hatches! 15 zombies on a dead man's boat, yo ho ho and a bucket of brains!" Dr. Zomboss had to admit he was really getting into this whole pirate thing. Though he never thought he'd be on a boat on a boat.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_PIRATE_DESCRIPTION_HE: The plant plundering privateer of the high seas.
LocStringValues.ZOYBEANPOD_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"Developing plant zomboids in eerie mimicry of zombie life is well within the boundaries of human experience," Zoybean Pod insists with a calm, unvarying steadiness.
LocStringValues.ZOYBEANPOD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Zoybean Pods grow from sprouts to full pods, then split open to release helpful plant "zomboids" which attack zombies.
